It i clear, and an acceptable level of bass.  I plan on eventually setting up a home theater for audio but for now I am satisfied with whats there.  There are multiple audio options you can run with to try and see what is best for your environment.One last thing I think that is worth mentioning is the screen glare, there is very very very little of it.  I have a bright lamp in the back corner of my living room and while on my old tv, the glare was very noticable, it is not on this tv.  The screen has a very good finish that reduces the amount of light reflection so viewing it even in bright rooms is not an issue.

Reviews.Title: My Christmas present to myself...
Reviews.Author: Shopping Queen
Reviews.Content: Upgrading from a 32" Panasonic to the 55" Samsung.  Fabulous picture - setup was a snap.  Only problem we're having is getting the surround sound hooked up.  We foolishly just yanked out all the plugs without labeling them.  Not the TVs fault tho - nothing to complain about so far.  Very pleased.BTW - this is actually something I did not buy on Amazon - I got it at Best Buy for $200 less - who would have thunk!!

Reviews.Title: Loud Buzzing Noise - Problem Solved!!
Reviews.Author: Aubrey
Reviews.Content: Review title about sums it up.  It's a fab TV in every way except this one MAJOR problem which is that it makes an insane amount of noise when turned on, and even sometimes when it's off.  Keeps me from wanting to turn it on half the time.  Maybe we got a bad apple.UPDATE: Changing my rating!!  We finally got around to calling Samsung about the buzzing noise.  Had an easy time with customer service and had a technician out to look at it within a few days.  The technician replaced the power supply for us - apparently it's not unheard of for the power supply to be/go bad and this is what causes the buzzing when the TV is off but plugged in or turned on.  No dice.  Then he suggested running an extension cord to plug it into a GFCI protected outlet in our kitchen.  BINGO!  We had tried other outlets but didn't think to bring it into a different room to get the GFCI.  I've updated my two-star review to a full five; as I said, the TV is great without the buzzing noise!  So, don't be an idiot like I was - if your Samsung is buzzing and you don't know why, try plugging it into a GFCI protected outlet - you'll usually have one either in the bathroom or kitchen if you don't have em elsewhere.  And, for what it's worth, I was impressed with Samsung's customer service, and wouldn't hesitate to call them again if we have any other problems.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Pat Stone
Reviews.Content: 65" picture quality is beautiful. 4 HDMI ports for great connectivity. Price is right. Wall mount was a snap. Speakers are, well, TV quality (ugh). But, I'm using an Atlantic Technology Power Bar PB-235 speaker system (amazing, room-filling sound).

Reviews.Title: Waited an eternity and had to retrieve from UPS Will Call Center after 8 day wait and two trips success!
Reviews.Author: P. K. Sage
Reviews.Content: I am going to update this latter as I did not receive this TV on time so I cannot provide a fair review at this time. I received this Prime Shipping in 8 days instead of in time for the weekend. This was all UPS shippers fault. Amazon did credit 1 month on my Prime account however I really would have preferred the TV last week as I have no time this week to enjoy it.The TV is everything I hope to have in a Smart TV, Wifi connection to my NAS Hard Drives, Internet and lest I forget Amazon Prime Instant Videos...

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price.
Reviews.Author: Billy Nubz
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is awesome and the smart tv features are really useful. I have consoles, but even I think I'd use Netflix on the tv.Linking it to a Samsung Soundbar is kind of hard, I got Samsung to walk me through the steps on the phone, but once you get it ll set up, you'll love it!

Reviews.Title: It became a loved member of the family from the start.
Reviews.Author: Her Dawdaw
Reviews.Content: I usually buy 4 or 5 year old technology, but needed a tv, wanted a big screen, and wanted to try the "smart-tv" features, so I bought this 55 incher.  I am a repeat Samsung customer, mainly because I haven't gotten anything bad from Samsung so far.  We are completely satisfied with this tv.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV
Reviews.Author: B. Elsherbini
Reviews.Content: Love my new Samsung  Smart TV...best flat screen in the house!  It has excellent clarity and was easy to install.

Reviews.Title: It works, although I expected better from my prior experiences with Samsung displays over the years.
Reviews.Author: MikeDVB
Reviews.Content: The picture looks good but there is a fairly large 'splotch' I guess you would call it - looks like a haze - across about the center of the bottom half of the screen if you're not looking at it straight-on and the screen is showing a darker scene.It's not bad enough that I'd return it but it's annoying none-the-less.

Reviews.Title: Great TV from Amazon
Reviews.Author: GJH "guitar builder"
Reviews.Content: perfect TV!  Amazon delivered it a day early and packaging was great.  No problem with set up.  wonderful picture and sound is not bad.  I am going to hook up some speakers soon.  Only problem I have had is finding I have to use both remotes- U-verse and Samsung for some functions.  Extremely satisfied.  my old 32 inch Samsung has been a perfect TV so went with quality I know.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture and TV
Reviews.Author: Kathie
Reviews.Content: The picture and sound is great to me.  I did have to change the settings and someone mentioned the "soap opera effect".  One of the reviews mentioned turning off the "auto motion setting" which is located in the Picture setting.  I did so and now the picture is great, no soap opera looking picture.  I also kept the picture in the standard setting as the movie setting made the picture too dark.  With these changes and adjusting the brightness and contrast, I think I have a beautiful picture.  I ordered a Samsung sound bar which I have yet to receive but I really don't need it but ordered it anyway, I think the sound is fine.  I don't think you will be disappointed with this TV and I got it at a great price when I ordered on 11/27.  Love Amazon too!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great buy for a good price
Reviews.Author: Venkatesh Prabhu
Reviews.Content: UN46F6300 is an awesome product from Samsung. Amazing clarity on 1080p and blu-ray movies. Sound is low , would recommend connecting it to a home theater to enjoy the experience to the fullest.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40" is crystal clear. Just what I had hoped for and expected from a Samsung LED TV.
Reviews.Author: LuckyEddie
Reviews.Content: I really love this TV. It has great features and an excellent picture. It is the 2nd Samsung LED TV I have purchased in the last 4 years and I love them both. They both have the best picture quality I have seen on any TV to date.

Reviews.Title: No brainer TV set up
Reviews.Author: zincink
Reviews.Content: Lightweight quality TV with enough ports to satisfy your techy side. Essentially a plug and play.The only issue I encountered was the screen turning pink due to my Comcast set top box. This is easily fixed by resetting your Comcast box. I didn't even read the book and set up the TV without any issues.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: urge
Reviews.Content: Amazon had the best price and as a prime member no charge for shipping.  Nice picture, sound is fine and although I did not think the smart TV was necessary, it is nice to have everything in one.  Streaming works well.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: dmt
Reviews.Content: Crystal clear picture.  Smart TV features are fast and effective.  Very light as well and easy to wall mount (running cables behind the wall was more difficult).  We got the 46" model and its the perfect size for us, sitting about 12 feet away.  Best TV I have ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV for the Money
Reviews.Author: caseyk75
Reviews.Content: Amazing Picture.  Smart TV features work very well.  People regularly comment on how spectacular the picture is.  Highly recommend.  This is my second Samsung LED and I have had outstanding experiences with both.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: santas little helper
Reviews.Content: Very clear image, great sound, easy to use. Functionality is outstanding, love the multiple ports for HDMI, USB, and other devices. Great pricing I recommend for for generally everyone.

Reviews.Title: Love this tv
Reviews.Author: Corey
Reviews.Content: Bought this after doing a ton of research. I'm really happy with this tv and the smart apps are really nice. I use the tv to watch netflix and amazon videos all the time. The picture is really clear and the colors are great too.

Reviews.Title: Samsung FAN!
Reviews.Author: jennifer
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time, great delivery person even offered to unpack item. I love Samsung products this is my 4th Samsung TV, it is replacing the 55 LCD I gave my son that still worked great. Only reason for 4 Stars  Is because it do not have the same Sound Quality that I have with my other Samsung TV's.  Other wise I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Lucy
Reviews.Content: High technology! Now I can watch Netflix on my new TV and so excited! Lot of functions still take time to learn it! High 5 product!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: A TRUE COFFE LOVER
Reviews.Content: Out of the box I was frustrated with the tv and the motion.  I went back and read the reviews on amazon and used the settings others recommended and it fixed everything.  This is truly an amazing tv.  I'd recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: F. Lona "figaro123super"
Reviews.Content: This is the first TV I have ever purchased. I almost went with the 55', but the 46 is plenty big. This TV has lots of neat features, but most of all, IT HAS AN EXCELLENT PICTURE! I am not a big tech nerd when it comes to the TV, but the picture with a HD source is absolutely stunning. My one complaint is the audio, but a TV so thin (another plus!), you can't expect much. I purchased a simple samsung sound bar that gives me better sound anyways. I love my tv!

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: Nasser
Reviews.Content: One of the best TVs i have ever owned! I everything is great and available like Netflix Facebook and many other apps.But the only problem is the controls is somewhat laggy and slow.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: C. kung "ck"
Reviews.Content: TV arrived in one day and setup was super easy.  Sleek design and super crisp images!  The whole family is in bliss.

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: Shella P Marksberry
Reviews.Content: We put this TV outside under the veranda by the pool.  The screen is large enough to see across the yard.  My husband now wants to upgrade the 42" TV to this TV in his man cave.

Reviews.Title: Wow.
Reviews.Author: Chris in NJ "Chris in NJ"
Reviews.Content: Various models by Samsung are highly recommended by Consumer Reports which swayed me to this TV.  It is amazing.  Easy to set up; easy to operate; very attractive; and above all, the picture quality is top knotch.  The features of this TV are fantastic, and easy to operate.  Very intuitive...  I'm thrilled.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Linda Stelzer
Reviews.Content: It has a very clear sharp picture, crisp clear speaker, and was easy to set up.  The price was less than anywhere else I looked.

Reviews.Title: Does everything I need
Reviews.Author: Jed Rapoport
Reviews.Content: The TV has good viewing in all lighting situations and from a wide variety of angles. I think the picture quality is very good although some people disagree. Overall, I like this TV and would gladly recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Better than I had hoped.
Reviews.Author: Chris Graham
Reviews.Content: Really impressed with this TV. Great picture, and the smart aspect is awesome. You can steam movies in 1080p over your network from a computer running the plex server. Big win.

Reviews.Title: Great TV with only minor drawbacks.
Reviews.Author: C. Vilhauer
Reviews.Content: I've owned this TV for about a month now, and I love it. The image is great, the menus are all laid out in a way that makes sense, and they seem to respond quick enough. As it's not a true 120Hz television, video games can occasionally have some delay. But there is a game mode that I haven't tested extensively, but sure does seem to help. There is also stutter reduction controls that can be tweaked to give the best experience.And regarding the stutter reduction controls, I wish there were room for a few custom profiles that are changeable on demand.The menus, as I mentioned earlier, are very easy to navigate. As with every new TV, it does take a little practice to learn where everything is, but the learning curve isn't steep at all. On top of that, Samsung's smart hub is gorgeous. It gives you recommendations on what TV shows you might like, and has a pretty good assortment of apps, which are much easier to get compared to older Samsung smart TV's that I've seen.All in all, this is definitely a TV I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Worth to Have this TV
Reviews.Author: Bhanu
Reviews.Content: This smart TV is really worth to have .easy to install,good picture quality,good sound system.In and all it is a good TV to have it

Reviews.Title: Samsung is on Point
Reviews.Author: Stefon Oliver Jr.
Reviews.Content: I came home from deployment and have not been disappointed with this purchase. It is well worth the money, which actually wasn't too high , and the picture clarity is great when watching HD, movies off my laptop, and playing the game. Still trying to figure it all out though since it does so much.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Wargo
Reviews.Content: I never had such luxury before in a TV. It was a major decision for me to make this purchase... Amazon had the BEST price and shipping terms!  A week before I purchased this TV, I purchased the Samsung Galaxy 4 smartphone... I love my phone.Samsung has truly outdone themselves with this TV... my new galaxy 4 phone connects to the TV... simply delighted and pleased!!!

Reviews.Title: I like my Samsung 46-Inch TV.  It fits perfectly in the space
Reviews.Author: Terri Landrum
Reviews.Content: I really like my new TV.It has some features that I think are way cool like the ability to watch Netflix and of course the HD feature.We've had a few problems with getting it set up, but those issues were related to faulty cabling and not to the TV.So far I'm very pleased and would do it again.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jezebelle "lorriegidley"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV based upon Amazon reviews and I am not disappointed. I upgraded from a 42 inch Toshiba to a 65 inch Samsung. Amazon delivery was great. They brought the TV into my house and set it on my stand, then tested it to be sure it worked. Amazon had emailed me to let me know that I had 30 day tech support. I used tech support, very helpful to set up my TV. I really appreciate all the reviewers that helped me make this decision. Awesome tech support from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: Amy E. Hild "amwa9"
Reviews.Content: This TV is such an upgrade from our old TV. We mounted this to the wall in the kitchen and we couldnt be happier.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Marion Cantwell
Reviews.Content: FIrst flat screen TV we have owned.  Really like everything about it.  Still learning all of the features.  HD is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great features, awesome picture, easy set up
Reviews.Author: Charles T. Cumbaa "Charlie Cumbaa"
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with how easy this TV was to configure a number of different services and the picture is amazing.  Very pleased with the price-value of this TV

Reviews.Title: Another Samsung winnder
Reviews.Author: ji0005
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Samsung LCD TV (yes this is an LCD TV, the LED part refers to how it is lit).  I wasn't interested in 3D or many of the higher end features.  I was just looking for a good form factor that would mount nicely above my mantle.  So far I am pretty happy with it.Look:The picture looks good, the bezel is fairly thin and somewhat translucent looking, so it disappears when viewing the TV. Compared to my original Samsung, the contrast is much better. As I have purchased tv's, they tend to always have a better picture from year to year, and I can say that this is the best looking in my home at the moment.  I did take a few minutes to adjust the picture settings based on my preferences and some settings others have posted as suggestions.Wireless:This has the ability to join your wireless network for some of it's features.  I ended up moving an access point a little closer to it so that it got a stronger signal, but I have been using it wirelessly for both Amazon videos and streaming videos from a DLNA server on my network.  Both work well in my setup. (a wired connection would probably be better in most cases when possible)Features:I have this TV fed from a TivoHD, so I havn't used most of the smart TV features.  As I mentioned in the wireless section, it does well getting content from a DLNA server, although it can be slow to get to the content you are looking for if you have a lot of videos.Sound:I am impressed by the sound.  A decent soundbar would be better, but this TV has the best sound of all my flat panels. There is a setting in the setup that you tell the TV how it is mounted (stand or wall mount).  I have flipped the settings and have not been able to tell a difference.  I do notice the occasional lip sync issue when streaming, but there is a good chance that is not the TV's fault.

Reviews.Title: Best Tv
Reviews.Author: Nathalie
Reviews.Content: Love love the TV!  Easy to use and the TV is so clear.  Definitely loving all the features it has!

Reviews.Title: 40 inch led samsung tv
Reviews.Author: Robert munhall
Reviews.Content: I was a bit leary of this product at first, we have always had rca,toshibia etc.Till i found this tv and gave in, and im so happy we did this. This is the best picture i have ever seen in all my yrs of watching tv. However the sound of the tv lacks depth, which is understandable due to the thiness of the tv. We added the Bose solo sound system and now it is all perfect, very happy, recomed to anybody this set. Love it..

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: gerald pinson
Reviews.Content: No complaints as of yet.  Only slight problem noted is that at the corners of the screen, the colors drop off a bit or has a little darker hue.  Hardly noticeable.

Reviews.Title: Big and beautiful.
Reviews.Author: VegasLarry
Reviews.Content: When you take HDTV out of the box you might think OH BOY, but after setup ( which was easy) and watching for about a week you come to believe that a 70" or even 80" would be a nice size if you have the room for it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: shop-a-holic
Reviews.Content: Mounted it on the wall over our fireplace and it looks fantastic. High resolution picture quality. Overall a great TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46F6300
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: This TV has fanatastic colors.  The remote looks easy to work with, but I use a universal remote to control all our gear.The colors are very vivid and adjusting the colors to the program on the screen is very simple.  Lived up to all my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Aldric
Reviews.Content: This smart tv allows me to connect to Wi-Fi and access an unlimited amount of commercial-free entertainment in HD. So long cable.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: avisthecool
Reviews.Content: Samsung apps are pretty cool. Especially netfilx, amazon, youtube. Easy universal remote setup. 120Hz makes action movies sequences smooth and fun to watch.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Laura Jacobs
Reviews.Content: We ordered this tv, after reading many reviews.  Allreviews were accurate.  Amazon had this deliveredto us and the delivery man unboxed it and pluggedit in to make sure it worked ok.  But, you need to dosome setting up on your own by following the instructionmanual.  Not that difficult.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Travis R Henderson
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of reviews and considered several options on which brand and size to choose. This TV seemed to be right in the sweet spot for performance versus price for me. Works great and looks great.*EDIT* There was a defect in the screen that probably was there all along but it took me 2-3 months to notice. There was a large spot in the middle of the screen which was dark grey with specific shades of greens and blues. After I noticed it there was no unseeing it. Samsung was really great to deal with and within a month or so a local TV repair company came out and replaced the whole panel. It looks better than ever and I am still really happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Big Ceez "Big Buda"
Reviews.Content: This tv is the bomb!!! (Bomb means very good) It looks so great on my fiances wall. Bought it as a gift for her bedroom and i have ZERO complaints. I would definitely recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Valorie Dorr
Reviews.Content: I just moved into a new apartment and I was looking for a nice 46 inch tv and this tv is amazing. This tv is so nice. big, clear picture with all the bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: Best TV
Reviews.Author: CHANDRAKANT C SHAH
Reviews.Content: TV is very good I should say it is superb. I was not interested in 3 D, I bought this model works for me. Everything works as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Nancy K Havens
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is great, and two old fogies were able to connect it to cable, receiver and DVD without a technical wizard in residence - well worth the $!

Reviews.Title: Its pretty sweet
Reviews.Author: Tom Hiltbrunn
Reviews.Content: It is a nice tv. This is the first smart tv i have ever had and i like the idea of it being smart. the apps work great but i wish they had more of a selection. I bought this TV initially because i have the samsung galaxy s4 and i wanted to be able to do the screen mirroring and all that jazz which it does. The only issue is that it has like a solid second or two lag time between my phone and the tv. also i want to be able to use the other features like the air gesture. but it wont let me access it. I think i just have to tinker with it more and figure it out. but besides all that I love it. The screen is amazing! it's sleek and i think i will be quite satisfied for years to come with this tv.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Cheri A Michaud
Reviews.Content: The Samsung 46" Smart LED HDTV does everything I want it to do and would recommend it to anyone interested

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture
Reviews.Author: bobj535
Reviews.Content: This is a smart TV and requires some set-up. I had to call the support line twice because I failed to adequately read the manual. The support line remotely accessed my TV and checked the settings, loaded the latest up-dates, and I am good to go. My set top box is actually a "whole house DVR" so the Samsung remote will not control all the recording functions, but using both power buttons on the supplied remote will turn the TV and STB on and off together. My wife and I are very happy with the TV.

Reviews.Title: 32" LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: wpe007
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup. First rate. It's a Samsung and I have not been disappointed. Great picture, great sound. Pricy but well wealth the money.

Reviews.Title: Superb picture and extremely easy to set up out of the box!
Reviews.Author: Norman Eng
Reviews.Content: The picture quality was fabulous and the set was very easy to set up after I took it out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Nice Pictue, Smart TV Features
Reviews.Author: Smartbuyer
Reviews.Content: Nice picture.  I like the "smart TV" feature that knows if I have turned on my Sony box to get Amazon, Netflix, etc. Tried to get Netflix directly (no Sony box) since it is built into the TV features, but several attempts failed to produce the proper format picture. Since I already have what I need with the Sony box, I didn't continue to try to work it out.Amazon offered free shipping (PRIME) and a premium delivery. The TV was set-up and tested to make sure it worked before the men that brought it left.  They even cleaned up and disposed of the shipping materials.

Reviews.Title: Not everything included as specified
Reviews.Author: jls1974
Reviews.Content: The TV was great at first. I read the guide and it said that I should use a wireless Samsung speaker set for a better sound experience. After spending all this money on the TV I went and bought the wireless bluetooth Samsung sound bar and wireless base. I could not figure out how to link the 2 together. I check the e-troubleshooting guide and it kept saying to do it with the sound share. I could not find any sound share option on the TV. I came back to amazon and looked at the comparison chart below the product description. There is an orange dot next to sound share under the F6300 model TV. So, I contacted Samsung via chat.First of all, what horrible customer service. The representative pretty much didn't care what amazon listed on their site about their TV's, they are just a 3rd party site (that is what they told me). Then they said However (as in they were not going to talk about this 3rd party site) you need to go here....and then linked me a specification link to their site.  Then they wanted to know if I was happy about my results after contacting customer support.I know this might seem like a menial complaint about this TV. However, I would not have went and spent all this money and time if I would have ever thought that a TV that costs this much, has a wireless smart hub, wireless device connections, etc. couldn't connect to my soundbar....even though amazon and Samsung's own e-troubleshooting guide says it can.

Reviews.Title: Vivid & accurate color, excellent contrast, smooth motion & a superb SmartTV interface
Reviews.Author: Tony M.
Reviews.Content: Let me preface this by saying I had humble expectations for this unit.  The "professional" reviews said that it had lackluster visual performance.  I bought the TV because I had seen it with my own eyes and admired other Samsung models.  Moreover, I was a little skeptical of "SmartTV" before owning this model.I have to tell you that I was breath-taken when I started the TV for the first time.  The color, contrast, motion and crispness are very impressive.  The experience is like seeing a wall-size Monet start moving.  On top of that, the first-time walk-through setup experience was very user friendly and entertaining.That segue's well into the functionality and versatility of the SmartTV.  The system is so rich that I've since disconnected both my Roku & Chromecast.  Samsung's versions of apps like HBOGo , Netflix & YouTube are first-rate, higher quality experiences than those on Roku/Chromecast.To add a cherry on top, the TV is absolutely quiet (I used to have a buzzy plasma) and runs perfectly cool at room temperature.  This matters to me a lot since the house heats up a lot in the summer time and I like to watch TV late with the volume low.This TV was definitely worth the price.  It replaced a $2000 plasma, two set-top boxes and has made watching movies more enjoyable than going to the theatre.  Without a doubt, if you watch TV at all, even a few minutes of a day, watch it on this screen.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Michael Husby
Reviews.Content: Very nice value for this 50 inch TV. Easy to set-up and has excellent picture.  Easy to use on internet streaming.

Reviews.Title: White ghosts and it stopped working briefly
Reviews.Author: Seany B. "Football fan"
Reviews.Content: The picture looks really nice with bright scenes.  But dark scenes are diminished by "white ghosts" of the previous brighter scenes.  This is a big problem if you are a fan of the kinds of crime dramas I like to watch.  Another problem was that the machine kept starting and stopping over and over.  It would start up briefly and shut down.  I looked it up on line and it's a common problem.  There were various solutions posted involving cutting a component away from one of the circuit boards (!)  I found that board and literally tapped and jiggled it with my hand and the problem went away.  Scary.  Three stars means "its okay".  For the money, I'm really disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great TV but
Reviews.Author: Strand
Reviews.Content: Terrific picture on this tv. But it does have glare. And I still have a hard time navigating the smart tv function. Works great with Netflix tho.

Reviews.Title: What sound problem?
Reviews.Author: LeMarie
Reviews.Content: I was excited when it was delivered today. It arrived within a week but I was weary of shipping because if reviews. It came packaged in a huge box with a lot of bubble wrap. The screen and everything is undamaged.I won't get into specs or anything because other reviewers have done so. I have had a samsung tv before and this one is more up to date so I'll be here all day finding out the new stuff. If you haven't had a tv like this it is easy to figure out! Don't let other negative reviewers discourage you in this tv. The sound is a problem for some but they were expecting surround sound power anyway. The sound is great Especially if this tv is for your bedroom. If you want better sound you can always get a samsung surround sound to hook it up to. Great tv for blu ray movies and video games. This is a tv I plan to keep for awhile and it's another reason I continue shopping with amazon.

Reviews.Title: Nice looking TV, but could there be a problem???
Reviews.Author: Eliza Dzhaneryan
Reviews.Content: The TV looks great and I think we got a great price on it. However in the past month, the screen went black twice while it was on. I could near the sound of the program but there was no picture. When I turn the TV off and turn it back on again, it works. I do hope that this is not a potential problem in the near future. I would hate to have a problem with it...If you have any suggestions, please advise...

Reviews.Title: Beyond expectations
Reviews.Author: M. McCauley
Reviews.Content: We love our new SamsungTV. It replaced an eight year old "large box"Toshiba. We now have our family room back. The color is so realistic, it's touchable. This TV provides the best entertainment with internet capablity beyond our expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase, Totally Worth It
Reviews.Author: Arjun Rajakutty
Reviews.Content: I had to do a lot of research and digging around before I found the right smart TV. SInce this was going to be a one time purchase, I wanted to make sure I get the best one at a good price.First bet is to buy this off amazon, you will easily save atleast 100$. The ones in Best Buy and other retailers in store cost atleast a 100$ more. This was a 2013 model and had the latest updates and software in it. The  TV is pretty fast and the Wifi is great. The sound quality is good as well except for trouble with Netflix where you need to turn up the volume. This is a problem with most smart TVs, so I would not really worry about it. This samsung smart tv outperforms others in that dept., though you still need to raise the volume, its not as much as for other TVs. Lots of smart apps and everything works great. Picture clarity and the 120Hz makes the motion and screen look awesome. Installation is easy and overall appearance is great.The negative apart from the sound is with the youtube app, after playing around a couple of videos, a bland screen starts showing up even though you hear the sound playing in the background. You switch off the TV and restart and it works fine. I wonder what this is. But use your HDMI cable for all this, its much easier to handle than the Youtube app here unless your really lazy but willing to play with the remote to do your searches. The sound is best when watching in movie mode, for intense movies with lots of dialouges, use the other options. The videos and movies look great when watching on TV rather than on the laptop, so use your nice High Speed HDMI cable for most of your uses.Updates:There is a easier way out of the Youtube problem. This TV comes equipped with the All Share Play for Samsung devices, so you can view your phone on the TV via screen mirroring. Besides, it allows you to share and view photos, videos on the TV just via Wifi connection. And for Youtube, just pair your device and do all the searches you need and watch videos with greater ease.End Verdict: Totally worth the buy. Best Smart TV in its category. Samsung Rocks Yet Again, do does Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: screen become blank sometimes
Reviews.Author: Md. Ahasan Ullah
Reviews.Content: This TV is very good .  Amazon services is also satisfactory. Unfortunately I get one bad  experience in this TV , That is when I watch any movie or video online some times screen become blank ,  that time only audio work .what should I do ?

Reviews.Title: Very good picture.  Read on!
Reviews.Author: Joseph A. Nowak "Prophotoman"
Reviews.Content: I bought the 40" model, the 6350, to use in our bedroom.  I have a Sony Bravia 47" which I bought about 4 years ago or so which is in our living room. THAT model was Sony's top of the line model.  Comparing the pictures, the Sony, even though it's several years old still gives a better overall image than the new Samsung.  However the Samsung DOES give an excellent image.... It's just that the sony screen is absolutely outstanding.  The difference?  The dynamic range of the image is greater on the 4-5 year old Sony (it has to do with balanced contrast) The color gradations are more even on the Sony.  Still I am very happy with the Samsung and WOULD recommend it to my family and friends!

Reviews.Title: What a great tv
Reviews.Author: konopp
Reviews.Content: Decided to buy this Samsung after having good luck with a smaller one.  Picture is beautiful in a room that gets the morning sun.  Sound is only so so but I have it in the family room which is on the small side.  If I had it in a larger room I would probably get a sound bar.  What we really love is that it connects to Amazon Prime for movies and tv without any problems.  Set up was easy. Would definitely recommend it!Update 18 December 2013; We're now having almost daily issues with connecting to Amazon video.  Grand-kids like to watch some of the kiddy shows Prime offers and some days we can't connect at all and some days it cuts out after 2 or 3 minutes.  No problem connecting to Pandora, so it's not the internet connection (Verizon Fios). Haven't tried anything else because we don't subscribe to Netflex or Hulu yet.

Reviews.Title: perfect picture, great sound, ok wifi feature
Reviews.Author: Alex G.
Reviews.Content: This is the best TV I ever had. I bought this because i found a deal off a different site based in NJ for a little less than $600 OTD (tho it took a bit longer to arrive). I had the TV for a few days now.PROS:Picture from satellite channels to Bluray movies is FLAWLESSSound is decently powerful.Slick design, light & thin.CONS:I don't really use the WiFi/Smart feature, but it felt the connection is a little slower than my PS3 when streaming Netflix or whatever.In a nutshell, it's how the standard of TV's should be these days.If looking for less Smart/WiFi feature, maybe go with F6030 series.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV A+++
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: The picture on the TV is excellent, clear and crisp. Initial setup was confusing on several steps but managed to get through it and completed initial setup in 10 minutes. The only downer is the eco setting, turn the silly thing off, if you don't it dims the screen based on the room lighting and in my opinion it dims it too much, which affected my viewing pleasure. For those making comments on wifi dropping, I suspect it is a router/wifi conflict try changing your router before crapping on about the TV. Overall I highly recommend the TV!

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture, terrible networking
Reviews.Author: Kevin Schantz
Reviews.Content: I'd like to start this review by saying that the picture quality of this set is incredible, but if you are buying the TV for it's "Smart" features you may be disappointed if you are connecting via wireless networking. In my experience the network connection dropped frequently and required me to re-enter my network password each time I reconnected. I added a network repeater to improve the signal strength but that did not solve the problem. When I connected my Roku box to the TV it did not experience the same network connection issues so I can only assume the issue is with the TV.  .

Reviews.Title: TV fine; Smart TV portion needs a lot of work
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is decent, picture clear, easy to set up; the problem is the web browser's interface and functionality.  Using the web browser is slow and cumbersome with  Samsung's included remote.  Apparently, you can hook up a wireless mouse and keyboard for easier navigation but there's another $100 to throw at the problem.  You also can't effectively watch video from websites on the browser.  So Samsung fibbed a bit in the product description when they said this TV has "all the benefits of web browsing".  Wrong.  The wi-fi also seems a little sketchy as the TV is only piece of equipment currently having an issue.So, I haven't decided if I'm returning this TV or not.  If you want full internet usage then hook a PC up to a TV/monitor and save yourself some time, money, and the shrieks of your wife when she realizes she can't watch her Housewives of _____ County shows.Edit -- still have the TV but the clunky "web browser" and severe lack of apps make this a hard tv to love.  Samsung's war against streaming video is still bad, although tv.com plays pretty well, but overall this is not a tv I would recommend to anyone.  It would be better to get a decent "dumb" tv and a Roku 3 and call it a day.  Step up, Samsung, or get out.

Reviews.Title: Five strikes and you are out!
Reviews.Author: E. Heilner
Reviews.Content: I purchased at a local store and I returned it after one week.Strike one: Right out of the box the stand couldn't hold the Tv level. It leaned about 1/4 inch to the right. No big deal, just a little shim and back to setting up the Tv.Strike two: Some flash lighting in the top left corner when watching dark scenes. I can still live with the set.Strike three: The screen would bloom when a light object were on a dark background. meaning the light area would bleed into the darker areas. Now I am considering returning it.Strike four: You can't turn off the TVs micro dimming.  Watching The Walking Dead is unbearable. The Tv would artificially dim the screen at all the wrong times in an attempt to make blacks black.Strike five: Some graphics would shimmer unless you turned on game mode. The Spike Tv logo kept vibrating.The set did look beautiful when you watched bright scenes and animation, but it has too many negatives to keep.

Reviews.Title: fantastic quality and value
Reviews.Author: Eapen S Mathew
Reviews.Content: image - easy to tweak to your environment. I often adjust it based on the ambient light. Like any other TV, it's unlikely that out of the box the factory settings will suit your space (unless you get v lucky) - so long as you take the 3 minutes to titrate the settings and optimize them, it will be good. This is the most customer-dependent aspect of the television. Some people pay a technician to do this for them, but if their television is in a room with changing light (anything but a home theater room) the image settings will not adjust to the changing ambient light - so just learn how to be a do-it-yourself person for image.interface - easy to use with samsung remote. I'm able to tweak settings as well as most smart features / apps (see smart tv feature section) easily; the remote control works reasonably with my cable box as well.rear panel - well organized for minimal clutter of cables.smart tv features - Most customers looking at purchasing a smart TV should ask whether it is worth the premium to have in-built smart features or if they should purchase a non-smart TV and use the premium to purchase a Roku, chromecast, or equivalent device. For me the roughly $175 premium I was paying for smart features was worth the price because a good Roku costs just as much, and while a ChromeCast is only $35 it does not stream every service I would want to use. It was quick and easy to apply my Netflix, Pandora, and HboGo settings to the TV.audio - the speakers of the TV are slightly above average. Passable, not great. I got a Samsung 2.1 soundbar system which is easy to use through the TV interface.Internet connectivity - I did not try to use WiFi since a router is directly behind my television. Just used ethernet cable to connect directly to router, and I did not have to input any settings and passwords - it auto connected. Other reviews and the couple people I have spoken to are generally positive about the WiFi setup process.Overall, solid purchase, and I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: TURN OFF Auto Motion (in Picture Setting)
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: If you don't want the latest Terence Malick movie to look like a soap-opera, you need to turn this function OFF.http://www.gq.com/blogs/the-feed/2013/05/why-does-my-new-tv-make-movies-look-like-soap-operas.htmlI would have given it five stars if the Netflix App worked on our Home Ent speakers - until Netflix fixes this, it won't work on your speakers, just thru the TV.That said, the TV is beautiful and once Auto Motion is turned off, it looks great.  Set-up is easy and tech support is extremely helpful.

Reviews.Title: "Off-Angle" Viewing
Reviews.Author: Charlie Kocis
Reviews.Content: Took delivery of a 65F6300 on May 9. It was a replacement for a Samsung DLP from 2007 that had bad capacitors/power boards that was covered under a Class Action Lawsuit settlement. I used the free REC709 calibration disc available at AVSForums. I'm not going to comment on the "Smart" aspect other than it all seems relatively fluid. Never going to use the internal speakers. Picture quality is good considering that it is the entry level for 60 inch and up range. Now onto the bad news. I received a panel code "MS01", which means my LCD screen wasn't made by Samsung but most likely AU Optronics. What that means is that I have higher black levels and a narrower viewing angle. I sit 87 inches back from a 65 inch tv and I get screen fade/wash on either side when I'm directly in front of it. I called Samsung voicing my concern and was assured that "all panels are made by Samsung". Do a search for "samsung lcd panel lottery" and you'll read otherwise. I was also told that for the reduced price I paid ($950) I should just be happy. If you decide to go with ANY Samsung LCD make sure you can check to panel code before you buy!!!

Reviews.Title: nice but doesn't work
Reviews.Author: J. Merritt "YEAH"
Reviews.Content: Great tv, really. The smart part doesn't work though. There is a samsung group of apps that they make for this thing. The Netflix and vudu apps don't work at all. I have had the samsung tech over to the house - sent by customer service. He says that the TV is too new and is not supported yet. I waited for an update to come out - this after updating the tv already new out of the box. Now that it still doenst work, I have to get an apple tv. I don't want an apple tv because it doesn't work with amazon prime. .... but this TV doesn't work. Samsung doesn't know why, and Netflix doesn't either. I am sure I am not the only one. It sucks!

Reviews.Title: A Dumb Samsung Smart TV From Amazon
Reviews.Author: No Trump "bridge bum"
Reviews.Content: December 16, 2013 - little more than 4 months since the tv was purchased from Amazon.com August 14, 2013 - this Samsung Smart tv died:  no picture, no sound.  Khadjidah (Samsung rep) advised that someone would get in touch within 1-2 business days. 2 days later: "Thank you for contacting Samsung Support." email.  This morning a Samsung email implied that I haven't checked my email and that I should contact a company that has one bad service review (no other reviews).  This 4-month-old dead tv replaced a 30-year-old RCA tv/vcr combo that never needed any repair and is still working in my niece's bedroom.  The latest: I contacted Amazon re this dead tv, their rep assured me a replacement will be delivered Monday, Dec. 23rd, and now my fingers are crossed that all will go well.

Reviews.Title: TV Good / Smart TV Bad
Reviews.Author: Bryce Nesbitt "bryce2"
Reviews.Content: The video quality and movie playback are great.But don't buy this for the SmartTV features.  They feel sort of loosely 'glued on' to the TV, they are very slow, buggy, and often don't really make any sense.  It is tedious to enter movie titles using the included remote and even if this model was compatible with  Samsung's own keyboard, it would not matter as most apps don't support any keyboard.  The web browser is unusably slow.Get this TV if you care about resolution and video quality, but budget an extra $100 for a Roku 3 or equivalent.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Good Price, Smart Features Fall Short
Reviews.Author: D. Nascimbeni
Reviews.Content: This is the second Samsung TV that I've purchased in the past five years. I purchased the 55" version of this baby because going up to the 65" was roughly 1.5 times the cost and just didn't seem worth it (after a side-by-side comparison). After having this TV for a couple days, and playing around with the features, here are my thoughts:- smart features need some work (every other time Netflix or Amazon hiccups when initializing)- great picture- very light so moving is easy without a second person- very easy to get setup- ID extender is nice and works well so that I can use a single remote- all the external connectors work well- good sounding internal speakersUltimately, Samsung makes a beautiful looking TV, big enough for most rooms, for a good price. This is the TV to buy if you are waiting on those 4K TVs to come down in price (and content to become available). It will hold you over for the next couple years. However, make sure to factor in the need for an AppleTV or Chromecast for all the web stuff as the "smart" features of this TV fall short.

Reviews.Title: Missing parts
Reviews.Author: Moi
Reviews.Content: It arrived missing the screws required to attach it to the regular TV stand. Talking with Samsung customer service was a nightmare. Would have returned it if not was too large for me to take to the UPS store by myself.Eventually had to buy the screws from Samsung, what a ripoff.

Reviews.Title: Manufacturing defects plus poor Samsung customer service
Reviews.Author: rudeWookie
Reviews.Content: I can't really review the tv itself since I never actually got to turn it on. When I received it I attempted to assemble the stand and mount the tv on it.  But I found that where the the two pieces of the stand mate together the screw holes were unthreaded.  I tried to apply more force, thinking maybe the screws were self tapping, but it just wouldn't go in.I called Samsung support and they didn't seem to know anything about it and suggested I call amazon for resolution.  Amazon set up the return and sent me a replacement.  When I got the second tv, same problem.  I did a live chat online with Samsung and the rep was clueless and suggested it might be a manufacturing defect and that I should go to the website and figure out how to submit a service request.Since this was supposed to be a Christmas gift and I didn't want to drag it out any more I am sending it back for a refund.The manufacturing defects combined with poor Samsung customer support add up to one star.  Credit to amazon for facilitating the replacement and return/refund.

Reviews.Title: Samsung  tv
Reviews.Author: angelcrystal
Reviews.Content: Excellent tv, although I haven't yet figured out everything that it can do.  It could include more complete instructions to suit me.

Reviews.Title: Great TV after you adjust settings
Reviews.Author: Eddie K
Reviews.Content: I really love this TV.  I bought the 50" TV to replace my 42" Samsung Plasma TV.  I had a Roku player to stream Netflix and other services, but with this TV you don't need it anymore.  One less equipment to have.  The SmartHub is awesome.  It's really fast and the wireless connection is good - helps if you have a really good wireless router such as the ASUS RT-N66U.  When I first turned on the TV and started to watch some HD channels, the picture was something - felt like I was watching a soap opera.  Felt like you were watching them act in front of you.  I had to change some settings.  I turned off the auto motion plus and the Dynamic contrast.  I also changed it to Warm 2.  After that, picture was great.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: George Skulas "Hard to Please"
Reviews.Content: East to set-up.  Great picture - so clear it still amazes me.  Had to call Samsung during the set-up and they took control of the TV and made the changes necessary and also gave me a tutorial - while a real person was talking to me on the phone.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: JGtz
Reviews.Content: This TV is fantastic. I use it with my Xbox One and for streaming TV using Netflix, Hulu, Crackle, and Amazon Video. The Apps on the Samsung TV are actually updated with a user interface that rivals that of the Xbox app.The picture is great, nice black saturation. Excellent for gaming (Although Game mode is a must for gaming, the response lag on Battlefield from playing on normal to game mode is significant). Motion lag from high action shots is non existent on blu rays and internet streamed sports (Xbox ESPN app).TV startup time is very fast (about 3 seconds). Although the Apps startup time from cold-boot could be improved (Netflix takes about 15-20 seconds to startup if I immediately press the Netflix button after powering it on).DLNA support is great for streaming any video files (Even my .mkv Top Gear Torrents play flawlessly) or audio.Wifi is very good too. It picks up the 5GHz band of my router as well as my laptop's wireless card and Xbox One do at the same distance.Overall I'm very pleased with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Not Perfect
Reviews.Author: James Warne
Reviews.Content: There are many other reviews so I'll try not to rehash what others have already said.While I do love this TV, there are a few reasons why this isn't a 5-star product:1. I wish I had known prior to purchasing, but this TV cannot output 5.1 surround sound via the SPDIF/TOSLINK optical audio out connection when the signal originates from HDMI.  What does this mean?  It means that if you have an older AV receiver like I do, you don't have enough HDMI inputs, and you'll connect all your devices to the TV first, then run an audio cable from the TV to the receiver.  When connecting this way, anything that is connected via HDMI will output in 2 channel stereo only.  So your cable/satellite box, PS4, Xbox or Blu-Ray player will be in stereo and not 5.1.  However anything originating on the TV, for example Netflix, Hulu, etc, can output in 5.1 surround.2. The colors of this set are washed out when viewing off-angle.  Sitting directly in front of it is fantastic, but there is noticeable degradation of color saturation when you're viewing from the sides.3. While the smart hub is a nice feature, it's still somewhat lacking.  Apps are little slow to respond and menus lag, probably due to the CPU being under-powered.  The 'recommended' apps are locked and cannot be uninstalled or moved.  Missing some apps that would be nice like Google Music.

Reviews.Title: I'm sure its a great item, but didnt get to experience that
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: Amazon shipped a defective TV but were out of stock so a replacement TV wasn't an option.Consumer advice: If you opt to have SAMSUNG replace the TV they have an annoying rule that 3 service calls have to be made with a technician to visit your home and report 3 times BEFORE the TV is replace. Just something to think about before buying. Had to return this item and get a refund.

Reviews.Title: Good size for the Bedroom
Reviews.Author: M. Damba
Reviews.Content: Got this about a week ago and we're loving it. We had a 32' 720p and this is much better, with some nice features. I went with the Smart because of Amazon Prime and a few other apps, plus it makes updating a lot easier. Also got it because of the 120hz for gaming but didn't want to burn my pocket with going higher like 240hz. I'm not going to into the tech side cause there are always those that likes to post that kind of stuff and really, if you wanted tech stuff, you can look elsewhere online to do such things.All in all, its a good bedroom or "other than living room" kind of tv

Reviews.Title: Six weeks old and I have no picture
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on 21 january and today, March 9, I have NO picture. Nada.  It was working fine. I turned it off and when I turned it back on, there was nothing but sound.Because it's been six weeks since I purchased it, I can no longer request an exchange rom Amazon and have to hope Samsung does the right thing. At six weeks, I am guessing I have a lemon.  I am not hopeful for the future of this television.

Reviews.Title: un40f6300 smart LED
Reviews.Author: Kyle K. Paul
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for blackfriday last year (2013) got it within 1 week and I loved it.I signed up for Netflix and started to enjoy the smart tv features even more until my TV started to Power Cycle over and over again.I've read numerous amounts of threads and forums and would like to know how could something that is claimed to be new have such a bad fault in its manufacturing.It says its new bout it seems refurbished, I am really disappointed and seeing as I live in the Caribbean I cannot return it and reclaim my money back.Does anyone have the same issue and what did they do to fix this problem>?

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV turns off every 2 minutes & now is not turning on
Reviews.Author: Eunice Lobo Romero
Reviews.Content: For some reason this TV I purchase turns of every 2 minutes and now is not turning on. I definetly don't suggest to buy it!

Reviews.Title: very nice tv
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Wasn't real sure what to expect, but now that I have had this tv for a couple months I am very happy with the it.

Reviews.Title: Good TV ... Good value for money
Reviews.Author: NITIN SAINI "NILA TINKA"
Reviews.Content: The TV worked as intended but at times the apps are slow. Otherwise TV is awesome! Good value for money

Reviews.Title: samsung un46f6300 46 inch
Reviews.Author: B. Scheib
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the price.  Package arrived well secured and in working order.The native 120hz looks way better than a native 60hz.  Be aware that with tvs claiming that they are 120hz or more. Make sure you go by the native hz because Samsung and all other brands claim that when their tvs are 240hz with their clear view or whatever their company term is concerning hz levels ALWAYS go by native hz never go by their added hz.If your tv is 36" and above, alway go with native 120hz or more.  I'm an avid american football fan so I need 120hz or better due to the quick camera panning concerning movement.

Reviews.Title: This tv is incredible.
Reviews.Author: catbacker23
Reviews.Content: I have been using this tv for about 3 weeks now, and I am absolutely in love with it. My brother-in-law has an older Samsung with a 240 hz refresh rate and I always thought it looked "soapy". Not this tv. This thing looks clear as day and I'm happy everytime I watch sports or anything else on it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40F6300 TV
Reviews.Author: Martin Levy
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is amazing.  It mounted on the wall of the room intended, and that room is 14X14.  Perfect size, internet available, great choice.

Reviews.Title: it's the top
Reviews.Author: gilpo
Reviews.Content: Just plain top of the line!!! Everything is top of the line, if all you require is a 40" tv this one will do the job very well.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Patch1077
Reviews.Content: Bought this and had it delivered.  White glove service was fantastic at no extra charge since I am a Prime member.  I ended up exchanging it for the 50" as it was just a bit too big for the room.  Great picture quality.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: carl contadini
Reviews.Content: the TV is easy to set up, everything comes in the box and you within 10 minutes you are up and running.

Reviews.Title: Not a very smart TV
Reviews.Author: CocoSF
Reviews.Content: In the absence of an HD subscription, you are faced with constantly changing the aspect ratio, which can be 8-10 steps -- why it is not one step is beyond me.  Navigation to other functions can be similarly frustrating.  The remote is not well laid out or intuitive.  Ditto internet and "smart" features.  TV is fine, as is the price, but even though I have not seen a Sharp or Sony, I'm pretty sure they are better.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for it's size
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: So far there has been no problems to note.  My old JVC lasted over 23 years and I expect the same with the new one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Mark Levine
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth Samsung and is my best one yet. The picture quality is exceptional and lives up to all expectations.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Robert K. Howell
Reviews.Content: Great tv ,  it does every thing you want ,  remote a little awkward  but  useable ,  good deal for the price

Reviews.Title: The Best
Reviews.Author: BigLou35 "BigLou35"
Reviews.Content: I own Sony and LG tv's but this Samsung has a better picture quality and the smart function is real nice to have. I own a ROKU and stream to my other tv's but with the Samsung which I hung in my bedroom eliminates the need for a ROKU and the Additional wires. Also I find the Samsung streams faster then my ROKU (1ST generation)

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: tom h ficquette
Reviews.Content: Our LCD TV light bulb just stopped working and we had to purchase another TV.  We have had other Samsung products so we decided to try this Slim Smart LED HDTV.  We have been pleasantly surprised by the quality of the picture it provides.  We enjoy the design of the TV.  We have been told that the LCD HDTVs should not have the same problem with the internal light bulb in the TV vs the LCD bulbs. We will have to see but we are enjoying the quality of this unit.  It came well packed when it was shipped to us.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, but it lags a bit
Reviews.Author: Christy C
Reviews.Content: I am in love with my TV but after I did a software update on the TV, I noticed that it lags a bit.Absolutely love the look of the TV and the color, resolution, etc... just amazing! The switches on Smart Hub can be a bit faster, or again, it would be great if it doesnt lag...

Reviews.Title: good TV, but a bit slow and expensive
Reviews.Author: LKT
Reviews.Content: I bought this Samsung Smart TV for about 3 months now. Everything works great.However, it is sometime really slow. For example, when I choose Youtube app, it sometimes restarts itself or takes a while to launch.

Reviews.Title: Does Great
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Virtually no flashlighting, good stand, and slim.  It's kind of heavy, but I think that's to be expected.  Picture quality is great, though the backlight auto-dimmer is finicky sometimes (it will over-dim sometimes during black screens, like the loading of apps), but it usually ends up at a good level.  I found the increased FPS to detract from the viewing experience, so I ended up turning it off entirely.  I haven't found a proper sleep mode yet.The apps are good: you can get the major ones like Youtube, Plex, Netflix, Amazon, & Hulu and a lot of smaller ones like TED Talks.  The remote has a button that will backlight most of the buttons for a few seconds, but only after a button is pressed (and pressing the button to toggle the lighting does not trigger this).  It's a nice idea, but rather impractical because you can't turn on the lighting without already having to press a button.The TV is a little sluggish loading apps, but loads Plex content significantly faster than my Roku 3 (Netflix is about the same).  I found the windows media server feature to be rather poor (slow, hard to navigate, and unable to play some of the files that it could play if a HDD was directly connected).  Plex solves most of that shortcoming.Some of the apps are a little unresponsive because they hang while waiting for certain processing events.  The primary UI itself can be annoying since it takes a few seconds to fully load, so if you start navigating too soon you can end up navigating the wrong way.OTA auto-programming takes longer than my cheap, dumb TV for whatever reason, but you won't do it often so it hardly matters.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Samsung 60in. TV!
Reviews.Author: iKill4FUN! ":+)"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Samsung flat screen panel and my biggest, 60 inches.  With the mixed reviews and not knowing how the un60f6300 would look, I was skeptical about purchasing this tv.  HOwever, as I needed a new tv and wanted to upgrade anyway I went with this because of the great mid price range.  Upon hooking up the tv I noticed that the initial default display configuration was a bit too dark.  However, once I modified the display to 6500k by using the Samsung ES6500 Expert Picture Settings Calibration, the display is just stunning.  As others have mentioned in previous posts, the sound is so-so, but I don't play on using the stock speakers much as I will be hooking it up to my Onkyo receiver with 7.1 surround sound. I haven't used the Smart Tv functionality much yet but it does appear to have a vast amount of applications + an actual samsung app store where you can get additional added apps.  Wifi is extremely quick and there have been zero disconnects for me, in contrast to the aforementioned posts. I'd suggest upgrading the firmware to the upgraded firmware version, 1104.3, if you are having wifi disconnects as this firmware supposedly has a wifi fix.  Also, I'd suggest getting faster internet and a better router if you are getting disconnected (I am running 50mpbs comcast internet service w an asus n66u wireless router).  So far so good, knock on wood.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Smart TV
Reviews.Author: C. Addington
Reviews.Content: Wonderful is the first word that comes to mind. Easy set up and it took no time at all to sync my Amazon Prime to the TV so I don't even have to have the Kindle plugged in. A great value for the $$ and the perfect size for our needs.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: BobB
Reviews.Content: I'm very glad I bought this TV. Picture quality is great and it was easy to setup. Except for Netflix and Amazon, I haven't used the apps too much. Streaming movies works great on this TV. I have used the browser a little and it works well even though typing with the remote is a bit awkward. You will not be disappointed with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great picture right out of the box!
Reviews.Author: Bobby Middleton
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with the color and sharpness/resolution of the set right out of the box. I did adjust the contrast down from 100 to 75, but that's the only factory setting I changed. Easy set-up. The picture is several steps above my first 60" HDTV which I've had for 9 years. The set deserves its high ratings.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Support sucks
Reviews.Author: srinivasula nandimandalam
Reviews.Content: I paid around $1200 with the hopes of enjoying . less than 6 months into it the display stopped working , Had to call customer service.They made me go through hell and finally after a week sent a technician home.Technician came and said the part that is not working is not available and he has to get it from SAMSUNG and left. There was no response for a week , I had to call them again , now comes the surprise news that the damaged part is not available and they will create a new Exchange order.its been 3 weeks since they created the order and still no response.Funny thing after approval it will take 12 business days to replace the TV.I do not recommend this product to any one due to the pain I am going through with the customer service

Reviews.Title: love the picture
Reviews.Author: Michael K.
Reviews.Content: i use this one for surveillane sys and work stations great for viewing video thru the HDMI port will be buying more

Reviews.Title: Don't buy a refurbished TV from Samsung
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV as a refurbished unit. I'm not sure what was originally wrong with it, but TV pretty much did not work right out of the box. It seems to have some kind of power supply issue because after 5 minutes of use the TV automatically shuts down and then tries to power on again only to trip off again after a few seconds. It continues this hiccuping until you pull the plug. I have opened a warranty ticket with Samsung several times but each time they ignore the problem and refer us to the troubleshooting guide. Samsung technical service is the worst I've ever seen. I guess my only recourse is to return the TV for refund. To bad, the picture for the 5 minutes we can view at a time is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture but broke in 5 months
Reviews.Author: Scotti13 "homeowner president"
Reviews.Content: Board had to be replaced just 5 months later. Samsung paid for service guy to come out. Easy fix but repair guy said lots of Samsung product is breaking, not reliable.

Reviews.Title: Pristine Condition
Reviews.Author: Chief Tech
Reviews.Content: This TV was bought "used".  As stated in the description the TV came in "pristine condition" in its original packaging, just the shipping box had been changed.  The manual and extra parts were all in the box. I took a risk as I had never bought anything used from Amazon and the TV is perfect, undamaged, and I saved lots of $$$$$.

Reviews.Title: An Outstanding Television
Reviews.Author: Mylgon
Reviews.Content: After owning a 32" Dell flat screen for nearly a decade, it was seriously time for an upgrade. I had absolutely no interest in 3D capabilities but did want to enter the smart TV age. After months of research and waiting for a price break during the holiday, I committed to Samsung's UN55F6300 and could not be any more satisfied.Upon delivery, the television was inspected and found to have arrived in factory condition. The only bit of assembly required was installing the base to the monitor and that, in itself, was super simple.When I turned it on, I went through the steps required to setup today's smart TV functions and, I must say, Samsung has done a great job creating a user interface that is easy to use understand and even easier to use. Within minutes, I was enjoying some high definition programming in absolutely stunning picture!The television, in its own right, is very sleek. The bezel is thin with a nice tint that gives the picture a good border that is none-too-large. The stand provides the ability to rotate the horizontal angle of the screen and provides a study base that does not feel flimsy at all.Samsung's smart TV interface has been widely recognized as one of the best in the industry and provides quick access to various applications which turn this television into an even greater entertainment experience - none of which do you have to ever use or interact with if you do not desire.For picture quality, I did a simple search on the internet to find adjustment settings that have been recommended by professionals who have the equipment to properly fine tune a television. Making the adjustments correlate with the suggested settings was a breeze and, in my opinion, really did enhance the viewing quality. For gamers, the 'game' setting can be set for a specific input source and will maintain that setting with no need to repeatedly flip back and forth when you switch between TV and gaming. That is: all settings correspond to the input source you have selected, providing the opportunity to create an array of picture settings, depending on the input device you are using.The remote - although it lacks the neat stylis-like feature of the more expensive models - does what you need it to do. Unfortunately, the backlighting for the button could be brighter; but, when your eyes are glued to the beauty of the television screen, the dim yellow hue of the remote is the last thing you will be thinking about. Quick access to Netflix and Amazon on demand features allows you to access your video libraries at the click of a button.The Wi-Fi receiver for this television seems to operate wonderfully. My television is downstairs in a partially underground, spit-level home while my wireless router resides upstairs - the television picks up on the signal and maintains a connection without any troubles.While I wish there was an older RCA input for this television, there is an adequate amount of HDMIs and one component input for an assortment of DVD/Blu-ray, video gaming and other devices.Although I did test sound through the onboard speakers to ensure they worked, I did not spend much time evaluating their quality before hooking up my sound system. Sound through the digital output is crisp, clean and in sync with the picture.Overall, I am thoroughly impressed with this television and have expectations that it will last many, many years in our household. With the Samsung name, I have come expect quality and this set fulfills all of those expectations and then some.If you are in the market for a television, have no need for 3D features, and do not wish to sacrifice picture quality at the expense of a smaller price tag, I encourage you to consider this television and to take advantage of Amazon's excellent delivery service.

Reviews.Title: Buzzing, faulty TV with terrible service
Reviews.Author: Home Theater Enthusiast
Reviews.Content: I bought this Samsung TV to replace a another Samsung TV that was less than two years old before it started failing. Despite this, at the time I still thought pretty highly of Samsung, and I thought I might have just got a rare lemon. I bought this TV to replace it, but immediately noticed it buzzed and hummed constantly.  It got louder as I increased the backlight brightness, and at full brightness it can be heard on the opposite side of the room. Selecting "cinema" for viewing mode made it even worse.I contacted Samsung support, who directed me to a 3rd party repair shop. This ended up being a disaster as they just plugged it in their back room office and watched sports on it for 2 weeks, never calling to even give me an update (had I not called them I might've not heard from them). When I got it back the settings were right where I left them, no one tried to turn up the backlight to maximum or enable Cinema mode to replicate.The whole experience was terrible, between the two faulty TVs, poor service and outsourced 3rd party repairs. I will never buy Samsung again.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this TV and not from this seller.!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amit
Reviews.Content: Dont buy this TV. the Samsung UN46F6300 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz Slim Smart LED HDTV. I purchased this TV in Dec 2013 and it worked well for 5 months. It started re-starting every few days but we ignored it thinking this is non issue. But last week it started re-starting every 2 hours and now it restarts every 3 seconds. It is now unusable. if you google, you will find lot of similar complaints and this problem is not resolved by Samsung. The service is very poor. They are rude and do not entertain your request. They ask you to troubleshoot and perform some steps and commit that they will call back. They never do. If your service request is logged, they do not show up. My service request was assigned after 5 days and I got a call from customer service they cannot make it until late next week and I should contact Samsung to reassign the service center. I am frustrated. Samsung said they will not replace the TV.I purchased it from Amazon - seller tigerdirect. They did not respond to my request.Please dont buy samsung smart TV. My TV is still warranty and it is service warranty they will not refund or exchange the TV even if it is in warranty.

Reviews.Title: This is really awesome TV....
Reviews.Author: Sunghui Chun
Reviews.Content: First of all, the price was so so so good for me. And  the quality of TV  is very satisfying.  With this 60 inch Smart TV, I can watch whatever I want to see like movies from my laptop or my Gallaxy smart phone wireless. The awesome smart functions are easily understandable and manageable with one remote control. It `s really difficult to describe all the new functions with technical terminology but each time I try new function, I`m being excited.I really hope the 2014 worldcup season will come soon with this gorgeous TV. It deserves it.

Reviews.Title: Picture Quality-Great; 'Smart' Quality-Terrible
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: If you're just using this TV for the picture, then by all means, have at it. If you want this TV for the picture and the 'Smart' aspect of it....I would think twice. The quality of the applications on this TV are pretty horrid. Not sure if this is Samsung's fault, or if it's just some third party developer, so I'll give Samsung the benefit of the doubt.Outside of the apps themselves the Smart 'hub' is pretty poorly designed. After turning on the TV the Smart application won't be able to launch for quite a while. I know this TV isn't a supercomputer or anything, but there's definitely quite the delay on startup that could sometimes become aggravating.Secondly, the updating system for the Smart application is probably the worst part about this TV . There have been many times where the TV does not respond to ANY button presses because it is updating. The light on the television responds to the remote presses but absolutely nothing will happen with the tv...even if you press the power button, nothing will happen. I believe that it is this updating that is causing this because the only time this happens is when the smart application has to update (which is a lot, unfortunately). I'm not sure if this ties up the hard drive or what, but when the TV is updating, everything slows to a halt. I timed it, and while it was updating I pressed the 'Source' button on the remote, and the source menu took about 10 seconds until it showed...and then I couldn't switch inputs because that was taking forever too.All in all, if I could return this TV, I would. If you REALLY want this TV as well as the ability to use apps, I would suggest getting a non-'smart' version with USB/HDMI input and get a Roku or something similar. Otherwise you're going to have a hell of a time getting this TV to work properly.Some additional info on the apps' issues (didn't take off stars for these, just reporting the problem for future buyers), I have full bars for 5GHz and 2.4GHz during these issues, tried both frequencies, and have tried with QoS on/off on my router as well: Netflix app sound randomly cuts out. Does it intermittently, but enough to where it is quite noticeable and can leave out important dialogue. The YouTube application is pretty horrendous, you will watch a video, and then out of nowhere the video will get stuck at a part but the audio will keep playing...almost as if it is buffering, but clearly it's not as the audio is still playing with the timer on the interface.All in all I think that it definitely has the potential to be a great 'Smart' TV, but falls short due to the poor design of the entire 'Smart' system. As stated earlier, I would suggest getting a 'dumb' version of this TV, and then use something like a Roku box or Chromecast for your 'Smart' needs.TL;DR-The quality of the picture is awesome, but the 'Smart' application has too many problems. So many that it (in my opinion) carries over and affects the regular television operation. Get a dumb version of this TV with usb/hdmi and get some sort of streaming device (Roku/Amazon Fire/Chromecast) that is much more reliable than the Smart application.

Reviews.Title: Best Purchase I've made in the last 2 years
Reviews.Author: War_Eagle1983
Reviews.Content: This TV is incredible. Everything about it, I love. I've never had a smart tv before but now I cant go back. Great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: PASCAL NGUYEN
Reviews.Content: Happy so far. Amazon should have more deals like this on HDTVs. I need to buy another one for my other room

Reviews.Title: Samsung service excellent
Reviews.Author: AY
Reviews.Content: I love the TV.  There are plenty of reviews concerning the picture, etc.  I have a Google TV in the same room as the Samsung.  I prefer the later for main viewing.  I had a repair issue.  The TV would turn off during a movie -- on internet or cable TV.  It would then re-cycle back on.  It would happen once in 2 or 3 weeks.  Finally it became a "every day" issue and I called Samsung.  I was helped professionally throughout the procedure.  I had a phone discussion, and after 3 minutes, she scheduled a tech visit.  It took 3 days, but the tech was very busy,  and very nice and professional.  He was here 90 minutes and replaced the mother board.There were none of the problems people discuss on this forum.  Samsung has the TV and service to earn "best" for me.  I would place 2 in a room if the remotes could be programmed on a different IR frequency.  That's why I have a Google TV and a Samsung.  I like both.  I prefer Samsung.AY

Reviews.Title: TV is great but delivery guy showed up by himself
Reviews.Author: Jack D. Anderson
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the picture and TV features so far (only been a few weeks) we looked at the show room tVs several times with the salesmen telling us there was this big difference between 120 and 240 refresh rate and we really could not appreciate the faster refresh rate for the money so we are quite satisfied with this TV.  It has an excellent picture and user friendly rating is high.

Reviews.Title: TV Fail
Reviews.Author: Cesar L.
Reviews.Content: The TV restarts and sometimes just does often, have applied the latest firmware update, the trouble is that I am in Venezuela, and here is no guarantee the team.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: The Samsung UN55F6300 has a stunning picture and great sound for speakers incorporated into it's slim design.Amazon shipping and setup was excellent and I would recommend this Samsung model. I should note that original TV had an issue and needed to be returned.Amazon was great to work with and second TV of same model has performed flawlessly so far.

Reviews.Title: got Tv
Reviews.Author: brad davis
Reviews.Content: great TV - looks great on  the  wall -  great clarity -  sound is  good as well -  probably should have gotten  the next size  bigger - next time i guess...

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: JB
