Reviews.Content: sound has to be turned up really high to be loud. otherwise great tv no complaints otherwise. packaged well so it wont break during shipping.

Reviews.Title: I love this TV. Great picture Amazing value.
Reviews.Author: Dylan Rothman
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. I bought it last black Friday for only $650! What a deal.We have it hooked up to an Mohu Leaf Paper-Thin HD antenna, Chromecast, PS3, Nintendo Wii, and Micca Digital Video player.Everything works great. We mainly watch Netflix and Youtube through the Chomecast. I love how the TV automatically switches to the correct input when I cast the video (smart TV feature).I used the collaboration settings mentioned in a previous review and the picture looks great! It blows away some brands like Insignia, LG, Toshiba, etc...Having said that I have seen some 2-3k Samsung sets look better. But for the money, this TV is an amazing value.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Chao Vang
Reviews.Content: Samsung makes one of the best looking TV's out there. It looks amazing. I have a 3D version and the picture does look a bit better than this one, but this one is pretty good. Only thing is that the controller is a U shape and wobbles back and forth when trying to press the buttons while it is on a table.The up and down volume had a annoying clicking noise that comes out the TV speakers, but you can turn it off under System-General. Other than that this TV is great.

Reviews.Title: Awesome. Awesome. Awesome.
Reviews.Author: Melissa Long
Reviews.Content: I previously purchased my Toshisha TV on Amazon & was a bit skeptical getting a TV shipped to me. But since I had absolutely no problem with mine I set on buying another one.I purchased this as a Christmas present for my dad (2013) to upgrade him from an old first generation plasma TV. I loved the "Smart" feature of this because he loves watching Netflix. So, no more having to hook up his laptop the tv and lose quality. The quality is absolutely great, sound is great, absolutely no complaints. You can connect the TV to WiFi to watch Netflix, Hulu, and several other streaming services. I'm sure the TV offers more, but for my dad, who is not tech-savy at all, it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Problems with wi-fi
Reviews.Author: Florin
Reviews.Content: While I like it overall, it has a known problem with wi-fi that causes Netflix and other apps that use internet to stop working randomly.I upgraded the firmware several times, so far no fix.Seems like the latest firmware (v 1200) addresses this problem, but so far I did not test this.UPDATE: the issue is still not fixed. It got disconnected 3 times in about 2 hours.Might be also an issue with my Motorola SGB6580 gateway, since somehow when the TV loses the wireless signal, so do all other devices in the house (cable works fine). But somehow this ONLY happens when I watch Netfix on the TV.I'm thinking of buying a Roku/FireTV in order to really be a ble to watch a movie end-to-end.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!  So-so speakers.
Reviews.Author: Mark Albro
Reviews.Content: HD channels play amazingly on this TV.  My sole gripe is that the volume is horrible when streaming movies via Amazon in the Smart TV functions.  Wifi was a breeze to setup and the Smart TV apps were easily programmable.

Reviews.Title: My Whole Life
Reviews.Author: Fattyeggroll
Reviews.Content: My whole life I have loved Samsung TVs, but could never afford one. My TV previous to this was a 32-inch off brand from Costco, so needless to say, the Samsung blows it out of the water. Sometimes it freaks me out when I'm watching HD movies with how real the people look, and for video games it has been amazing. The best part of it the Samsung is that it actually weighs the same as my older 32-inch off brand. It was incredibly easy to mount on the wall by myself. My only complaint is that sometimes the sound is not as good as I would like, but that may have to do with the streaming quality of the shows I watch. I do plan on buying a soundbar for it anyways so that complaint is pretty much null to me.I love the smart features too. I can easily connect to Netflix or Amazon Prime without having to turn on my Xbox 360 so I get to save power while still enjoying streaming content.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: John M. Emler
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV.  Great picture with lots of connection options.  Wall mounted on a Cheetah Dual Arm mounting unit, I get exactly what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV is awesome
Reviews.Author: PONYEXPRESS
Reviews.Content: We have had this now for over a month and just hooked up the wireless to use the smart tv options. The video quality is far superior to our 46 inch tv in the bedroom.This works great for the wife who has MS  to watch Netflix shows in the living room.  I sure wished our other TV was a smart tv  and just maybe we might buy a 2nd of these and replace the 46 inch .We made a very good choice but a 60 inch was tempting

Reviews.Title: Happy with the purchse!
Reviews.Author: mab
Reviews.Content: In general no electronic device will do all the things everyone wants.  Programs are written for the majority.  The app features are nice, the network option is ok (wish it had more controls), and the input options are numerous.  With this type of TV the need for a Radio/Music Device is almost non existent.  Just buy a sound bar or something similar.  It occasionally has an issue with turning on my Fios box, but maybe it is as much the box as the TV.  Happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: So far so good...
Reviews.Author: Timothy Fort
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as an open box item.  Was able to get it setup and configured in a less than 10 minutes.  One thing of note, if you don't have your TV service configured, make sure you don't try to setup the "set top box" or it'll just keep failing.I purchased this TV for 2 reasons: 1 was to eliminate the home theatre computer sitting next to my TV, generating heat and noise and constantly requiring maintenance.  2 was because the Samsung model supported the Plex app to run my home movie/TV show collection.  It hasn't disappointed.The sound leaves a bit to be desired out of the built-in speakers, but that is the least of my concerns as I will most likely add a surround sound unit.  The stand that comes with it leaves a bit to be desired too, rotation angle is limited and the base often moves as you try to adjust the angle, but this is yet again, a minor inconvenience.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN55F6300 55-Inch 1080p 120Hz Slim Smart LED HDTV (2013 Model)
Reviews.Author: Judy M Schrad
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this t.v.  Has all the options we wanted and the picture quality is even better then expected.

Reviews.Title: Everything Worked Out Great
Reviews.Author: Jon Steenweg
Reviews.Content: My purchase through Amazon Warehouse saved me at least $100 and the TV was as good as new in every respect. Once it was out of the box and set up, noone would have any way of knowing the difference. Plus I'm very impressed with the TV. I agonized over the decision, and since I had not purchased a TV in 25 years, I had a lot of catching up to do. Spent a lot of time on line and at big box retailers mining info which I think served me well.

Reviews.Title: TV For Trade Shows
Reviews.Author: T. Hemenway
Reviews.Content: We got this TV for use at trade shows.  The main reason is so that we could make up an MPG movie and put it on a USB drive and then plug that directly into the TV to play movies and slideshows without needing a computer or DVD/Blu Ray Player.  It works great!  It also is thin and looks good.  Picture quality is ok, but we got it for the other features and not to watch movies on ;)

Reviews.Title: picture quality is outstanding
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have several samsung tvs and this one is by far the best.  I did not have to tweak any of the settings, just plugged it in and went through the assisted set up routine and the picture is perfect.  Speakers are horrible, so i would suggest getting a soundbar or receiver, etc.

Reviews.Title: Terrific TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is fantastic - almost 3D.  The Smart features so far work very well and are reasonably user friendly.  We very happy with this purchase.The delivery was excellent.  The driver unpacked the TV and set it up.  Then he tested it to be sure it was functioning properly.  The driver was knowledgeable, friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Worst Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Abdul
Reviews.Content: I bought this Samsung UN46F6300 June of last year. The picture is fine as advertised. Everything seemed to have worked fine until the smart hub stop working. I couldn't connect to the internet and couldn't have anyone from Samsung to assist me in fixing my problem for more than 8 weeks. As I am writing this review, there still hasn't been any help from Samsung. I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone. The reason is, if you have any problem with Samsung product, forget about any assistance from them. Look for a product that a good tech support. Samsung tech support is abysmal.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: James Wisbrock "Wisbrock"
Reviews.Content: What a great TV.  Reliable, easy to setup on your home internet and a wonderful picture.  Everyone who views programs on this TV notes how clear the picture views.  The deal on Amazon was great and allows for you to get way more TV for your dollars. I love that there is a Netflix button on the remote too.  I use for local TV signal and do not have hooked up to a cable or DirecTV provider and looks great.  This TV does not come with an air antenna so you will have to purchase that separately.  If you end up buying an antenna, don't go cheap and you will have a really great picture.

Reviews.Title: Great, but the WiFi doesn't work.
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: Having cut the cord and gotten rid of cable I was hoping to combine this TV's smart features and a Mohu Ultimate Leaf antenna for my viewing needs.  That meant that the built in Wifi was one of the main features I was after, unfortunately it is absolute garbage.  I've had the TV for nine months now and despite many firmware updates in the interim the Wifi cannot remain connected for more than a few minutes.  After losing the connection the TV has to be turned on and off to reconnect.  This makes things like Netflix and Amazon Prime impossible to use.  My Wifi hotspot/router is about 20 feet away in another room and none of my other 20 or so wifi devices have any problem connecting to it.  I can even connect to my Wifi network when I'm across the street at a neighbor's house.  I have tried everything including moving the router, using a high gain antenna, etc. but nothing seems to work.  I've since given up and used an old wired-to-wireless gaming adapter that I had laying around.Having put a band-aid on the network issue I can say that otherwise this TV is pretty good.  The smart features are nice, with the exception that they pre-install a bunch of smart apps that you can't remove and will never use or want.  The available apps that you do want are pretty good and run smoothly.  However, when trying to view streaming video in the web browser the flash player chokes frequently on videos that contain interstitial ads.  Sometimes the video will resume after a while but sometimes you have to reload the page and move to the timestamp after the ad.The picture quality is great but not excellent.  It gets a 4/5 here.One nice bonus is the IR extender that makes setting up the universal remote a breeze for devices that don't support HDMI-CEC.  Unfortunately the IR commands are pretty generic across brands and devices so when turning on my a/v receiver the TV sends the on/off command about 10 times and I can hear the receiver turn on and off repeatedly.  That's definitely not good for the power supply and I'm going to have to find a new solution for that until they add the specific codes for my device to the database and I'm not forced to use the generic brand code.All in all I've had a pretty good experience with this TV but the network issue is a serious thorn in my side.  It's irritating that I have to use a separate device to perform a function that I already paid for with this TV.  If I have the time to deal with it I may try to make a warranty claim, but as I've seen others have difficulty with other Samsung models I have little hope.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Lina
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a gift and it works beautifully, just like all Samsung TVs. It arrived on time and in great condition. No complaints from anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great price - awesome TV with all the bells and whistles
Reviews.Author: KingGraham
Reviews.Content: Great picture, super slim frame, super slim in general, very light, easy to lift and move; Wish it came with the cool Skype camera adapter, but you can buy it separately pretty easy.

Reviews.Title: Still love it
Reviews.Author: lane rigdon
Reviews.Content: I wanted to wait before writting this. Be received the 48" 6300 after the Cyber Monday sales last year. We had bought our last TV 10 years ago (Sony CRT 32") and wanted to make that quantum leap up the TV food chain.From the word go this TV is awesome. First, going from the CRT to this is hard to get around. This impressed right out of the box. We had an idea of what we wanted and knew we wanted to get the most technology we could without the 3D.  We did our research and figured we didn’t need the 3D the 6400 offered but wanted the smart functions. We don’t have Netflix but do have Amazon Prime.I know not all experiences are good out of the box, but ours was. The TV did a software update and it was go time. Don’t bother with any cables other than the HMDI. I did not have one (it did not come until later) and hooked the cable up using the old cables, the difference is striking. Also, I know there are quite a few technophiles on here with video setting tips but we were impressed with the stock settings. I may do some tinkering but I just don’t know if I would care that much.We liked this TV in our bedroom so much we just ordered the 6350 60” (be here tomorrow) for our living room. We have another CRT in there that is about to go to the garage. I hope the 6350 lives up to our expectations. The room is 24/26 so I figure the 60” will be just fine and I just did not want to pay for the 65.The down side…the TV does need a sound bar. We have not bought one because I’m cheap but we will. The dialog can be hard to make out over the music and sound effects. The main speakers seem fine in our bedroom but we strain to hear when people are talking. In the larger living room with a hardwood floor this might be exacerbated. This seems to be a constant theme in the reviews so it just, “is what it is” when you get this TV. We have had infrequent loss on the streaming but I don’t know if that’s my provider or the TV. I will say I have never had to call the help line.We think the TV was worth the money and hope it lasts 10 years like the last two did (does anyone want a set of nice Sony 32” CRTs?)…

Reviews.Title: Great picture, easy set up
Reviews.Author: James Shover
Reviews.Content: Best TV picture I have ever seen.  Very easy to set up. Many ports for connections.  The audio out really simplified and improved my audio system connections.  Netflix and Amazon interfaces are very slick. The Apps function is not as easy to use.  The help functions are also not easy or intuitive.

Reviews.Title: it's very good
Reviews.Author: jangjungin
Reviews.Content: I'm worried about it.but it  Arrived safe to korea.i love it~i think my tv is very good choice than buy from korea.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture
Reviews.Author: Bryan Iatonna
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best purchases I have made in recent years.  The picture on this TV is outstanding! I use it strictly for gaming and Netflix.  I have never had a problem with the "Smart TV" function.  I highly recommend this item to anyone looking for a excellent TV.

Reviews.Title: Way awesome TV
Reviews.Author: A. LIU
Reviews.Content: It's HUGE and super thin/light. I love the new smart features because I can use youtube and amazon instant video on it. Only bad thing is that I don't like using the remote control as a keyboard to search for videos. It takes forever to move around the keyboard with the stupid little arrow buttons.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Susie
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with the picture and sound.  This TV is a good value for the price.  I'd recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Mara M
Reviews.Content: I had a Samsung Smart TV previously which I loved but after 3 years the screen was damaged and it wasn't cost effective to repair.I decided to replace it with yet another Samsung Smart HDTV 2013 model which some people thought it was crazy but I am not sorry I did. I absolutely love this TV in our family room. The screen is 50 inches and the colors are wonderful and vibrant. Love the fact that I can watch Neflix, Amazon etc right within the TV through the smart hub. I am not technically savvy so for me this works great! I have everything I need. I also decided this time to purchase an extended warranty for 4 years just in case anything goes wrong. I would highly recommend this TV, the price was right, it was delivered in two days and it was really easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Rodney J Guyette
Reviews.Content: My perspective on TV pictures and features: My last TV was a DLP rear projection unit. It was manual in every regard and cumbersome. I am giving 5 stars because the TV is excellent in every way. The picture is sharp with great color and sharp contrast. I like that it recognizes a different input when a different input device is turned on and automatically switches to it. My one negative comment: during set up I had to go to a different color setting because the colors were greenish blue. It begs the question. Why isn't the correct color setting preselected before shipment? It was a minor annoyance but an annoyance nonetheless. Overall, it is an excellent TV. Would definitely buy a Samsung again.

Reviews.Title: Best TV
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Holmes
Reviews.Content: This Tv has the best picture ive seen just the right size for my small living room I would recommend this for the aps also

Reviews.Title: good picture but
Reviews.Author: jeffry sanford
Reviews.Content: Good picture but has been somewhat difficult to set up and connect other devices-it certainly not as easy as a Sony.

Reviews.Title: Excellent television
Reviews.Author: Bronxbuyer
Reviews.Content: I love this tv. It looks great in my living room. The sound is not very loud but decent.  I purchased a sound bar for movie and game nights. I would definitely purchase another Sansung tv. Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: seo
Reviews.Content: free voltage power supplyThis device is can change language.first power off.and push button remote control "mute  + 1 + 8 + 2" local setting.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Fogarty
Reviews.Content: On time, great price, works great. Life should always be like this. Very satisfied customer this time around. That is all.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: John Ferraro
Reviews.Content: We've had this TV for approximately three months and it is great.  Picture is clear and bright, and the sound is great as well.  The greatest disappointment with this TV is the control clicker because in order to use the Smart features there is a lot of typing required which is difficult and time consuming with the control provided.  When I went to order the Samsung keyboard and mouse to eliminate this problem, I found out that this TV model does not support a keyboard; only 6400 series and above.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful picture, but had trouble mounting it
Reviews.Author: Mildred D.
Reviews.Content: The mounting holes on the back of this TV are 8mm dia.  However the hole openings on the mounting plate of the furniture I purchased at Amazon are 5mm dia.  Can't tell you how much trouble this caused before I reached the right customer service person at Amazon.  As it was,we had to jury rig a connection from the TV to a wall mount to the furniture mount. It was a lot more trouble than it should have been.  Needless to say Samsung and Bush Furniture ran away from the problem.Did I mention, the TV picture is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Most useful features are all there.
Reviews.Author: Venkat
Reviews.Content: This is a nice TV and quite affordable. I got mine for about 500$ during black friday sale.It has built in WiFi and the most common streaming apps (interface is slow but not terribly slow) like the premium TVs.The USB ports can be used to attach an external hard drive and the media can be played directly. Does not come with the more gimmicky features like 3D (has not taken off), motion sensing, skype camera etc.The semi glossy finish results in blurred and dull reflections and colors that pop, best of both worlds.Picture quality is good (screen uniformity is not spectacular like plasma) and sound quality is fine as well.

Reviews.Title: First experience with smart TV
Reviews.Author: R. L. Burton "R. L. Burton"
Reviews.Content: WONDERFUL.  Great size. Incredible picture.  Fantastic options.  Easy to navigate the "smart options" and back to my cable.  Have discovered Youtube movies and shows displayed in my full 55".  Fun!

Reviews.Title: Don't expect perfect
Reviews.Author: Dong Tran
Reviews.Content: TV overall quality was great. Picture and sound was good. My only problems with this TV was (1) a static noise no matter if I was watching cable or in any of the apps in the smart tv. (2) tv turns on and off by itself every 2-3 seconds and reboots to the Samsung logo.I contacted amazon customer service 30 maintenance they offer me a solution it worked but the tv started to do the problems again. They offered to replace me a new one but it was no longer  in stock so the the other options were a full refund or give me a tv of same quality matching price or lower.I opted out and got my money back. You pay the shipping fee and they reimburse you the money $10. Hoped this helps.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Travis
Reviews.Content: After spending countless hours researching on what TV to buy I finally bit the bullet and decided on this.  I was a bit apprehensive about buying a TV off Amazon and having it shipped to me as I had never done such a thing before.  I had been use to going to a brick and mortar business and driving it home myself.  The shipping process was fantastic and the men who delivered it even put it all together for me.  I am absolutely delighted about this TV.  Have had it for 2 months and have used it to watch a movie almost every single day.  When I have friends over they always remark about how they love the TV as well.  Happy customer!

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN75F6300 75-Inch 1080p 120Hz Slim Smart LED HDTV (2013 Model)
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture, great product, great price, super fast shipping. Extremely happy !! Even my wife, who doesn't really care about televisions, loves this TV !!! She says the picture is amazing !!!

Reviews.Title: SMART TV is an understatement..
Reviews.Author: LT Colon
Reviews.Content: If there is any downside to this unit, it is, what it offers is rather overwhelming. .Excellent features and provides terrific picture. Glad I purchased this unit...

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Abruzzo "Betsy Abruzzo"
Reviews.Content: Crisp, sharp picture and easy to use.  I'm still learning all the options that are included.  Perfect size for the location.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Yong Jun Park
Reviews.Content: Samsung UN55F6300 55-Inch 1080p 120Hz Slim Smart LED HDTV (2013 Model) is goodSamsung UN55F6300 55-Inch 1080p 120Hz Slim Smart LED HDTV (2013 Model) is good

Reviews.Title: I love the Samsung TV.
Reviews.Author: gyeong jong jeon
Reviews.Content: I love the Samsung TV.Quality is good and the design is good and I like it.I want a good price even afterThank you

Reviews.Title: Visual Clarity and Artful Ease
Reviews.Author: Janine Donoho aka J. M. Donoho & Jessie Jayne...
Reviews.Content: Wonderfully crisp images and large enough to see the pixels while making art happen. I mounted this on an Ergotron MX Mounting Arm, which makes it maneuverable for both sitting and standing while working.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the price, little heat production
Reviews.Author: kyle wray
Reviews.Content: The edges, especially the corners seem to be a little darker than the center which isn't too noticeable but you do get some darkened colors/lack of brightness in some places.  For an edge-lit tv this seems kind of silly but I honestly probably only noticed it because I'm using this as a monitor/tv.

Reviews.Title: If you choose this TV, you will not regret it later.
Reviews.Author: CHOI JI WON
Reviews.Content: Great. bigger. comfortable~very nice. If you choose this TV, you will not regret it later. Choose this tv. and than you will be winner.

Reviews.Title: Im happy
Reviews.Author: Rose420
Reviews.Content: Under 600 bucks when got it from Amazon, And everything has worked as advertised. Happy camper here no complaints. It is a nice tv for the money spent.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Tana Gullotta
Reviews.Content: Easy set-up . Nice sound and picture. Amazing technology.Delivered right to my door in a couple of days. Still getting to know all the features this smart tv offers, but am really enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: HDTV  perfect
Reviews.Author: virgo10tx
Reviews.Content: Really enjoying this HDTV smart tv very good picture ,light weight  and it  is perfect in my bedroom. great buy

Reviews.Title: Excellant LED Television
Reviews.Author: Robert J Considine
Reviews.Content: Samsung continues to have the best overall picture and features of all televisions on I've researched in the market place. This model (UN40 F6300) has 3 HDMI inputs and excellent audio for normal viewing such as news and talk shows... pair it up with external speakers for films music video/ concerts programing for a truly breath taking a/v experience.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed
Reviews.Author: adong_h@hotmail.com
Reviews.Content: I was actually really impressed with the picture.  It's just the right size for a small room. All my PS4 games look totally awesome too!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: A. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Great TV but would love more user info than rec'd. Shipping was fast. Love the HD! User booklet would change rating to 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: kim suk youl
Reviews.Content: Samsung UN65F6300 65-Inch 1080p 120Hz Slim Smart LED HDTV (2013 Model)this model very good!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Excellent price-performance ratioRecommend this product

Reviews.Title: Great quality
Reviews.Author: Julio
Reviews.Content: Great image quality when watching sports and fast-paced motion programs, you never get any blurs. The TV is great for gaming and I would absolutely recommend anybody in the market to consider this TV. Easy setup, the delivery man was very generous and set the TV up himself (later I found out that he had to do it but he was nice about it).

Reviews.Title: A great TV but a word of caution
Reviews.Author: Benjamin J. Wimett
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this TV and purchased it from Best Buy about two months ago… My only word of caution is this when you get home the picture will not look the same as it did in the store... I would recommend doing a Google search for picture optimization for this TV. The picture will look way more natural after optimization. Also if you have an Apple TV and iPhone THX makes a phenomenal free app to help you calibrate your TV properly.I don't really care for the Smart TV portion it's a little clunky and I already have a Apple TV PlayStation three and PlayStation  4 that have faster responding apps so I can't really speak to their effectiveness.

Reviews.Title: Underperforming, or overcapable?
Reviews.Author: mmayers
Reviews.Content: I purchased the UNF40F6300 based on its demensions compared to similar Samsung 40" TV's.Overall, this is a decent TV, but the refresh rate tends to create blurs on the bottom of the screen during any viewing of action/sports/sudden movement.  This can be a real pain in the butt, I am still trying to get through the user guide to see if you can lower the refresh rate from 120 Htz to 60, that will resolve that issue.The remote is not very user friendly, and becuase I have a cable box and Blu-Ray attached, there is a tendancy for the TV to "source hop" when cycling power.  It likes to go direct to the cable input, rather than allowing the HDMI cable to control the main TV viewing.Additionally, the audio settings for the Blu-Ray player are very different from the Cable.  I can comfortably listen to any TV Show, cable movie, or sports event with the tv volume at 9.  When playing a Blu-Ray, there is a constant struggle to adjust the volume for speaking, and lower the volume during action scenes.  I have adjusted all sound capability on the Blu-Ray, and even changed input through the many HDMI connections.  Still trying to figure that one out....The picture is clear and crisp, for normal viewing, the Smart features are a definate plus, especially with Netflix and AmazonPrime.  If you are going to use the internet feature, at all, get the wireless keyboard.  The remote is a real pain when searching etc.Additionally, I use Comcast cable, so when using the OnDemand feature, the remote does not have a back button capable of cycling back from the movie information tab to the movie list menu.  instead, you have to go all the way back to standard TV and re-enter the OnDemand menu if you decide you don't want to watch the show.So the question really is:  Is this TV under-performing and counter-intuitive, or does it just do so many other things that they forgot the simple every day features we may take for granted?

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: the TV is very good, meets my expectations in terms of technological applications, I like much the application that allows you to connect to other computers Samsung, such as to view pictures and video from my phone to the TV screen, I note that it has no digital channel selector as other brands have it. It is still very good, I see only this detail

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: snowhite
Reviews.Content: After getting one that had been damaged in shipping ,Amazon was so nice and had it picked up immediatly. and sent the new one out the next day. I just love it ,I'm enjoying all the things I can do on it ...The picture is great an the sound is also playing with it on all that I can ...

Reviews.Title: great HDTV
Reviews.Author: J. Smalley
Reviews.Content: We have been Samsung fans for many years, and this one does not disappoint at all. Really nice, size is perfect for us.  Love the smart tv features, and the HD is unbelievable.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: R. Lazaro
Reviews.Content: Would recommend however the Internet and the mouse/keyboard controls are frustrating. Got a blue-tooth keyboard and mouse and it doesn't help.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Smart TV
Reviews.Author: W.Griff
Reviews.Content: Awesome price, great picture, easy set-up, two day shipping and no damage to box or TV.  The sound meets my needs for a bedroom TV but can understand how some people would have issues, it's about a 4 star rating.

Reviews.Title: Cant go wrong with Samsung
Reviews.Author: Cambridge Amazon Reviewer
Reviews.Content: I had a 40 non-smart Samsung fir a few years and wanted to go larger and smart. Figured I would try a Vizio and got a 55 inch one. Great picture and all, and fkr a great price,  but even the smart ones dont have a built I  web browser, so pretty much useless as a smart TV.Exchanged that one of a LG one (those were not from Amazon) and didt lime tge picture or sound quality, though it had a fantastic browser, Retured that one as well and finally got smart and went back to Samsung.Got a 50 inch one since Samsung is more expensive, but great choice. Great picture right out of the box, and by far the best sound of all the ones I tried. Looks beautiful and elegant, and I love the silver stand, so much nicer than the usual black ones. The remote synced with my Comcast cable box automatically,  so thaf was a plus.The web browser isnt all that great, but ypu can watch tv whi, e browsing, which js nice. Its part of the PIP feature.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: mlspurchase
Reviews.Content: I looked at several options and read many reviews before I determined that this unit met my price and expectations for what I wanted.  I received the unit in a very reasonable amount of time.  The set up was generally easy and we have been completely satisfied with this choice.  The picture is great and Samsung's smart hub is interesting.  I haven't taken advantage of this feature as of this writing; however, I believe it will be a product that I will eventually use.  I do not utilize the speakers on this unit so it would be unfair for me to give an assessment of this feature.  If you are looking for this size, I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: good!!!
Reviews.Author: DongDan Kim
Reviews.Content: This product is really a big hitIt's a big hitIt's a big hitLarry GowMmm eumeumeumapple

Reviews.Title: The basic sound byte
Reviews.Author: Seriously now
Reviews.Content: I've had the TV a month and think it's great.  We play the Wii and watch Netflix on it. Any concerns that I'd buy this and have regrets about something have not materialized.  I read many reviews before buying and didn't see many commenting on the sound.  I was worried that I should be buying a sound bar or plan on some sort of external system, but unless you want to create a home theatre setting, the TV sound is fine.  It goes from very quiet to quite loud and the speakers handle it well. There, that's my contribution.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV and Deal!
Reviews.Author: Robert M Anderson
Reviews.Content: So my Sharp Aquos died 2 months after the extended warranty expired. That was the 1 year manufacturer's plus 2 year extended for a total of 3 years. I've since learned that the Aquos is known for this. Ok, so instead of another early failure I asked my son what he liked. He recommended the Samsung. OMG it has all the bells and whistles as far as internet connectivity, built in apps for Netflix and Amazon, wi-fi connection, online registration and more stuff that I haven't had the time to explore yet. Intuitively easy to operate and adjustThe 55" picture is great and can be configured/adjusted however it suits you, sound is ok. My son got a local deal which included a "sound bar" which would really make a difference (I'm thinking about a Bose) Mine is the 120 Hz, son likes sports and ravesabout the 240Hz for better fast motion viewing.Price was very good and included the "Enhanced Delivery" which I totally recommend. Two guys bring it in, unpack it, set it on stand or table, make sure it works and get you started on set up. I was a little hesitant about buying a big screen online but the experience made a believer outta me

Reviews.Title: Awesome LED TV
Reviews.Author: Hyunuk Kim
Reviews.Content: Fantastic !!!!  LOVE  IT  SAMSUNG  TVGreat !!! TV  good value and  big enough^^Best  recommend ^^I'll  buy another UHD Samsung TV  next .

Reviews.Title: Love the TV!
Reviews.Author: The Rao
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was expecting! It has great resolution, and is perfect for our den! It is also very easy to use!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: superchemist
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture.  Very easy to set up with our Direct TV and local wireless. Highly recommended.  One caution:  the picture is so good that the people look their ages.

Reviews.Title: It's a great tv
Reviews.Author: Marty
Reviews.Content: This is our primary tv. The picture quality is great, we love the remote it came with, and it was easy to mount.  There are plenty of IO ports for all my devices.  It does not come with the SoundShare feature as advertised on the amazon page.  You have to buy the 6400 if you want that.  Although i solved that issue by purchasing a sound bar that was compatible with the Samsung remote instead.

Reviews.Title: Good expectations.
Reviews.Author: Mike Giallongo
Reviews.Content: I did my research via Amazon reviews and am satisfied that I made the right purchase. One thing that I needed and failed to do the research was for a wireless keyboard. Can't find one for this Model tv and forced to use the remote to select movies on screen. Samsung needs to recommend a wireless keyboard for their tv's even though they are not in the keyboard business.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Jun-gi Hong
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for resonalble price, and I really enjoyed it.I strongly recommend this 60 inch TV.Screen is big enough to watching movie things

Reviews.Title: Smart
Reviews.Author: D. Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: Great picture.  I was looking for a tv with the smart features but was skeptical as some of the reviews said the wifi was spotty with this model.  I have had no problem with using Netflix or HBOGo or Amazon Prime.  I enjoy the tv just wish I had gotten a bigger one!

Reviews.Title: Excellent for movies, not so good for PC gaming
Reviews.Author: Carlos Ospina
Reviews.Content: This setup is amazing, I knew it was not the top of the line but it filled my image expectations, clear and crisp, the black levels are way better than my previous Sony Bravia 32". HD Movies looks great. The smart function is regular, a little slow, but I consider that more like a plus. My real concern is that after I connected my PC (I7 4770, 16GB RAM, NVIDIA 770 4GB) to the HDMI port (little confusion here so I connected to HDMI/DVI port and renamed it to PC) I wasnt able to play my game: but after a little research and I made the TV as primary screen and TV sound as primary sound (kinda of annoying doing that every time you gotta play a game) and could play a game, (I only tried Burnout Paradise through Steam for the moment) only to discover a painful LAG which makes the game unplayable, I mean..u actually can play but in a disappointing way... and well I got this baby just for movies and gaming which makes the lag more than just annoying, so if u consider playing PC games u may want consider other options. I will edit this post if I find a workaround for that issue.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: G. Mascioli
Reviews.Content: TV after 3 weeks looks great except.....there is some 'fluttering' of the image during quick movement i.e. puck in hockey sliding the ice, baseball hit, football thrown.  I suspect the TV has some settings to adjust to help correct this but overall nice TV.One other note, the built-in Samsung Netflix app is supposedly being turned off by NetFlix as of March 26, 2014.  No idea why but that is the message given when logging into NefFlix.,  Not good.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: j
Reviews.Content: Bought this as "like new" and it came in original packaging the remote and accessories had never been opened.  If you are having reservations about buying a "like new" tv I can say don't its worth it.  I have had several Samsung TVs and they are great love the picture and the new Smart Hub is also very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Robert T. Best
Reviews.Content: Beat my expectations.  Will consider another when my birthday comes, My wife can't stay away for long. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ruth Timberlake
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the gamer and movie lover...little to no backlight bleeding.. sharp looking picture. no ghosting effects during game play.. I would recommend this tv to everyone that wants a great tv..

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 75" model.I've had several Sharp TV's in the past, including 70" and 80" models.  I saw this Samsung at Costco and was blown away by the picture quality.. it is superior to any other set I've owned.. Yes, this is the lower end 6300 model, but still packs quite a punch.  The build quality is great.  The only down-side I could see is that the built in apps are a bit slow to navigate around, but I don't use the apps myself so this doesn't matter to me.  I would not buy this TV for its "smart" features (apps, etc).I do not use 3D, so lack of it on this model was fine with me.The bezel is very thin, and the power button is hidden BEHIND the bottom right edge of the TV - very clever.  I would have liked to have seen them put the IR sensor somewhere else, as it's the only thing that protrudes out from the thin bezel.Overall, I'm very pleased with Samsung - this is my first Samsung set and I will definitely buy Samsung again.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Phil Hyoung , Lee
Reviews.Content: Purchase a good thing, or this low price.Families are delighted to look at my new TV.Have a nice day.

Reviews.Title: what a T.V.
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Took some help in getting the settings correct, someone younger and a lil more technologically savvy. Once the correct setting where placede in the set, could not believe how magnificent the picture was even without HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My wife wanted to return it because she didn't like the stand, but I thought it actually looked better than the older model Samsung that I had.  I like the feature of being able to see pics from the computer without having to hook it up together with an HMDI cable.  the feature where it sugests things that you like based upon your viewing habits doesn't work at all.  It always suggest shows I never watch and genres that I don't watch, and never shows that I watch all the time, but in my mind that is just one of those gimmicks marketing throws in.  As a TV, it's great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: K6JTF "Radio op"
Reviews.Content: Tried waiting for the Super Bowl deals, but the deals are usually for the huge sets. I live in a 650 ft2 apartment and there are no walls available for those things. But I love this set and the 120Hz rate is much better than my other Samsung that has the 60 Hz rate.

Reviews.Title: very awasem
Reviews.Author: jeongyu lee
Reviews.Content: Samsung makes great TV's that surpass every other manufacturer in their class. I have two Samsung's in my house and I can tell you the image is beautiful. This TV has an LED screen and in my opinion this the way to go (LED is similar to LCD its back-lit better so that they are no dark spots on the screen).Now add in that this TV can directly connect to the internet and I'm sold. TV's of this class have never been cheaper.One thing that I have found with TV's that its very important to actually look at the TV in person. Now when you look at the TV's, go to a place like Walmart to see them, because many times specialty stores like Best Buy play with the lighting controls on the TV and in the store to skew the image to there advantage. Once you look at the TV simply look and decide which one looks better to you.The next step to take into consideration is features. Here are a few that come with this TV:This Samsung comes with Auto Volume which automatically adjusts the volume of the desired channel, lowering the sound output when the modulation signal is high or raising the sound output when the modulation signal is low. This reduces the difference in volume when changing channels. The Auto Volume feature can be set to Normal, Night or Off.As far as outputs most of these TV's will come with more than enough Inputs and Outputs. This TV comes with 4 HDMI Audio/Video In, 1 Ethernet LAN In/Out, 1 RCA Component Audio/Video In amd 1 Digital Coaxial Audio Out.

Reviews.Title: Cordcutters Dream
Reviews.Author: Jack Dobson "JD"
Reviews.Content: Who needs cable? You've got your internet, you've got your streaming service and you've got a hard drive full of some media files.... But you need something nicer then your computer to watch everything.  That's where this comes in.  Three USB ports for viewing almost any media file format (avi, mp4, mkv etc), dedicated amazon instant and netflix buttons so you can blast right past the over the air.  If you add a basic digital antenna and you've got a game console you've got a local tv watching, media streaming and hard drive playback.  The OS is okay, it's nothing to write home about, but it's easily usable.  Because it pairs easily with your mobile phone or computer or tablet you can control YouTube, Netflix  and amazon through them.  The price on this can vary, I got it at $599 and it's pretty damn rad and blows the comprably priced units I've demoed at the local Best Try out the water.

Reviews.Title: Size of viewing area is nowhere near 40"
Reviews.Author: Kelly H
Reviews.Content: I bought a 40" unit to replace my 5 y/o 32" Samsung that is going to my Mom's house.  I've always been happy with that TV, but I wanted something a little bigger and she needed a TV to replace her ancient one.  I don't have a great deal of room, so I opted for the 40".  Measured the viewable screen size on my 32" and it is 32".  This TV only has a 36" screen.  Yeah the TV itself is almost 40", but I expected that the screen would be at least 38-39", based on how TVs are measured, and the size of my other one.  I'm disappointed in that.  It's also not as clear and sharp as my old TV even on different picture modes and messing with the settings.  Maybe this one is going to Mom's.

Reviews.Title: So far, amazing!
Reviews.Author: C. Cox
Reviews.Content: We've just set up our new TV, and so far we could not be happier with the purchase.  TV works great, looks great, and the SmartTV functions are very cool and work perfectly..still learning this part but it's pretty straightforward. A huge improvement from our old LCD 26inch TV in the bedroom.  Already considering an upgrade to our living room and purchasing this :-)  If you are hesitant on purchasing this, don't be.  The TV is fabulous, especially for the price!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46 inch 120v slim smart led hdtv model 2013
Reviews.Author: Philip R. Barcellona
Reviews.Content: I ordered and it arrived in a timely manner.  I installed it and it worked as it should however the instructions were not very clear.  In frustration I winged it and got preprogrammed instructions which was much better.  I would like feedback on how to activate the Smart TV features.

Reviews.Title: Great Set:)
Reviews.Author: Ross Kramer
Reviews.Content: Best picture of the lot. I really like the "Smart" aspect of it. i haven't really had time to learn all the features of the TV yet but form all I have gotten to so far, it's a winner!!

Reviews.Title: Great looking product.
Reviews.Author: Kyle Swenson
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a nice looking tv to mount in our stores. We picked this tv and are not disappointed. We mounted 2 of these on our walls. It is a very light weight tv ( I picked it up myself).The smart apps work great, I love having amazon instant video available on my tv. The WiFi setup is very easy, and the remote will work with most cable provider boxes, which is a huge plus for me.

Reviews.Title: New Samsung UN55F6300 is great.
Reviews.Author: earlf "EarlF"
Reviews.Content: I had an old rear projection tv and finally sprung for a HDTV.  The colors and resolution is great.  Shipping was flawless and Amazons contract shipping company did a great job setting up the television for us.  The smart TV functionality is good but I hope that Samsung will find a simple way to have separate user profiles rather then having to link accounts.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Sandi McAiney
Reviews.Content: Picture is great, very clear and the smart tv feature allows many additional features. Remote is very user friendly. Crystal clear.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32F6300 32" 1080P SMART LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: H. E. Power "Liz"
Reviews.Content: Brilliant screen with amazing definition and clarity.  Great for streaming movies and just the right size for a smaller room.

Reviews.Title: Lousy Smart TV Browser
Reviews.Author: R. Held "Bob H"
Reviews.Content: The picture and Smart features of this set are outstanding.BUT .... forget about being able to use the web browser to stream off NBC.COM or other sites.  It will play for 10-15 minutes and then lock up or crash.Samsung support has acknowledged the shortcoming but basically says "Sorry that's the way it is".I have a UN32F5500 that does the same thing.  Both sets are 2013 models which have Samsung's latest Smart Hub suite.Bob HMinneapolis, MN

Reviews.Title: Love it but Amazon app is buggy
Reviews.Author: Janis
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv for months now and am loving it.  It's my first tv in about 15 yrs so it replaced my 27" from the 1990's that weighed a ton.  I don't have it attached to any cable so I mainly stream video either via Amazon Prime or attach my laptop via a HDMI cable and watch that way.  Warning:  I watch most of my tv shows & movies from Amazon Prime but while watching on this tv, the video would regularly stop and look like it was buffering.  But it would disconnect the tv from my wireless connection and I'd end up having to restart my tv each time to continue watching.  Amazon tech support told me this is a know issue on all Samsung smart tvs.  The Amazon app isn't fully compatible and that Samsung is working on fixing this.  Just an FYI.  Otherwise, this tv is a perfect.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!!
Reviews.Author: This playstation unit went bad shortly after ...
Reviews.Content: I have had my 40 INCH TV for a few weeks now. The picture is awesome, and the only problem I have is that the picture is so clear it gives me headaches. Sounds funny but it's true. I play first person shooter video games, and it was unbearable to play. I changed the setting a bit and my headaches stopped. Could have sent the TV back for that reason, but would be pretty bad to list the reason for return as being because the picture is to fine lol... Anyway it is a good TV. As far as the reviews about streaming they are completely wrong. I watch Netflix and amazon video and have no lag whatsoever!!! That really depends on your internet connection anyway. I have a fast cable internet connection. I will post again in a few months for an update, but so far I love it!!

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Bobby D. Elliott
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd Samsung smart TV that I have purchased this year. IMO nobody beats Samsung. I would and do recommend them to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Dana Ferdinand
Reviews.Content: Its fricking hugh, thin, easy to set up, so many viewing options and settings, powerful volume.MUST HAVE AN HDMI CABLE OR A CABLE BOX OTHERWISE you will have an extremely overpriced music player!

Reviews.Title: Ultra Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Reading Nut"
Reviews.Content: Liked this product for all the options and direct buttons for Netflex and Amazon.  I would recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV
Reviews.Author: Wendy D Winslow "WDW"
Reviews.Content: There is nothing negative to say about this TV.  We thought it might be too big but it seems there is no such thing as too big.

Reviews.Title: Good TV-But most features not used
Reviews.Author: DML "DML"
Reviews.Content: It would be a 5 with a better stand. Seems flimsy.Larger type on the remote would be appreciated. Has great wifi, which we will eventually use.

Reviews.Title: **** LOVE THIS TV ALL AROUND :) :) :)
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: WE JUST RECENTLY PURCHASED THIS T.V. FROM BEST BUY.... IT HAS ALL THE FEATURES ONE WOULD NEED IN A SMART TV .... ALTHOUGH AS FAR AS THE WAY THE PICTURE COMES OVER YOU WILL NEED TO DO A LOT OF PICTURE ADJUSTING AS IT IS SO CLEAR THAT IT COMES ACROSS LIKE YOU ARE WATCHING A SOAP OPERA I AM A SELF TAUGHT TECHIE AND IT HAS BEEN A LITTLE TRYING FOR ME .... STILL RECOMMENED AND HAVE PATIENCE TO ADJUST PICTURE SETTINGS... IT HAS ALL THE BELLS AND WHISTLES OF SAMSUNG HUB AND THE INTERNET SIDE IS EASY TO USE WILL NEED TO GET A KEYBOARD MUCH EASIER TO NAVIGATE THAN THE REMOTE FOR THAT PART.... IT WAS VERY EASY TO SET UP WITH OUR WIFI AND WE ALSO PURCHASED A DIGITAL ANTENNA FOR $21.00 THAT PULLS ALL THE LOCAL CHANNELS ... PERFECT NO MORE CABLE BILLS... HIGHLY RECOMMEND .....

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: C. Gekas
Reviews.Content: The picture is crisp and sharp. The setup was pretty easy and I was able to wall mount it easily.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Picture
Reviews.Author: Redcatcher
Reviews.Content: A great price point for the Samsung. I found the set-up easy and fast. Lightweight, compact for a 40-incher. Overall very pleased and I recommend it

Reviews.Title: Really great
Reviews.Author: Andrew Nick
Reviews.Content: For my needs this was a good TV.  Well not the visual expert I like the color tones and the clearness. I think it's well priced for the quality you see

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture Quality/Television.
Reviews.Author: Kvagianos
Reviews.Content: The picture is Fantastic*Ease of setup*Many ways to personalize*Excellent stand*Turn on time is very quick as well.*Sound output is great too.Although the power cord is probably a standard length. I thought it was disappointingly short.My only complaint at this time would be mirroring and wifi displaying of your laptop or smart phone can only be accomplished through other Samsung products. This is very disappointing as I have mostly Apple products (iPhone, Macbook Pro etc...)Overall: Great TV

Reviews.Title: so good for korean
Reviews.Author: Nam Ju Hyoung
Reviews.Content: good quality and good price and good shipping.It is so expensive in korea.so I thought I've good choice.

Reviews.Title: Great image!
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: Great TV, image is sharp and all I expected and then some on the image and colors. My only issue was setting up the universal remote as I got it working at the beggining, but simply stop working with my other components. Other than the remote isssue I am really pleased with this TV

Reviews.Title: Nice but not perfect
Reviews.Author: Ozzboy
Reviews.Content: I like my new 46" in all respects except one and the reason I only gave it 3 stars. This TV replaced a nine year old Panasonic plasma TV which had a very sharp picture from all viewing angles. This Samsung LED has a sharper, brighter and better HD picture from viewing straight on. However, if you are off to the side, the clarity fades, kind of a whitish tone appears in the picture. My plasma did not do this. Maybe this is a characteristic of all LED TV's. For this reason, I did replace my wall mount with a full motion mount where I can turn the TV if I am sitting off to the side in my favorite lounge chair. Set up was a breeze and the smart features work relatively well, though I mostly use my AppleTV device (much faster) for watching Netflix or using other online TV apps rather then the Samsung TV built in apps.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN55F6300 1080P TV
Reviews.Author: Gerald D. Gershon
Reviews.Content: Love the TV although my wife was not happy as it required many calls to Samsung and Direct TV to get it working andDelivery was a nightmare and the delivery people kept delaying it and we had no idea when it was arriving.Could have got from best buy much faster.  One day we stayed in for 9 hours waiting only to find it would be another week Quality of the product is amazingSet up was not easy.

Reviews.Title: It's okay.
Reviews.Author: Michelle "Tar Heel Reader"
Reviews.Content: Great picture could have a lot more volume. Definately need sound system. Room is larger than I thought could go up to 70+ model.

Reviews.Title: Super samsung
Reviews.Author: crey
Reviews.Content: On time great conditionSuper clear tv with everything that was expected. Able to set up TV and stand in under 30 minutes

Reviews.Title: Excellent smart TV
Reviews.Author: DANIEL I CASTRO
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV--excellent picture and sound.  The ability to go directly to Amazon Prime or the internet is helpful

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: park jaebum
Reviews.Content: thank you it.s very wonderful tv MabeSamsung makes great TV's that surpass every other manufacturer in their classNow add in that this TV can directly connect to the internet

Reviews.Title: Wow!  Almost Perfect...
Reviews.Author: M. Lee
Reviews.Content: This is one nice set.  I now vow to never buy a cheap flat panel again!  This TV is really nice with the exception of not having the AllShare being able to:- Connect to my home NAS for the password protected folders- Poor organization of channels from my HDHomerun Prime- Not being able play protected channels from the HDHomerun Prime (like HBO channels - but I can access HBOgo!The picture and sound is a "wow!"  The only other issue is the ethernet connection to the set that is flush with the back and not at a right angle with some of the other connectors.  I haven't mounted to the wall yet but it might be an issue where I will need to get a right angle ethernet cable plug.

Reviews.Title: Smart
Reviews.Author: Anil C. Patel "memphismo"
Reviews.Content: It is my first smart and what a picture when u hook it to Dish Hopper the resolution is awesome 1080. Never had so much fun watching.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Vann Hartin
Reviews.Content: Still learning how to use this "smart" TV to full advantage, but the picture is great and I had no problem with setting it up or using the more basic functions.  Looking forward to trying out more of the smart functions.  One caution: this LED TV is definitely better with sunlight/lamplight glare than a plasma, but do not expect the problem to be completely eliminated.

Reviews.Title: a contented buy
Reviews.Author: clemo
Reviews.Content: This TV Is a good model, I am pleased with the type of reception and service I am getting. I only wish I gotten a larger size. I recommend that they purchase any size but choose wisely.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Golfcheesmo "Golfcheesmo"
Reviews.Content: Fine picture. Incredibly thin with almost no bezel. Happy I bought it. Especially enthralled with having Netflix and Amazon Prime buttons on the remote! But the design of the user interface is awful. Ugly, slow. They need to study Apple products. Or I should maybe say study them more intelligently.

Reviews.Title: works as expected!
Reviews.Author: Ralph.Luben
Reviews.Content: delivered on time, setup was easy, picture is beautiful.  For the money, this was a great deal!  I would recommend it to anyone...

Reviews.Title: Great Size TV
Reviews.Author: Sade Grant
Reviews.Content: I love the picture but the sound quality isn't as loud as I would like it. Thinking about getting speakers for it. Also wish it had more outlets in the back.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality and good price
Reviews.Author: Jong Sun   Bae
Reviews.Content: I satisfied with the product of its excellent quality and good price.There are many functionI think it is very useful for me...

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: MIKE BARNHART
Reviews.Content: We ordered this television after checking it out at a local retailer.  The picture quality is superb.  We are not using the unit's speakers, instead we have it hooked up to a receiver and sound bar. Delivery was excellent - the driver was on-time, set the unit up in the house and made sure it was working. I am most impressed with the light sensor on the TV - it senses the amount of light in the room and will automatically adjust the brightness.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Bruce M. Corey
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace one that got water damaged. After my experience with the damaged one, I wanted another Samsung smart tv.

Reviews.Title: so good
Reviews.Author: gang sumi
Reviews.Content: it is vary lager and quality is good. if you worry about size this is perfect choice. i recommend it

Reviews.Title: We love the TV
Reviews.Author: MattT
Reviews.Content: Only complaint is lack of keyboard for using the online stuff. The remote is frustratingly slow. The TV experience is great though. We hooked it up to an external audio....no TV comes with adequate audio.Bright vivid colors, sharp image, many online features, and easy to hang on the wall. So far, no problems at all with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv
Reviews.Author: Susie
Reviews.Content: We chose this tv because of the reviews we have read, we have a Samsung surround sound, and a Samsung dvd/vcr player. Thoroughly happy with it . Delivery was great and we have a good warranty on it. Highly recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong
Reviews.Author: Christina H.
Reviews.Content: Besides the fact the delivery took a little longer to arrive it was a great purchase I love it couldn't have choose anything better the sound quality is greAt along with picture. Samsung always makes ya money well spent

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: M. Six
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the bedroom.  Setup was a little long (going through all the menus) but easy enough. I would recommend this product for anyone looking for a replacement.  Worth the money...  Logitech K400 wireless keyboard/mouse work great w/ it.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture especially on HD
Reviews.Author: carol s. white
Reviews.Content: Love the picture quality and the ability to use netflix right on the screen.  Easy to understand directions and use of remote control!

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: bobby
Reviews.Content: I have a  2  other brand TVs  & the Samsung picture is much better . The sound isn't great , I guess I'll get a sound bar for it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40F6300 40 inch 1080p 120 hz smart LED TV
Reviews.Author: Dubbie
Reviews.Content: Beautiful TV.  Very happy with this purchase.  Had a 40 Inch smart tv that was two years old and stolen in a B&E.;  Huge difference in picture quality and functionality and the expense was about $100 less than I paid for the other TV...can't get any better than that.

Reviews.Title: Love the options With the smart TV
Reviews.Author: John E Snyder
Reviews.Content: Overall A great all around TV.  A very easy set up.. Being A smart TV you have a lot of options. Best of all the price was right.

Reviews.Title: pefection
Reviews.Author: Eric L.
Reviews.Content: This led tv is crystal clear and remarkably fast using wifi. I stream netflix and amazon with ease and no hesitation at all.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Mike A.
Reviews.Content: Fantastic picture and color. The smart TV is so handy and versatile. Speakers were a little hard to hear in the cabinet, but I got the sound bar and it made all the difference in the world.

Reviews.Title: Really Great TV
Reviews.Author: Lauri Hart "L. D. Hart"
Reviews.Content: It took two deliveries before I got an undamaged working set and i watched the SUPER BOWL own on a 32" set, but that disappoint aside, the trucking company and Amazon were great about it.  The TV is a fabulous picture.  It feels like people are in the room with you! I've only had it a week, so at the moment, I would say my only complaint is that it's smarter than I am.  I will catch up, I'm just enjoying the picture

Reviews.Title: Great  Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Anna Kader "akhouses"
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture, great sound, great functionality. Easy WIFI connect for my laptop, usb connect external hard drive, browse online images, etc

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN50F6300 smart LED HDTV problems
Reviews.Author: Elias Smeros
Reviews.Content: I only give this tv 3 stars because of it's picture quality. the smart feature is not so smart!  first, I ordered the optional wireless keyboard from Samsung which states works with all 2013 and newer samsung smart tv's.(model VG-KBD2000) well this is not the case. false advertising by samsung. this is a blue tooth keyboard and the tv is not blue tooth enabled.  you would have to get a WIRED USB keyboard if you would like to surf the web or play games on apps. which to me, is DUMB!  why would you want to be wired to a keyboard?  the remote entry for web surfing, entering user & passwords, or app login is painfully slow.The TV freezes up...meaning that after the TV is on and after 20-30 min. if you hit menu or smarthub, or any key, it does not respond! then turns off.  (reboots) but I have to manually turn it back on.  this is a big problem.  let's say you are watching a movie from your blu ray and you want to switch source, the TV does not respond...shuts down.  & let's say you were watching a streeming movie on one of the apps, you want to adjust picture, hit the menu button, and the TV shuts down...now you have to turn the TV back on, go back to the app, find the movie you were watching, & resume. WTF?..verry aggravating .The Apps; using the apps i find that they also freeze up. and when ordering HD movies on most apps, the format is not presented in full screen.  (get the black bars on top & bottom or sides)  also the streaming part sucks! it buffers and says " EXIT PLAYBACK or EXIT APP".  again this is very aggravating!  with my pansonic blu ray player with vara cast (online apps) I can stream movies without any issues. connected wireless through a netgear router and receiving 10-12 mbps download speed on all my devices throughout my network. so, the Samsung TV should not have any issues but,...it does!The picture;  the picture quality is good connected through dish network satellite set top box.  I have no issues with picture formating for the set top box will allow you to change format options.  I have the TV contacted by HDMI cable from settop box and to my home theater receiver .  audio is good!I contacted Samsung Customer support about these issues and the first time, they instructed me over the phone to do a manual firmware update & reset my smarthub.  they said that should take care of the issues....it did not!  second time calling, I was on hold for over 30 min. to speak to the "remote assistance" dept.  once I finally got someone on the phone, they instructed me to get the code from the TV, and read it to him so as he can have remote access to my TV to diagnose the TV.  he then said he would have to set up an appointment for a service call.  as of the date of this review I am still waiting for the service call and will update once that has been done with the results.Bottom line;  too many problems from a new out-of-the-box TV!  Smart features  not good,  I would not recommend this TV to anyone looking fo use the smart features.. it's ok for a HD monitor.

Reviews.Title: Love it, but can't watch TV during the day
Reviews.Author: AJ Wi
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV due to it's overall rating, customer satisfaction and the fact that it fit perfectly in the cabinet I have.  I love everything about it with the exception: Reflection. My house has lots of windows, and the sun pours in all day during the the winter.  Anything the sun hits, reflects back onto the screen, making it impossible to watch TV during the day.  Yes, I could close the curtains, but when you live in this cold climate, you want the sun pouring in!  My Sony Bravia didn't have this issue.

Reviews.Title: Good but not Great!
Reviews.Author: mcdl
Reviews.Content: I'm a little disappointed of Samsung and I really think they could do better with the Smart Hub feature. After you turn on your TV you cannot go directly to your apps, you have to wait for the Smart HUB to initialize(2-3mins) before you can open your apps.On the other hand, this TV has a great image and built-in WiFi. The Wi-Fi settings might disappear from time to time and you have to enter everything again. I would say is a good TV but it's not a great one.

Reviews.Title: incredible picture
Reviews.Author: tina
Reviews.Content: easy to set up, great picture  Cant complain about anything yet.  Will post an update at a later date if I find anything not up to complain about.

Reviews.Title: Good Tv
Reviews.Author: David Marroquin
Reviews.Content: So far so good, my last TV broke after a year, I got a warranty for this one, I am still in the process of testing this product.

Reviews.Title: What a great TV!!
Reviews.Author: Byung Jae Kim
Reviews.Content: It was a great opportunity for me to buy like this huge size of TV.Seems great till now and I love to watch it through.

Reviews.Title: Good TV...Typical Samsung software.
Reviews.Author: R. Blondo "Electronic Junkie"
Reviews.Content: The TV is fine.  The interface isn't all that great...but is pretty typical for a TV.  I think the TV looks great though.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tv for the money.
Reviews.Author: Maria Rocafort
Reviews.Content: This Tv is easy to install, easy to operate and the sound is very nice.  My husband had no trouble setting it up and we are very happy.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Dianne Eaton
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our daughter and she is enjoying it to the fullest.  It is such a good TV

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Exposes ComCast HD Signal Deficiencies
Reviews.Author: William L. Aldrich
Reviews.Content: I was concerned with buying a TV directly from Amazon, my first choice was Best Buy, but even though they (Best Buy) sell the identical TV, they would not match the Amazon price.  So Amazon it was.  The TV arrived in excellent condition and was very easy to set up with most controls and menus very intuitive.  The picture is excellent.  One item that did suprise me was how good the broadcast (antenna) picture is when compared to ComCast HD cable service.  When switching between the Antenna signal and the equivalent ComCast HD 1080p signal channel (the SuperBowl in this example), the ComCast picture is relatively muddy.  The WiFi connection was easy to configure to connect to my home network.  I have only explored a small subset of the Smart capabilities of the TV ... very extensive.  I have been able to play / display many different picture and video formats on the set.  The TV has an audio out that I port directly to my stereo ... very convenient in that regadless of the input chosen as source for the TV, the stereo settings remain the same.  Last comment ... I wanted to keep my VCR capability; but since the VCR only has a single composite video out, this TV only has a shared composite / component input; but does have 4 HDMI inputs.  Since I was using the component input for another device there was no easy way to connect the VCR.  I looked at many component to HDMI up converters on Amazon -- most were about $50 with questionable ratings.  I ended up buying a Toshiba DVR620 which has a built in HDMI 1080p up converter and has the ability to copy / read and write both VHS tapes and DVD's for about $170.  So far so good.

Reviews.Title: Best TV we've had
Reviews.Author: Patrick Courtney
Reviews.Content: My husband loves it, it is very big. But it fits perfectly in our living room. It is still new, so can't say much. At the moment, it works great, the pictures look so real.

Reviews.Title: 40 Inch Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The first Samsung TV was defective, but Amazon exchanged it for another of the same after I tried to get it to work through a technician.  This is the perfect size for my family room. The picture quality is great.  Amazon.com will make sure you are happy with their purchases.  Buy with confidence.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: W
Reviews.Content: This is a move up from a 720p Samsung about 8 years old. The picture is very crisp, watched Rio Bravo (1959) on Amazon streaming video and now realize they had great cameras then, but our receivers weren't good enough to show it. The wireless kept dropping my network so I connected a Lan cable and connectivity is fine. Speakers are acceptable once settings are adjusted to music setting. I  have no complaints and it was delivered right to my door well packaged.

Reviews.Title: Samsung - nothing else!
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: Delivery was excellent.  Amazon delivery service took to the basement, opened it and made sure it worked.  That's all they do is deliver TV's sold by Amazon.  They were great.  They would have taken the box, but we wanted to keep it - just in case.  The picture is amazing.  The apps and features are excellent and easy to set up.  My third Samsung TV purchased from Amazon in 5 years, we keep upgrading.  Love everyone of them and Amazon was the best price.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV and the price...
Reviews.Author: ThomasOfAustin
Reviews.Content: I am aggravated that Samsung did not choose to include the non-standard wall mount screws.  I am STILL dealing with that issue.The TV is fantastic;  it even gives me a schedule menu of the OTA ( over-the-air ) stations.  Works great with my Samsung tablet too.

Reviews.Title: so clear and crisp
Reviews.Author: Sneak
Reviews.Content: it's like butter, i swear! super awesome interface, loving the connection with other media players and wonderful resolution. i also love the fact that my android phone connects fairly well with it and can be used as a remote for it.well worth the purchase!

Reviews.Title: Major defect with this TV
Reviews.Author: Bionic Dog
Reviews.Content: There's a major defect with is TV. It does not work with the built in streaming video services such as Netflix, Amazon Video, Vudu, etc. During playback, the video picture will shift to the left leaving one big black bar on the right side of the screen and cutting off the left side of the picture. Samsung says it is the problem of the streaming services. I have addressed the issue with Netflix ans Amazon and they have not found a solution yet. The main way I watch shows and movies is through streaming services, so this defect is a major problem. I got the tv during a big sale, so because of the extremely good price and the hassle it would be to pack up a 50 inch tv and send it back, I have kept it hoping for a solution. it works fine from a tuner (normal tv) or from discs and my workaround has been to stream from my old blurry player instead of from the "smart tv". Regardless, it's a major disappointment and hassle. Also, the "universal" remote will not work with my Samsung blu ray player. Another head shaker.

Reviews.Title: Efffortless setup and operation.
Reviews.Author: JOHN WINLAND
Reviews.Content: Samsung is without a doubt the leader in quality LED and LCD TV's.  Picture quality is fantastic and it's user friendly setup and operation is great.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Stafford Gaitor
Reviews.Content: Great t.v.Nice apps,although I wish there was an internet browser app.  Remote is satisfactory but I can overlook these few things.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: J.Theodore
Reviews.Content: Great led tv just in time for the super bowl.Not to big but just right for the space we have.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money on the 240hz!!
Reviews.Author: C. Maples "Claystang"
Reviews.Content: I own a 60 inch and 50 inch 240hz for both. The reason I didn't buy the 75 inch at Best Buy was because the tv stands were at the ends of the tv instead of in the middle like this one.I must say I was a little worried about buying the 120 hz but I have been watching basketball, football, and movies and there is no blur and looks just like my 60 inch 240hz that I now have in my bedroom. I'm glad I didn't waste that extra money buying a new stand to have the 240hz version. Fits perfectly in my living room and has a perfect picture especially my High Def channels through Charter. This is a fantastic television!!!!

Reviews.Title: got it very quickly great service!!
Reviews.Author: lola
Reviews.Content: it is awesome-- so clear and pretty and we just love it!!- after our old 19 ''  box tv- !!- it  is awesome and got the particulars from my son in law- and they are awesome the 120  whatever-  !!

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: blue cobalt
Reviews.Content: Good quality for affordable price.  used to have a 40 in.  Takes some time to get used to see the TV on a 60 in.

Reviews.Title: Lovin' it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jeff Hall
Reviews.Content: This tv absolutely exceeds all my needs and desires. Such a great tv. Samsung has far surpassed sony as the top of the line electronics manufacturer!!!

Reviews.Title: So far it is great
Reviews.Author: S. K. Baker
Reviews.Content: I chose this because it was recommended. I  find it to work well except for automatic dimming of the picture for energy savings I would suppose but with all the windows in my room I needed to change that setting.

Reviews.Title: This tv
Reviews.Author: david ginsberg
Reviews.Content: Is badasssssss. You can do stuff at 1080p on the xbox and if you connect your laptop using the thunderbolt to hdmi plug it looks amazing at 1080p. You can play movies in Blu ray mode if you put your tba refresh rate at standard or higher. So far no problems and I can't wait till I get the xbox one!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Gary L. Cleveland
Reviews.Content: Upgraded from a 46 inch sony rear projection to this 55 inch . Big difference ! Although I cant complain about the picture on my old set . Picture is great , I used some of the recommendations listed in the reviews . Picture is much better after I got rid of the "soap opera" effect . I haven't mastered the browser yet , don't much like the idea of surfing with the tv anyway . Youtube app works great coupled with my PC and my tablet . I don't feel like the apps are slow at all like some have said  . Very happy with my purchase .

Reviews.Title: Excellent HDTV - Beautiful Picture
Reviews.Author: Joseph V. Nauyalis
Reviews.Content: The Samsung seems like a superior unit. Excellent picture, easy to use controls , easy connect to internet and excellent sound.I have read other reviews about how bad the sound is , but the Samsung unit is not a Yamaha receiver so you can not compare TV speakers with separate surround sound system. Best HDTV I have bought.

Reviews.Title: Great TV once we got it fixed
Reviews.Author: Brandon Simmons
Reviews.Content: This TV has a great picture and a great Smart TV experience with a lot of built in apps.  Only con I have of this TV is that it started power cycling after a few hours of use.  We contacted the manufacturer and they have already replaced the power supply.  TV has been working great after the power supply was replaced.  Has been about a week since the new power supply and no problems yet.  This may have just been one of those rare things - perhaps a bad set from the factory.Would still recommend this TV to anyone that wants a TV with a great picture.  Would buy it again if i had it to do over.

Reviews.Title: The 46" at $718 is a great value
Reviews.Author: KK
Reviews.Content: The price and performance for this TV at 718 is exceptional, and we are very happy with the purchase.  We're average home TV watchers, not particularly in tune with all the all the technical details and features some people demand.  I just can't justify paying thousands of dollars for a television with features I won't notice, or use.  For our purposes, this one meets or exceeds our expectations, and the price was right.
