If you're really picky about technicals, maybe this TV isn't for you.The TV arrived within 48 hours via UPS, shipped by Amazon within a box inside another box, well packed/cushioned to protect the TV from damage in shipment.  Sold by Amazon, with free prime shipping. NOTE: The price had been fluctuating some $200 up and down since Black Friday, so wait it out, and buy it from Amazon.I paired the Samsung 46" with a Sanus VLF525, which is made for much larger TV's, however the Sanus allows me to move the TV completely perpendicular to the wall, a true 90 degree angle.  So I can pull the TV away from the wall, and turn it a full 90 degrees which was a requirement to meet our needs.Setup was relatively easy.  The initial power up walks you though a menu of items.  It connected to my Wifi router about 25 feet away after adding the router password. We subscribe to FIOS, and the Samsung Remote controls the FIOS set top box with very few limitations (power, channel change, STB Menu, and STB Guide, etc. work fine).  However, the FIOS remote doesn't work for controlling most of the Samsung features, so we primarily use the Samsung remote.  Despite what Comcast and FIOS say, they've made watching TV way too complex by forcing STB's and Digital Adapters in the mix.Screen image is crisp and clear, we don't notice any ghosting or motion related issues sitting about 8 to 10 feet from the screen. There is some small level of delay in response to the remote and internet related function, but nothing we're concerned about.

Reviews.Title: Love it !!
Reviews.Author: Susan Wasik
Reviews.Content: Great color quality and very easy set up.  So far has worked out very well.  Love Samsung products - this is our 2nd TV.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Robert Hanson
Reviews.Content: very easy to get it up and going, nice picture very clear, fits our room very nicely and our family loves  it

Reviews.Title: Very nice HDTV
Reviews.Author: Nhi Lam
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for about a month now and I am enjoying every bit of it. Picture quality is very nice (used calibration settings from electronic review site) and clear. Smart apps are nice, but noticeably slower than using another device (Apple TV, PS3, etc.). Game mode is a dream for first person shooter games. Originally ordered the 60 inch model, but had to return it due to defects with lines running from top to bottom of the screen. Amazon's customer service was ABSOLUTELY incredible and even gave me a decent credit towards the upgrade for my troubles. Had doubts about buying such a big item online, but I am glad that I made the decision.

Reviews.Title: One of the Best TV Buys I've Made
Reviews.Author: Dan Argenas
Reviews.Content: Bottom line...this is a sleek looking electronic pleasure.  The menu is elementary...the picture adjustable to your personal tastes...and just needs a tweek on the audio section in future new models....otherwise perfect.

Reviews.Title: Love the Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Martin Shupe
Reviews.Content: You don't need Apple or Google TV with this.  It connects easily to the internet using your Wi-Fi and you can download all the apps you need.  It also connects with a Samsung Blu-ray player automatically.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and Features
Reviews.Author: Ralph Scalise
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great and the smart tv features are easy to navigate.  The sound isn't the best since the speakers are in the back but not horrible by any means.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Terri
Reviews.Content: Wow! We love it! We got our new television for $10.00 less than the sale price at Best Buy. Came as described,  brand new in its original packaging.

Reviews.Title: Great Pick
Reviews.Author: Scott William Osmus
Reviews.Content: Exceeded my expectations.  The sound is great for a slim flatscreen, and the HD is almost too good.  Would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Decent television
Reviews.Author: Chris F.
Reviews.Content: Very nice picture quality and smart options.  Sound is mediocre at best definitely need a receiver aand a sub for enjoy ment.

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: Lisa M.
Reviews.Content: Picture quality, smart tv features are amazing.  I also like the aesthetics ; a very small frame surrounds this tv. No bulky sides. Having all Samsung products is even more of a benefit as my phone, dvd player all sync and work in tandem with each other.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tv and smart features
Reviews.Author: barry
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for 1 1/2 months now and am totally in love with it.  I did much research before the purchase.  It is an upgrade from a 2008 LG 720p tv and the results with this tv are amazing.  The initial set up was very fast and within 10 minutes the tv was up and running, in control of my cable dvr box and hooked up to the internet.  The user has a lot of options for picture adjustments to make it to their liking.  I tried many posted here but I like my picture bright and vibrant so I keep mine in the standard mode and just upped the backlight a little.  Important to note, this tv does have a glossy screen but I have it in a room which is bright with sunlight during the day and I have lights on at night.  The tv does not reflect any of this.  I only dim the lights for atmosphere when watching a dark or scary movie.Many complain about the black level with this tv.  I find it to be excellent and when shows fade to black my screen is fully black.  The colors with this tv are also exceptional and realistic.  I very rarely use any aspect of the auto motion plus.  The true 120hz of this tv provides a picture of amazing clarity and depth.  I do keep the digital clean view on auto which keeps everything crisp.  As others have stated it often feels like people on the tv are in your room or that you are immersed in a movie the picture is so great.For me the smart features are pretty much great.  I am connected to the internet via ethernet and do have a high internet speed.  I can use the browser, Netflix and Amazon Prime all with no problem.  My Netflix and Amazon never buffers or has problems loading.  I also use Pandora and the Amazon Cloud Player for music.  Apps are always up and running with no problem.  My tv updated itself with initial setup and there was one more update at the end of November.  Everything always went smoothly.The tv is very attractive.  It's slim design is very sleek and I like the stand which some find a little flimsy.  I do have a couple of issues.  One, the audio is not good at all and I had to get a sound bar.  But this is an issues with all led tvs.  With Netlflix the picture I get is just as good as with the regular tv setting.  With my Amazon Prime some shows, even Downton Abbey come in a little lackluster.  Luckily I can access Amazon thru my blu ray player as well and the picture is great if I so desire.  But luckily its not on all shows and this is really the only problem of note I've encountered.I also want to say that I needed to cantact Samsung support twice and was very impressed.  One time was about the Amazon video issue and a tech remotely went into my tv and un/reinstalled the app to try to get it better.  Sadly it didn't help but they tried everything possible to help.Also please be sure when purchasing this tv that under the price it says SHIPS FROM AND SOLD BY AMAZON.  When Amazon themselves are out of stock third party sellers will toy with the price often to outrageous amounts and only if you truly buy it from Amazon do you get their excellent customer support, delivery and 30 day tech support for the tv,.  Amazon themselves stand behind their products 1000% and returns if necessary are simple.  Don't be fooled into buying from a third party seller.I love this tv and highly recommend it.  The simple bonuses like it giving me recommendations based on my viewing habits are fun.  And being able to use only the tv remote for the tv and cable box  which also changes the channel, sets recordings etc. is superb.  And for picture quality you really can't get much better.

Reviews.Title: The TV is great.
Reviews.Author: C. Horak
Reviews.Content: Found the list of adjustments submitted by one reviewer for picture, brightness etc. to be very worthwhile. We needed to go through a learning curve to operate the remotes. The cable guy was a great help. This smart TV is just amazing.

Reviews.Title: What A Difference!
Reviews.Author: Roslyn M. Santay "Roz"
Reviews.Content: Before we purchased this Samsung 55 inch Slim Smart from Amazon we had a Panasonic Plasma and we thought it was a good set.  After watching the Samsung we were amazed at the difference.  The color, clarity and sharpness is outstanding!  Backgrounds of shows and characters' faces are so perfect it is like we are right there.  I have to admit I thought my husband was being a bit eccentric when he wanted this for Christmas but I am so pleased we purchased this.  The fact that it was on sale and we saved a lot of money did not hurt either.  We'd recommend this to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: M. Kim "Believer"
Reviews.Content: Love this TV!HD LED screen with smart function built in!  What more can I ask for?All works good, delivery was good, excellent transaction!

Reviews.Title: That's good TV! SAMSUNG!
Reviews.Author: LEE JOON YOUNG
Reviews.Content: That's awesome TV, SAMSUNG!I love this TV, and everybody use this Tv, because you will know what I mean if you use it.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: doc
Reviews.Content: This is just what we needed as out living room is 28 feet long. Was a little concerned about mounting It on the wall. An 80" wouldn't be too big either.

Reviews.Title: Right on Target
Reviews.Author: Lynda Erickson
Reviews.Content: The TV met all my expectations, including a sound system that seems better than normal.  The enhanced delivery was also very much appreciated.

Reviews.Title: Good TV- one thing lacking
Reviews.Author: James M.
Reviews.Content: This is a good high definition set and does fine on wifi. My only complaint would be the lack of a keyboard with this set. Everything must be inputted on screen, which is more tedious.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Donald Jakubowski
Reviews.Content: This is our second Samsung HD TV and they do not disappoint.  We were limited in size in what we could purchase for a bedroom TV.  Great picture, good sound, easy setup.

Reviews.Title: MAGNIFICQUIE
Reviews.Author: Luis Alexis Vasquez Colmenares
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A TABLE, BOOK FAVORITE TV MAGNIFIQUE ESTUPENDIE RECOMIENDITIS SOLO IS POSSIBLE PARA TV, MAGNIFIQUE MAGNIFICO, TV ESTUPENDE IS RECOMENDABLE Y ESTUPENDE

Reviews.Title: Big enough
Reviews.Author: Wiley Williams
Reviews.Content: This telovision is a great monitor also. I am glade that I bought it. It also was a great bargen.

Reviews.Title: I'm in love with this TV
Reviews.Author: Music Lover
Reviews.Content: The clarity is amazing. I didn't have to touch any of the settings. I liked the picture right out of the box. So easy to but on the well-made stand (comes with screws). The remote is very self-explanatory. You don't have to be a tech to understand it  I did try to make the setting for the screen (picture size) smaller and there wasn't an option that was perfect for me. I  just wanted  to make it slightly smaller. Two channels (one a shopping channel) have writing off to the side that is cut off. The options were.....fit to screen, 6.9 which was the best size, and the others were square options which I don't need.  I really enjoyed watching YouTube videos on the larger screen and movies. The TV also has a nice sleep timer with many choices.  Other than a slightly off picture size on those two channels (could be the channel's fault), I can't find anything wrong with this. If I could, I'd buy one for every room. Mine is 40 inches. I'm thinking of getting a really large one for the living room.

Reviews.Title: Cheapest deal not always the best
Reviews.Author: Joey M
Reviews.Content: OK, so I did Thanksgiving thing at Walmart and purchased a Vizio 60" smart TV. Not a very smart decision. The Vizio was to replace a 47" Phillips, which has a great picture by the way, so that I could move the Phillips to my man cave. Man did I mess up. There was no comparison with the picture quality even after following some of the settings suggested by other purchasers of this product. There was just no way I would be satisfied with the Vizio. After a few days of misery, I found the Samsung 60" smart on Amazon for $1167 and immediately purchased it via my Prime account. It arrived in a few days, I set it up, tweaked the settings a little, and never looked back. This TV IS AWESOME and I'm a very happy camper. Took the Vizio back to Walmart and they asked what was wrong with it. I told them the picture sucks and that I'm fairly tech savvy and nothing I did would produce a satisfactory picture. To be fair to Vizio owners, an associate at work purchased the same model Vizio on the same day and he loves it.....maybe I just got a lemon. One other note; I like to stream stuff and the Samsung populated the Windows Media Center from my main computer without me even knowing. For those streaming buffs out there, this means I can move my Xbox to the Man Cave.....yes!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Racer
Reviews.Content: This is the first time I've owned a smart television and I love it! Not only is the picture quality amazing, but the options and features are really cool. Samsung makes a great product!

Reviews.Title: IT CAME AS SAID
Reviews.Author: Alangwolter
Reviews.Content: WE ARE VERY PLEASED WITH THE TV AND DELIVERY.IT IS A SMART TV AND UNFORTUNATELY I AM NOT SMART ENOUGH TO USE ALL IT HAS TO OFFER,BUT I WILL CALL THE HELP # AND CARRY ON.

Reviews.Title: Very sadifvied
Reviews.Author: jcm 50
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy set up. Deliveried on time. I would recommend this TV and the store I purchased it from.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful television with easy set up
Reviews.Author: gatkins
Reviews.Content: A great looking television, narrow and slim with very clear images and good sound.  Easy to use and easy to assemble and set up especially with a little help from the great customer service team at Samsung.  Amazon also had a free offer for limited time customer service but never had the opportunity to use it.  Bought it on Black Friday and received it on the next Monday at dinner time.  Can't beat that.  At almost half price and no shipping charges who could ask for more.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: ERIC
Reviews.Content: Great picture, sound and features. Also fully functional apps on Samsung and Apple devices that make them a remote. Get it.

Reviews.Title: I'm happy!
Reviews.Author: sergio moreno
Reviews.Content: I'm not an electronic buff. I'm very much at peace with this purchase. The color is great. The secondary components like my Comcast box and my Samsung bluray player respond fairly quick, although online web browsing could be a bit more faster. It has a bit off a lag to upload a website. Don't get me wrong, Netflix and Amazon prime work superb. The WiFi capabilities are awesome, but I prefer a hard wire LAN connection. Overall I'm happy and that's what matters to me.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46-inch
Reviews.Author: Linda Aldridge-Johnson
Reviews.Content: I love this purchase.  The picture is clearer than I've seen in years.  I should've bought a flat screen years ago.

Reviews.Title: Great tv... love the smart features
Reviews.Author: Ajish Thomas
Reviews.Content: This is my first smart tv and Samsung was the best deal. The 120hz and faster processor made me choose this over the 5300. That turned out to be a great choice because my friend who has the 5300 complains of slow response which I never experienced on 6300.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Grossman
Reviews.Content: All good except that the speakers are not up to the quality of the TV.  Had to purchase a sound bar because of the poor sound.

Reviews.Title: Love my New Smart LED
Reviews.Author: Brian Sherwood Dawes
Reviews.Content: The picture is crisp and clear. I love the fact that it connects to wireless internet and I can push the Netflix button and go directly to that website. Very simple to install and a good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: A must Have
Reviews.Author: Carlos Allen
Reviews.Content: Awesome tv set but I wish I would have gotten the 50 inch like I originally wanted too...go get it.

Reviews.Title: Five stars all the way.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Zambrano
Reviews.Content: This TV has met and exceeded all of my expectations and at a bargain price.It was delivered on time and n great condition. Highly recommend this to anyone looking for a TV.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Donna Knoop "roatandonna"
Reviews.Content: A bit confusing to set up with direct tv but TV quality is awesome.  The tv is the right size for the den!

Reviews.Title: Awesome piece from Samsung!
Reviews.Author: Vivek Dahiya
Reviews.Content: What a fabulous piece it is. Thank you Amazon for giving it in a nice price. Love this TV. The picture quality and sound are just amazing. Also, the TV stand makes it the next generation device. I will recommend it highly for everyone.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Amos
Reviews.Content: The picture is wonderful - so nice that it feels like the characters on the shows are right in my living room.  I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: This Samsung is very easy to operate.  It has many features that we currently have at a touch of a button.  Awesome picture.

Reviews.Title: good but few minor glitches
Reviews.Author: Nav
Reviews.Content: They say its full version of a browser,  but its not. It has buffering problems while loading web pages and steaming videos. Otherwise the tv looks good. It would have been better if they have supported google apps.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Jacquelyn King
Reviews.Content: I have had my new TV for 3 weeks and love it! The picture is amazing. It is much easier to navigate than my dad's new LG TV. I also like how many HDMI outlets it has.

Reviews.Title: Everything I hoped for in a Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Vern E Hauck
Reviews.Content: This TV lives up to its reputation.  Setting up proved far easier than the Sony LED Smart TV.  The picture appears sharp and we found the picture adjustments easy to manipulate.  Their built-in sound system sounds good, but we do have to turn it up quite high to understand British accents.  I'd recommend this product to friends for sure.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: riittle
Reviews.Content: i got it for my parents and they are so far afraid to use the internet options on it, but it looks great.  the setup was easy, everything is self-explanatory and simple.  the picture and audio are both great.

Reviews.Title: Christmas TV
Reviews.Author: Karin
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture.  Football games and movies, especially Polar Express, are fabulous to watch.  great buy!!  I think I will go watch some football right now!

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: Overall a pretty great tv. Still working on calibrating the colors... Seems to be a slight red push resulting in reddish skin tones. Not a 5/5 by any means picture quality wise... But nice tv and worth 1300 bucks.

Reviews.Title: More than expected
Reviews.Author: D. Duvos
Reviews.Content: Words do not express how pleased I am with my new TV, so enjoy youts when you get it.. I also bought  Samsung TabletDavid P.

Reviews.Title: very nice smart tv
Reviews.Author: Charles Antoine ZEBLITA
Reviews.Content: Images are very beautiful and the software is pretty quick. I think with a camera it will be perfect.C

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Delvy
Reviews.Content: this is my second samsung tv and i love it. will never buy another brand tv. it has everything i need. cant get any better.

Reviews.Title: Great TV shipping very slow
Reviews.Author: John Kemp
Reviews.Content: Took over two weeks to ship quality of the TV is very good.Picture is good easy to setup.  Bought Vizio soundbar at Costco and got it to work with this unit.  Improves sound quality which is better than sony but not near the quality of the soundbar

Reviews.Title: Picture is excellent, setup is easy.
Reviews.Author: LeeAnne Ekstrom
Reviews.Content: Pro's:  Price - $557 on Amazon.  40 inches of beautiful picture, crisp, sharp, and the auto adjust works well.  Very easy setup both physically and WIFI.  Sounds is okay, will buy external speakers soon.  As a TV - fabulous.Con:  I didn't realize I would be getting such a cheap and almost unusable remote.  Logging into the browser or Netflicks using the remote is almost painful.  I also thought I could get a wireless keyboard to go with this tv...I was incorrect.  I think I would have purchased the more expensive 3d version if I had realized the uselessness of the remote.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding TV
Reviews.Author: Peter N. Mickelson
Reviews.Content: The quality of the picture is second to none.  Watching TV is my primary entertainment.  I love watching this TV and learning the adjustments on it has helped me change the adjustments on my Plasma to improve it's picture toward more like  the picture of this one!

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture at an even better price!
Reviews.Author: Koolaid
Reviews.Content: This is my first smart tv so I wanted to make sure I got one of the best and this Samsung did not disappoint. The UI is really easy to navigate. I expected the picture to be great because I hold Samsung to a higher standard and it still blew me away. The 120Hz refresh is a must have. It mounted very easily seeing as how it's only 20ish pounds. It does very well with glare and the preset video modes are a very nice touch depending on what you are doing with it at the moment. (ie. sports, gaming, movie) I can't wait to hook my Samsung Wireless AirTrack soundbar up to it. One of the best electronic purchases I've made.

Reviews.Title: great tv!
Reviews.Author: R. Reagan
Reviews.Content: The Colors and Picture are out of this world.  It almost looks surreal.  The remote takes a little while to understand what all of the buttons do, and you definitely need a light on to work it.  Would be nice if it had back lighting!! Some reviewers said they had problems with the streaming....we haven't had any problems yet, and we stream movies quite a bit.  ENJOY!

Reviews.Title: Bright Clear Picture!!
Reviews.Author: A. K. CARLSON
Reviews.Content: This smart tv has all the features we need.  And I didn't have to invest in a outside source to connect to my wireless internet.  Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Jesse Wong
Reviews.Content: Pro:very easy to setupExcellent Graphicunder $1000Slim and Smart LED HDTVCon:Sound can be improved, but i have a sound bar, so i don't care.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: Naaman B.
Reviews.Content: I bought the UN65F6300 from amazon warehouse deals. Everything about the TV is great. The delivery people dropped my brand new tv flat on the screen. Luckily nothing was broken and the TV functions fine. The features on this TV are great. I did not know the power of a smart TV. Its awesome. I love using the built in Netflix app even with my Xbox One and PS3 the button is right there on the remote. Games look amazing on it. I mean there is nothing about this TV I don't love. I fully recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Zach
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about a month now.  No complaints so far.  It works great, looks great, and performs great.  This is my 2nd LCD Samsung TV.  I bought my first one 6 years ago and still works perfectly, so hopefully this one holds up the same way!

Reviews.Title: It rocks
Reviews.Author: K. Gottschalk
Reviews.Content: They came and set it up and made sure it worked. What can I say - great picture, great sound (even without external speakers), lots of nifty features I'm still learning how to use. But the big thing - picture quality. For the price I don't think you can beat it. Great smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Woul buy again
Reviews.Author: A. Watley "Hiro"
Reviews.Content: Great product at a great price. Love the new tv and the picture is astounding. Wish the setup was more compatible with my samsung home theater system but I got it to work.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Television - Recommended Buy.
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: Before you become skeptic about buying a television online, don't be. Amazon did a beautiful job packing it. You would have thought I bought a 70'' TV because the outside box was so big, and be ready for a whopping four trash bags filled with packing material. There were absolutely no dings, dents, or holes on the outside box, so UPS did an amazing job with shipping.You know when you go into Wal-Mart and you see that "life-like" television that's ridiculously priced? Yeah, that's this TV but a lot more affordable. WAIT for this Television to go on sale, I got mine as a Cyber Monday deal with 52% off (Or $650 purchase price) If you're willing to open up another credit card, I'd also recommend the Amazon Store Card by G.E. Capital. With that credit card, you receive a certain time-frame with zero interest, and with this TV it's 48 months. However, the major downside is if you go outside of that time-frame, you accrue interest from when you bought the TV.I personally decided to mount my TV, and I also have an "older" 5.1 surround sound also by Samsung. I really like this TV with 4 HDMI ports. That's perfect for me, with my DirecTV box, my 360, my Xbox One, and my PS4. I also like the optical sound port, my 5.1 takes it, and it sounds beautiful. As far as weight goes, it's surprisingly light, I think my old 32'' TV weighed the same.As far as video games go, they all look really beautiful. Anything from Gears of War 3, to Battlefield 4, KillZone Shadow Fall, and Ryse, they all look really really good. This TV has minimal motion blur and several picture settings, so you can get that perfect picture for any game. There is a "game mode" where it accelerates the picture from your console to the TV, but I don't really use it.Even though this is a "Smart TV" I don't use any of it's features. I have three different consoles that can access everything I need "on demand". Instead of using the Samsung remote as my primary remote, I decided to use my DirecTV remote instead.I personally upgraded from a 32'' 720p LCD TV by Emerson. If you are looking to upgrade, I'd highly recommend - I personally bought the 46'' size and it's perfect for my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Second time a charm
Reviews.Author: Zhi Chang "Now and Then"
Reviews.Content: My first TV came with light bleeding on the lower left corner. I called Amazon for an exchange. They sent one in three days. The second one came with no issue. Awesome!I set up with U Lala's recommendation. I have tune down the brightness a little bit for my taste. Other than that, great!The TV came with firmware v1116. It struggles to download the new firmware v1118. At the beginning, I thought it's the wifi connection issue many people mentioned here. But I never have issue to use wifi to watch youtube/hulu. So I think it's the Samsung web support has some problem. Later, I was able to use the usb key to update the firmware to v1117, but not v1118.On my first tv, when you click the app button, it'll go directly to web applications. Simple and straightforward, I really like it. On this TV, the button will direct you to the media hub, which is pretty useless. So far, I haven't found the setting to change the behavior.Overall, the TV is good. Amazon's exchange service is awesome.  The shipping company CEVA is mediocre.  Great holiday purchase!

Reviews.Title: Amazing quality
Reviews.Author: D. Yudowin
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is amazing. I have had no issues with this tv and have been using it nonstop for about a month now. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because some of the menu options are complicated and trying to sync the tv to your media on other devices is overcomplicated in some instances. Highly recommend. Very crisp and sharp colors, even in energy save mode. Video games looks phenomenal on it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent buying experience!!!
Reviews.Author: Nes Lax
Reviews.Content: TV was received ahead of the scheduled delivery time.  Item came in a huge well padded container housing the original packaging - double packed!!! I am very happy with the TV, although screws required to secure the stand are not included in the package - Samsung's fault not the seller.  I had to go out and buy the screws separately (packaging clearly states that screws are not part of the package).

Reviews.Title: Outstanding tv
Reviews.Author: Jay W.
Reviews.Content: TV is great! Have had it 3 weeks, colors crisp, picture almost life like, delivery quick and on time. I highly recommend it

Reviews.Title: Great tv, easy to set up.
Reviews.Author: Marika Sharpe
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up and get Netflix and Amazon instant going. Picture and sound are great. I like the thin frame around the screen so it does not take up more room than it needs to.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 65 Inch TV
Reviews.Author: Roy Braswell
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is excellent.  I thought my projection screen TV of 15 years was still good.  Family convinced me to get a new one. Glad that I did, exceeds expectations.  Coupled it with a Samsung Sound Bar which further adds to the experience.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: MildGamer
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV. 40" is more than enough for any TV and 1080p and 120Hz made it a great deal at $400

Reviews.Title: Superb 32" TV
Reviews.Author: Indianapolis Shopper
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent Smart TV for the space available we had to put it. Works well and would recommend Samsung for Smart TVs..

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: paul
Reviews.Content: My kids love the TV and the picture quality is great. I'm glad I purchased this TV. I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: Ed Stines
Reviews.Content: Most beautiful picture I have ever seen. Smart Hub is just great, integrates with all my other Samsung toys.  I have two of these beauties, one in my bedroom and one in the den.

Reviews.Title: Flat screen
Reviews.Author: ron kendrick
Reviews.Content: Great TV!!! Speakers not so good sound bar will help but picture great!! Took a while to get one not dented but it was worth the wait.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I love it. I don't give it a 5 stars because of the remote control that needs some improvement. If you want to take advantage of its internet features, you need to buy a new one with a keyboard included and or attach a keyboard to it.  Other than that, it is a great tv set.

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: Dolores Gillmore
Reviews.Content: This was the first time I bought a TV on line, so after educating myself about the different LED possibilities this fit my budget and also the stand was graphite grey which blends in better with my cream colored bookshelf. I've had other Samsung products and always was pleased with them so I decided to make the purchase and have not been disappointed. Screen clarity excellent, sound as well.

Reviews.Title: Quality TV
Reviews.Author: Joshua Richard Sampson
Reviews.Content: Very clear picture, easy to use menu, and the smart hub places everything I need or want right there without having to look hard for it.  Great purchase, especially for gamers!!!

Reviews.Title: Unexpected stunning results!
Reviews.Author: M. Rivas "Wood Elf"
Reviews.Content: Stunning picture, great sound and overall great buy! Will definitely be buying this brand and model series in the future to replace my next LCD!

Reviews.Title: This Samsung LED TV is a very excellent choice.
Reviews.Author: Kim Kang-il
Reviews.Content: This Samsung LED TV is a very excellent choice.This TV is better than expected performance or functional like a good product.

Reviews.Title: Happy after one week
Reviews.Author: Clark Willis
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for one week. My first smartv. I had a 7 year old Sony LCD. Picture is very good for the price. It was easy to set up. Blurring on sports seem to be network related just like my Sony.  Football on NBC seems to blur more. My only complaint so far is volume does not adjust external speakers.  Very slim and light, with a sleek design and look. The stand actually has personality versus a standard black base. I hope to get 5+ years out of it and I will do an update in 6 months.

Reviews.Title: Logged out constantly
Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: I have a good wifi connection, however, netflix would constantly log me out, amazon video would stop playback, etc. The lack of a qwerty remote made the constant login/password typing unbearable. Oftentimes, netflix would simply remove my member account from the tv and I had to reactivate it twice.The tv has great features, but to have issues 50% of the time I just wanted to sit and watch a movie made it not worth the trouble. I have a sony blue ray player that has the "apps" I need as well as a roku

Reviews.Title: So Glad I Bought This TV
Reviews.Author: M. De Forge
Reviews.Content: I'm a very picky consumer. My wife will tell you I can spend hours at a store before making a big purchase like this comparing, doing research on my phone, and trying to find the best price. I've never really bought a Samsung product before, but I really wanted quality of picture over features and size, and I definitely found that in this TV! The picture is phenomenal and easily one of the best I saw in the store. I was a little sceptical at first because I read several reviews that bashed the App's on the TV, but I have found zero problems with them. Maybe it was because I allowed my TV to update right when I got it. Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon all work great. I also played a video off a flash drive with no problem at all. This TV, however, doesn't have the best of sound quality. Don't get me wrong, it's passable and doesn't often bother me, but I will definitely be picking up a speaker system sometime soon. I recommend staying away from audio profiles too (Like movie, voice, etc). I was watching the latest Bond with it, and there was some audio artifacting going on. I'm not knocking a star because you can expect crappy audio from pretty much every TV out there.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, good features, very clean look
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV.  Very clean look.  I thought about stepping up to the 6400 to get micro-dimming, but the black-levels on this one are fantastic.  Very easy to set up and use.  The smart apps are well integrated and even non-technical people can use them.  Plenty of connection options and having Wi-Fi built-in is a nice plus.

Reviews.Title: bEST TV!
Reviews.Author: marcio midence
Reviews.Content: AMAZING! This Samsung has amazing quality! the picture is so clear and video games play,look and sound great. best investment iv made all year.

Reviews.Title: A Lot of TV for the Money
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This was a great deal. It was fairly easy to set up but it will take me a while to figure out all the features. The picture is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase ever!
Reviews.Author: Brunie
Reviews.Content: Soooo happy with my HDTV. Samsung is the best. Great Resolution, easy to install all the new gadgets! Great Price!

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV
Reviews.Author: Thasham P.
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV great for games and movies. Many features to adjust the way the tv performs to suit your needs. Energy saving and game modes. The backlight on this tv is extremely good you can see this tv perfectly with the sun on it or just interior lights on right next to it. Plays games flawlessly amazing picture and the sound is great too no need for a sound bar.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Much as Advertised and More
Reviews.Author: Tomintx "Tom"
Reviews.Content: Outstanding picture quality.  Easy setup, only catch was Wi Fi would connect but did not allow access to Samsung server (Smart Hub), that is until after a couple of days when software firmware updates appeared. After installing latest  v1118 revision, everything connected and was able to set up the Hub and apps. Netflix (existing account) and Web Browser work flawlessly. Successfully installed inexpensive (read; Walmart) Logitec MK320 keyboard and mouse combo, makes web surfing a lot easier.  Very happy so far with everything.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality alone is enough to buy this.
Reviews.Author: Ted
Reviews.Content: Picture is unbeatable for the price. The all-in-one "smart-portion" of TV is a bit laggy but nothing that the picture can't make up for.

Reviews.Title: IR extender not link with Dish set top box
Reviews.Author: William S. Tennant
Reviews.Content: Purchased this model from BJs-- their model 6350. Set up was accurately described in the literature, and went as directed with one major exception: the IR extender will not accept my satellite set top box, Dish model VIP622 DVR. A computer savvy friend could not make it work;Samsung customer service did not focus on the problem (although very polite---she tried), and the Samsung internet chat site has not answered my request for assistance (but did acknowledge receipt of my request. I think Samsung wants to sell me an individualized support program ("Stop"), but have not contacted that site yet. Has anyone had experience with this issue AND been able to solve it? I recall one reviewer had the same problem, I think with a cable set top box, and had to buy an aftermarket remote to controll the tv and  the set top box with one instrument. I do not want to go that route.Except for the above the tv set works perfectly, and the picture is outstanding. I highly recommend this model IF you can get your wife over the hurdle of its size! It is BIG!

Reviews.Title: Power problem
Reviews.Author: J. Waters
Reviews.Content: There was a power problem that required service. The TV stopped working after one week. The power cord did not fit properly in the rear of the unit

Reviews.Title: Great so far!
Reviews.Author: Dennis Eric Merryman
Reviews.Content: So far I am absolutely enjoying this T.V without any downsides except for the T.V's stand it is rather unimpressive compared to the television. I've been looking for a T.V with just the right size without lacking in quality, this has all the bells and whistles I was looking for a few I didn't but are welcomed. This is a recent review so I will add more after extensive uses.

Reviews.Title: Packing is super as mentioned in the terms and quality of product is good. screen clarity is super.
Reviews.Author: Prathap
Reviews.Content: Its awesome. Packing is super as mentioned in the terms and quality of product is good. screen clarity is super.

Reviews.Title: Smart buy.
Reviews.Author: eleazar
Reviews.Content: This a great product, Samsung led smart tv, is everything what I expected. Wifi, app and it sounds super loud. Outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV, perfect quality, perfect picture, perfect price.
Reviews.Author: Kooshy "Koosh"
Reviews.Content: This TV has an incredibly beautiful picture. And with the Samsung name, you know that you're getting an excellent product.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Owen Sexton
Reviews.Content: Came a day earlier than predicted, easy assembly, it pretty much set itself up, all I had to do was keep hitting next, and enter my wifi password. It even updated itself and I was still watching tv withing 15 minutes of setting it up. Picture quality is amazing, navigation of the smart tv menu is easy, great tv.

Reviews.Title: Excellent So Far
Reviews.Author: C. Snead "STi  Mtn  Man"
Reviews.Content: Purchased at Sam's for $848 during a 2 hr. special...had been watching it on Amazon for several weeks and while all companies have some negatives on the web, Samsung seems to be doing a great job for me. My only disappointment is the Smart TV. It is clumsy...but I have smart phones and a computer for internet activity. Picture and sound are excellent and I'd certainly buy it again...even for a few dollars more.

Reviews.Title: Great TV. You can pick it up for $900 if you look around.
Reviews.Author: ss "ss"
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Has that great LED Soap Opera effect. Amazing picture quality. Apps work very well.  Two complaints. 1. You'll have to adjust brightness at times depending on what you're watching. It defaults to being a little too dark (i.e Watching Batman).2. The speakers are OK. WE bought a sound system to compensate.... Other than that.........excellent TV, excellent value.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS TV
Reviews.Author: Jenny Box
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just purchased this TV for our bedroom.  WE LOVE IT!  We have only had it running a few days, but it was our Christmas present to one another.  Navigation and setup in very simple.  We run cable internet wireless.  Have had no problems.  Like twice the sound got off, but that happens when you stream anything.  The picture is AMAZING.  I am SUPER pleased with this TV and I know my husband is too.  Also, I shopped for this TV for a long time in many retail stores.  No one was able to beat this price-- and I was BLACK FRIDAY/Cyber Monday shopping.

Reviews.Title: 55" samsung smart led
Reviews.Author: Robyn
Reviews.Content: Love this TV! Shipping was fast. The tv is so like new you cannot even tell it has been referbished ! The picture is clear, no lag or pixelization. Extremely satisfied !

Reviews.Title: Best TV I have purchased.
Reviews.Author: Stephen Quisenberry
Reviews.Content: Can't go wrong.  Great TV with Great smart products.  Setup is easy with a very slick interface.  Bought 12 of these for mobile conference stations and couldn't be happier.  Great job Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great video & looks
Reviews.Author: A. Sybilrud
Reviews.Content: Great edge to edge color, excellent contrast, and one of the prettier TV's in it's class.  I'm not using any of the smart features (already use a Apple TV for most of that), but it's nice to have.  Enough HDMI inputs & USB for most needs.

Reviews.Title: Great gift!
Reviews.Author: George Z. Marootian "g"
Reviews.Content: Sent as a gift recently, and it was extremely well received!  The HD picture is absolutely amazing, whether it's 6' away, or 20' away.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: DLB
Reviews.Content: Great product!!!!  It was easy to set up. The Smart feature is great and we now have Netflix and it is a good source for movies and documentaries.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Melrose McDonald
Reviews.Content: This TV has met my expectations and more.The picture quality is great, high resolution, easy to use and great for the family.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Steven A. Gallo
Reviews.Content: The shipper had huge problems getting this TV to me.  It took way too long and I honestly feel that if I hadn't followed up on it, and been persistent, I never would have received it.  But, I did eventually get it and it works great and has an awesome picture.  The smart TV functions are good.  I would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Gary Butler "G"
Reviews.Content: This TV is working as advertised.  Great picture quality and sound.  So far, I am happy with my purchase.  If anything changes, I will let you know.

Reviews.Title: Fast, Neat, Average, Freindly, Good, Good
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey W. Hess "J-Dub"
Reviews.Content: OK, I recognize that only a few of you will understand the title (Class of '77; it's amazing what you remember).  We love this TV.  Only complaint might be the black level.  When the screen is blank, I can see a little fog.  Looks great on our big fireplace wall.

Reviews.Title: I bought it for 800 expecting a great TV, and it turned out to be incredible.
Reviews.Author: Slayner
Reviews.Content: The picture looks better then I expected, it's truly a high-end top quality televion. My last TV was an LG 42 inch 1080p 120hz, and this is still a vast improvement. I couldn't be happier for how inexpensive this was in comparison to some others.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Saurabh
Reviews.Content: Amazing picture quality and sound. Smart TV features are pretty easy to navigate. Easy to sync up features in youtube and other features.I am loving it ! :-)

Reviews.Title: Samsung Purchase
Reviews.Author: kevin
Reviews.Content: Delivery was on time and the setup in the home was very professional. Picture is the best. As good as my 41 inch Samsung

Reviews.Title: Documentation
Reviews.Author: Agnes Bedard "Rusty"
Reviews.Content: Easy installation, the documentation needs page numbers to help find subject matter -  and wish there was "how to's" for loading photos and other files.

Reviews.Title: Great smart TV
Reviews.Author: Locke Newlin "varied interests"
Reviews.Content: Did not realize I would enjoy so much. Wonderful picture. Watch movies on Amazon Prime, Netflix and more.Junked 6 year old top of line Sony Bravia (1080)Haven't regretted it. Worth the money

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Dan Bonicatto
Reviews.Content: The picture is fantastic. The one thing I can't figure out is why my surround sound works better with this TV than my previous one.  I guess I don't need to figure it out and I can just appreciate it.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Ted K "TK"
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic TV. The High Def is awesome, the Amazon prime streaming function is outrageous!! My only squabble would be set up, it ain't that easy, and I am tech savvy. But like a car, smartphone, new computer, there is a get to know it period. If you do not have an HD smart tv, this is a great one and a really great Amazon, delivered to your door, product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: specialkkl
Reviews.Content: Only had the TV for a little while, but am extremely happy!  Picture is great.My main reason for getting this particular TV was for Amazon Prime app.  It is very well intigrated into the TV.  Even has a button on the remote dedicated to Amazon Prime launch.  There is also a button for Netflix.I was worried by many of the issues descirbed throughout the reviews, but i do not seem to have or be able to recognize these issues at this time.  I think sometimes the reviewers are much more picky than the average user and notice things i would not.Setup took 10 minutes.  I plan on buyer a couple other UNXXF6300s for the bedrooms and dumping cable!

Reviews.Title: Enjoying TV more
Reviews.Author: Shirley Williams
Reviews.Content: Like being in the movies or at the games.  Can't imagine what took me so long.  Can't wait to add more devices to the set.

Reviews.Title: best 32 inch tv you can get
Reviews.Author: Daniel V Valent
Reviews.Content: This TV is not sold in Canada. So i had to buy it off Amazon. I am using it for my PC monitor and gaming TV and its the best display for this purpose. It has very good processing power for high motion and an excellent response time for fast paced gaming.  Its too bad these are not sold in Canadian stores as its the best 32 inch TV you can get.I had tried the high end Sony 32' tv that claimed 120hz and it was garbage compared to this Samsung (for the same price).This tv is for gamers and is the best display you can hook up to your PC. Do not buy a 60hz tv if you want something for a computer/gaming display. Get the UN32F6300 or better. The extra money spent is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: SMARTer than me
Reviews.Author: gaillee
Reviews.Content: Where have we been, watching an old flatscreen all these years...We are considered to be dinosaurs by our children, and yes we did have to get a "techie" to walk us through, but we love it.  We listen to music, stream movies & old shows.  Couldn't live without it now

Reviews.Title: An amazing picture you would expect from Samsung
Reviews.Author: M. Goulet "Matt"
Reviews.Content: This is like being at the games, even better when you don't have your home team anywhere near you. The picture quality and "Smart" tv functions are everything you would expect from Samsung and then some.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Peter D'Amico
Reviews.Content: The TV has proved to be a fantastic TV! It has many apps... Is easy to use... The picture quality is fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Samsung smart tv get one!
Reviews.Author: Denny Biberston
Reviews.Content: This tv is best one I every had. It was simple to set up and the pitcher is sweet and the fact it has all the apps and wifi too the web browser it is out of this world!

Reviews.Title: Good Picture
Reviews.Author: J. CAMILLERI
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. Good picture quality and I am used to my other tv which is a Kuro. I shut off the motion smoothing as it looked unnatural.

Reviews.Title: Great look
Reviews.Author: J. Hallock "JTB"
Reviews.Content: Show up with a damaged box but the tv was fine.  Slim profile and it looks great on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Zach
Reviews.Content: Pro-This TV works amazingly.Hooked up to my network with a program called "Serviio" to seamlessly stream 1080p video from my  pc.the picture quality is top notch.the 120hz really shows when it comes to gaming.can't wait to use it with a ps4-ConMy tv mount makes it hard to plug in Component/composite cablesbuilt in Netflix app can be a little sluggish

Reviews.Title: Very very easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Peter Miller "Peter"
Reviews.Content: Very impressive tv, and very affordable. The picture on this tv is stunning, both resolution and colors.And the user interface  does not require any technical skill to learn or use. When I took the tv out of thebox I was a little concerned about the quality of this tv, because it weighs so little. It's freaky light inweight. But it's a top notch tv. But, it's difficult to screw the screws into the base, At first I thoughtthey included the wrong size screws, but you just need to apply a lot of pressure. Glad I bought thisproduct.

Reviews.Title: Great.
Reviews.Author: Nidhi Gupta
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV, its great Samsung has really improved and have worked on the interface of the apps. Sometimes the apps like amazon video get hangs, but just by refreshing it works just fine. I have no complains its a great and a must buy TV!!

Reviews.Title: Exellent
Reviews.Author: Rafael Rincon F
Reviews.Content: Excellent product I am very happy with the order is of good quality and I recommend it is very practical use

Reviews.Title: Best TV for the money
Reviews.Author: A. Harris
Reviews.Content: It has everything you could ask for in a new tv. The price is very good and what you get is definitely worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Smart t.v.
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Lee
Reviews.Content: This is a good t.v. for fair price. Great quality tv would highly reccdomend.This smart t,v, can perform many task.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: HerbHen
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my father-in-law.  It replaced a 21 inch one that he had.  He loves it--the picture quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: David Bendert
Reviews.Content: The picture is better than expected. The sound is above average. The set up was easy. Very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great video quality
Reviews.Author: sang young oh
Reviews.Content: easy to set up, safe packaging, very light, and it's Samsung.Smart TV function works great. I thought it will be some what laggy and slow but it works nicely.I can watch Amazon Prime, youtube & netflix just fine.One thing that bothers me is the sound quality.Speaker seems to be too small to produce bass, and it makes funny sound.I solved the issue by using my Bose hometheater system.Great TV.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!!
Reviews.Author: JV
Reviews.Content: We all know Samsung is the #1 TV in the market, but this one is available for a steal basically. Smart Slim LED HDTV is definitely the way to go. Could not be happier!

Reviews.Title: Samsung smsrt tv from amazon
Reviews.Author: Eugene Luksha
Reviews.Content: Hardware is very good. Software for smart tv very difficult to use. Excellent picture, resolution and color.Delivery an setup great.E

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: Love my new tv.  I looks good, the smart features are wonderful, and it is easy to use!  Perfect for what I was looking for:)

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Mary Anne
Reviews.Content: Great Smart TV.  Like that with Samsung you have free access to HBO GO provided that you are a HBO subscriber.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Ahmed
Reviews.Content: This is the best TV I have had so far, I have a 60 in Vizio E60 and it is almost as good as this one but of course no one can beat Samsung when it comes to displays clarity.I purchased the Samsung 46 inch tv and I gotta tell you I was shocked how light this thing is, I have this one for my bedroom and before it I owned a Sony bravia  XBR and we all know the problems this tv had with its display, now sony tv had a wonderful picture just like this samsung except the screen went out on it as it was a common problem in this brand, and I am actually very surprised at the sound of this tv, it has a very clear loud sound way better than other thin led tvs and we all know in order to have a very thin light tv you have to sacrifice something and most of the time it is the speaks but this one got a very clear sound.I am so very satisfied with this tv as I am with almost everything Samsung makes, I totally recommend this tv and for this price it beats other more expensive unknown brands.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Noel
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my father.  Once we got it hooked up to his WiFi, it works great.  He can easily watch Amazon Prime, Netflix and his satellite.The refresh rate is great.  It is a solid performer.

Reviews.Title: Samsung F6300 series
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: Lightning killed my older t.v which was an older CRT model.  All I can say is this t.v is awesome!  Should have gone to a flat panel t.v years ago although I wouldn't have had the choice of getting this model.  It was easy to set up, it has the E-manual on screen and takes you by the hand and leads you through the set up.  This model has 4 HDMI inputs along with RCA inputs/outputs, digital audio In/output.  For my applications it proved to be adaquate.  Gettin online is no prowlem with a built in browser.  I'm still finding new Apps. to try out.  I wasn't dissabpinted and I don't think you will be either.

Reviews.Title: Really great buy!
Reviews.Author: Dean E. Kroft
Reviews.Content: If you are not interested in not having 3D which I'm not this is the best buy you can get. Shipping was free with Amazon prime and it even included white glove delivery. Love the price and the picture.

Reviews.Title: SmartTV? More like AdTV
Reviews.Author: David Cook
Reviews.Content: Pros:Picture is beautiful. Remote is nice.Cons:Needs a DVI port,The apps are slow and have limited functionality. The YouTube app autoplays some unrelated garbage as soon as your selected video finishes, instead of the usual experience of being able to replay or click on a video of your choice. You should switch to using YouTube in the web browser.By default, the TV turns on with a 'guide' full of advertisements. However, there is a setting that allows you to start on an input instead.But, what makes this TV unacceptable is when a pop up ad for Yahoo appeared about 10 minutes into a movie I was playing from a DVD on one of the inputs. I kid you not. I wasn't playing in an app, it wasn't something 'free', but a standard store-bought DVD. At that point, I disconnected the TV from the internet.When you pay this much for a TV, the intelligent features should add value, not detract. With the ads, Samsung got greedy and forgot who their customer was.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Janey Mitchell "Janey M"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it.  I have shut off my cable which was expensive and I watched little of what was offered.  I have since downloaded HulaPlus, Netflix and have access to Amazon videos etc as a prime member.  I'm as happy as a lark.  I purchased RCA antennas thru amazon in order to watch local stations and local news.  I have saved about $70/mo buy doing this.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!!
Reviews.Author: DKMM
Reviews.Content: I have been in the AV industry for over 16 years. Most of that was spent installing, but now I have my own AV company and lean towards Samsung TV's for almost all of my jobs.Having a theater room with a 3D projector and 120" screen makes me not care about 3D for all my other every day viewing TV's. I have seen most of Samsung 6300 series TV's and own three within the 6300 series. The picture quality is very crisp and clean. I have the 75" in my family room, 65" in my master bedroom, and the 55" in my children's playroom. All of them have Directv HD boxes and an Apple TV plugged directly into the TV. I also have a Plex Media server streaming content through the built in Plex App (built in to all the Samsung Smart TV's).

Reviews.Title: Best 32 inch You Will Find
Reviews.Author: MCistheway2B
Reviews.Content: I have been looking to upgrade from my 32inch Insignia 1080p tv of about 4 years, it was great but really does not come close to top tier brands like Samsung/Sony. This Samsung 32inch tv seriously BLOWS it out of the water and looks so crisp and beautiful in my room. It was exactly what a wanted: a 32inch, 1080p, true 120hertz(clear motion of 240), and LED. This tv really looks physically beautiful with how slim it is and its thin silver frame. With a variety of picture settings to play with that can be somewhat of a headache at times, I found several different calibration settings around the net and adjusted them a little more to my taste in Movie mode. The ability to set the 10-point white balance adjustment made a major difference. Now, even basic cable looks 'almost' HD, Crysis3 on my PS3 looked phenomenal with deep blacks and beautiful picture, Hulu/Netflix HD is very detailed, and Blue ray is just spectacular in every category.Smart TV:I wasn't really into the whole smart tv aspect since I run several of the same apps through my PS3 and I felt that labeling it as "smart" just allows Samsung to charge more to the customers.However, now that I have used it and gotten to browse many of its features, it works very well and makes for a seamless viewing experience being able to switch from cable->netflix->hulu with just a few buttons. Using the control to type and search for content is much better than I expected, though a keyboard/mouse would obviously be much better. It also has a very nice feature where if I ever want to rent or buy a movie, I just pull up the "Movie/TV Show" frame of the smarthub and a huge variety of content is waiting for me to be rented. The price is higher then redbox or other rental services, but you can't beat the convenience of having all this in your tv.So far I cannot think of any cons, except maybe that the base of the tv is a little funky looking and the price is a bit high for a 32 inch(the model below this was 60hertz and no smart hub for $480). Other than that, it's true what they say in that you get what you pay for and this Samsung tv is exactly what I was looking for and exceeded my expectations, well worth the extra cash. I definitely recommend to everyone in the market looking for a smaller, yet powerful HD tv.

Reviews.Title: Beware of samsung. Customer service is worst in class.
Reviews.Author: CANTSTANDYA19
Reviews.Content: Our tv worked fine for about three weeks.  Then, the screen developed a vertical green line that permanently ran across the display. We contacted Samsung, but they were extremely unhelpful. Rather than standing behind their product, they subcontracted the job out to a local repair shop.  This repair shop did not show up for two appointments in a row and when they finally did they concluded that we needed a new screen. When they tried to install it they pulled another defective Samsung product out of the box and told us they would have to reschedule the appointment when they get a new part.  At this point we had invested 20 hours of talking to Samsung customer service, waiting for samsung outsourced repairmen to show up (and them not showing or calling to cancel), etc. We finally gave up dealing with samsung and contacted amazon who let us return the defective product to them. Thanks Amazon!  As for Samsung, I've never been treated with such disrespect and will never buy another Samsung product again.

Reviews.Title: very thanks...
Reviews.Author: Seungyoon Jeong
Reviews.Content: There is a lack of English.Please understand that...Arrived in Korea today.Good product..Good use of it..I'll use.very very thanks...^_^

Reviews.Title: UN75F6300 completely glossy mirror like screen
Reviews.Author: Ravi Shanghavi
Reviews.Content: Hugely disappointed, I wouldn't recommend this TV to anyone who doesn't live in dark basement or cave setting.  It completely reflects light, windows behind you?  Expect to see them in their full glory in your tv.  We can't watch tv in the daytime, and at night, we have to shut off every lamp light in the area to cease reflections.I'm not a AV or picture nut, I don't calibrate, or over analyze.  But I do just want to see my screen.  This UH02 panel has got clouding, and the gloss is so high, I called Samsung for repair replacement, they refused and told me to return it to the store.  They wouldn't even consider the fact their manual says in home warranty repair/replacement service is what's provided for this TV.  It's like the panel didn't get any film coat at all.  Looks defectively glossy.Big disappointment, I feel like I burned money, and downgraded from my 60" Sharp 832U series.

Reviews.Title: Great TV not that smart
Reviews.Author: Yedidya
Reviews.Content: Amazing TV, the smart features are not that good. I am having trouble with the wireless. The TV has a Roku and a chromecast attached, both stream well, I would expect it to work without either...

Reviews.Title: Solid TV
Reviews.Author: B. Huebscher "huebs"
Reviews.Content: Looks great. Powers on quickly. Easy to set up and extremely easy to use -- which was the most significant consideration due it being a gift for my 60-year-old father (who wishes we all still used DOS and resents the existence of cell phones). However, the "smart" features (which never had a chance of actually being use) were hard for me, a computer programmer, to figure out. You'd be better off getting an Apple TV or using a game console to access Netflix, Hulu Plus, HBO Go, and/or any other streaming services with the TV.Note that the "screen sharing feature" only works with Android Phones (and possible only Samsung's Galaxy line -- I was unable to test this due to the fact that I haven't been able to get my one friend who uses an Android phone to come by and test it out with me).But even if you never even open up the "smart" interface, it is still a solid TV that I'd highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Screen and Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: Drew M. Zimmerman
Reviews.Content: The first LED TV that I received had some dead pixel areas as well as stuck pixel areas and ghosting of the dark images on the left hand side of the screen. I contacted customer service, and they told me they would send me out a new one, and all I had to do was to ship the one I had back to them! Excellent customer service representative and I was only out my television for an extra day. The second one that I received is and has been ever since flawless. No pixelation areas, no ghosting, this is the best looking screen I have seen on a LED to date. I am extremely happy with the purchase. All Pros. Good job Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Best 32" TV Available
Reviews.Author: Tman
Reviews.Content: After researching all the 32" HDTVs available, it was clear to me that the Samsung UN32F6300 was the obvious choice. Since Samsung significantly improved their SmartTV inferface, I was anxious to get one and give it a try. So I ordered one on Wednesday at 3:30pm and received it on Thursday at 1:30 pm! Kudos to Amazon Prime!Set up was very easy and I had no problems connecting to our new DirecTV service. After initializing the system and downloading the firmware update, I spent a couple enjoyable hours just scanning through all the SmartTV offerings. With the dual core processor, everything flowed quite smoothly.I had read about several concerns regarding WiFi drop out and was prepared to wire directly to a Netgear WiFi extender, but having watched a couple of movies via Amazon Instant and Hulu, I have had no problems whatsoever with the built-in WiFi.The picture clarity is outstanding, the Smart TV is loads of fun, and the sound is fine for our master bedroom. I highly recommend this product and Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Customer Service is Horrible
Reviews.Author: Barry A Depew
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Samsung TV several months ago and just got around to installing it this weekend. After two hours of installing wires and wall mounting the TV I learned the remote control was DOA. (I was smart enough to turn the TV on prior to install). After proving to myself the remote was bad (changed batteries, tried to reset remote per manual,other Samsung remotes worked fine with this TV), I called Samsung Customer Service. After making me do all of the above two more times, they told me I needed a new remote. They then asked me for the Model Number and Serial Number which I read them off of the box. They then told me the TV S/N Plate had one extra letter at the end of the S/N that could only be found on the back of the TV. When I explained that it would take me over an hour to remove the TV to get the "letter", they said sorry, it was company policy. I pleaded saying it was just like the other two Samsung remotes in my home...once again, no letter, no remote. I appealed for a supervisor, was placed on hold for ten minutes, then finally told a supervisor would call me back. Hours later, I found a message on my phone from a supervisor who said she was returning my call, that I should call back at my convieniance, but left no return number.I called the number on my caller id. It was Samsung, but after going through all my info again, they told me it was the DVD Tech support and that I had to talk to TV Division. When I finally got through again, they insisted on the "letter". I gave up, removed the TV, got the "letter, called back. They looked at the records, said all they needed was the full serial number, confirmed they "now had all they needed" and then told me that someone would call me back within 48 hours to get more info so they could send me a new remote! It has been 24 hours, no one has called. It appears I am going to need to box this lemon of a TV up and send it back to Amazon....

Reviews.Title: UN46f6300 - perfect choice for my needs
Reviews.Author: nb_nyc
Reviews.Content: this is my first flat screen tv and i did a LOT of research.  i wanted something with good resolution, a good refresh rate but without the interpolated frames per second which give the picture and artificial look.  i did not want 3d nor did i need a fancy remote.  i wanted wifi built in, and of course a great picture.i am thoroughly satisfied and happy with this purchase.the picture is stunning, the sound is better than id expect with a flat-panel tv.the smart features work very well and are easy to use.  the smart system is not as well architected as it might be, but the unser interface is good enough that with one or two extra clicks of the remote you can do what you want to do.the wifi in particular has been wonderful, as my cable tv went out a week after i received the tv, but i was able to watch hbo-go wirelessly until the cable tech got here a few days later.  the streaming was flawless for me.  i have not yet tried it streaming from my laptop or tablet but i imagine it will work just as well.as another reviewer mentioned, the stand does not feel sturdy enough, but i plan to mount this on the wall, so that is not a real "con" for me - anything of these dimensions will be unsteady on a stand.if you are looking for a great flat-panel LCD-LED without 3D or extra bels and whistles, definitely check out the unf6300 series

Reviews.Title: Just hope nothing goes wrong...
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: UPDATE: Since I wrote the review below, the TV continued to show more defects in the form of constant solid lines that run vertically. The good news is that Samsung has finally agreed to replace the television, for which I am grateful. Just for the improved customer service, I will increase my rating (for those that care). Once delivered, if the new TV is of good quality, I'll completely update my review...Thanks!This is the first bad review I've ever had to write. I bought the Samsung HD Smart TV (Model# UN75F6300) on Amazon, and it worked fine for the first couple months. In the third month, it developed a "stuck pixel", whereas an ever-present blue dot would appear on the screen. Over time, it continues to get worse, brighter & more noticeable. I contacted Samsung & they informed me this was considered "within specs" and there was nothing they would do to fix it...that it "may" fix itself. Over a month later, as mentioned, it has gotten worse. When I purchased the TV, I had an expectation to get enjoyment out of it for more than a couple short months, especially after spending several thousand dollars on it. Samsung essentially told me that even though I just spent over $3K on a new television that was shown to have a manufacturer defect, I must basically just deal with it. Afterall, they already have my money. Unfortunately, Amazon was not able to provide any assistance. Needless to say, I will not purchase any large electronics from Amazon again, and I will most assuredly never buy a Samsung product ever again. Samsung's so-called "customer service" was the worst I've ever experienced. Hopefully this can prevent others from making the same mistake I have. Not a recommended product.

Reviews.Title: they don't last
Reviews.Author: edward martin
Reviews.Content: I got my 1st one , it died in 3 days. The second lasted almost 4 months. Working on getting it replaced or repaired. Total pain , they seem to be expensive junk.

Reviews.Title: THis model is discontinued  so, decide what you want by reading all of the reviews.  The proce of the tvs arent going to decreas
Reviews.Author: Jenny Bastian
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice TV .  Just as yu would expect a Samsung device to be.  However, after reading some of the other reviews about the slowness of the internal processor - I kinda wish I would have just bought a larger screened VISIO 'Dumb' tv.This TV is not for everyone.  Dont expect to have it up and running the first hr or two straight out of the box.  I liked the remote that came with the set, but ...we ended having to use the one from our local cable company (which is a monserish bulky piece of krap).Any way if yu dont mind having no choice but to ue the Samsung hub ( unless you research a way around this).  I say go for it.I have mixed feelings on this.I did appreciate the time and energy that some tech. savey reviewers spent trying to educate prosepective buyers of this unit.  SInce this product is now discontinued - ya might jhust want to see what new comes along.  DOnt be swayed by the new 240 refresh rate on the 2014 models - to the avaerage tv watcher - it doesnt make a difference at all.J.

Reviews.Title: Great tv! If your wifi signal is weak, get a range extender.
Reviews.Author: booklady
Reviews.Content: I love this tv.  I bought this after our older plasma tv developed a big green blob on the screen and severe burn in. The picture on this Samsung is so bright and beautiful. I've only made a few adjustments. I have the auto motion tuned off except when watching sports. Maybe I'll get used to it for regular programming after awhile but for now I'm leaving it off.This tv is located in a very bright room with lots of windows. There is some glare but it's not bothersome. Of course, I have the tv facing away from the windows, which helps.The remote is not the greatest. The button placement is strange, at least for me. I can't get it to work well with our directv box but that's not a big deal to me. I've been wanting to buy a new learning universal remote anyway. I do love the Netflix and Amazon buttons.We had trouble with the wifi signal dropping but since the router is pretty far away from the tv, I just installed a range extender and now it is working fine.

Reviews.Title: One Great TV
Reviews.Author: J. Coulter
Reviews.Content: I love the  picture on this LED, I had a Plasma before this and the picture on this TV is much better. It almost looks 3D there is so much depth to the picture. The smart features are great.  I use it with PLEX to watch my stored movies off my server.  the Netflix and Amazon Prime movie interfaces are very solid.  The best TV I have owned to date.

Reviews.Title: Love it!  Samsung makes the best TVs!
Reviews.Author: MARC PETTIGREW
Reviews.Content: At first I got a little motion sick watching this TV.  Picture is excellent.  This my 3rd Samsung TV. AWESOME

Reviews.Title: The perfect bedroom tv
Reviews.Author: David A. Dini
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice television !  Very clear picture with great color, however when the set displays a black screen there is some blotchyness that to me is acceptable but nonetheless unwanted. I can't seem to notice it when it displays anything else.  The wifi picks up with a 3/4 signal evens though the router is about 30' away. The optical audio signal is great , no noise and very dynamic. One downfall is that the cable comes straight out of the rear of the set and sticks out nearly 2". I say this because if you intend to wall mount this set you will need to clearance the wall ( I drilled two holes with a 5/8 hole saw vertically) so I could get the set on the wall mount bracket without damaging the cable or set.This set looks like an older 35" because it has very little border around the display. I was almost disappointed when I first saw it thinking the set was too small but as soon as it's powered up it's a big screen

Reviews.Title: Great TV, not quite "used-like new"
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased a used-like new TV.  When I opened the box the back of the TV had scrapes on it and a 2-in section of the side of the bezel was missing.  The TV seems to function fine but I was a little disappointed by the condition.As far as the functionality of the picture I think this TV has a great picture.  I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Universal Remote
Reviews.Author: Carol G Rosini
Reviews.Content: Love the set but neither your tech support or Samsung's tech support were able to make the remote control the dish satellite box so I am having to use two remote controls.  That is a bummer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product !
Reviews.Author: Ku Janam
Reviews.Content: Excellent product !  Our family more likes than me. Thank you for Amazon's shopping supports. We will enjoy it very long time.

Reviews.Title: Broken after less than 3 months
Reviews.Author: Edmond Lau
Reviews.Content: After less than 3 months of regular usage, have to return the TV as it reboots itself and can't get through the initial splash screens.Unfortunately, it is unclear why this was happened.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV Purchase
Reviews.Author: Camille Birmelin
Reviews.Content: What a fantastic television.  Slim, sharp, gorgeous design, feel like I died and went to heaven.  Views like I am right there in the picture itself.  The delivery was fantastic.  I was given a window for delivery and the delivery folks set up the TV and removed all the packaging for me. Great purchase, thank you.

Reviews.Title: Big bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Sisu Vesimchu "Sisu Ve Simchu"
Reviews.Content: The colors are wonderful, some may not like them for personal reasons, but we do. The size is amazing, at first we thought 65" TV would be a bit too much, well, if you think a foot long sandwich is too much for a hungry man, than 65" TV is too much for a TV lover.The Smart aspect of the TV is wonderful and oft used: we go between Amazon Prime, Hulu2 and regular TV with extreme ease. It is even Internet capable without a computer; not that I would recommend it for surfacing.The sound is nice, but on occasions we prefer our Stereo hook up.The remote is very easy to use, in fact, it knew how to operate our Directv box without any calls to customer service.We mounted it on the wall, so I cannot tell you how the stand is, and my recommendation is; do the same.over all, we have had the TV for a month and we still love it, and our friends are still awed by it.

Reviews.Title: Review of the 65" UN65F6300
Reviews.Author: Chuck "Chuck"
Reviews.Content: I've been purchasing several "returned" Amazon products the past few years and have yet to be disappointed.  This TV was about $120 cheaper than a brand-new unopened TV.Amazon.com does a great job with shipping TV's too; I was given several delivery date/time options upon placing my order.  Then, to make things even better, the delivery company Amazon uses, calls me two days prior to delivery, and indicates they were ahead of their schedule, and would I like to have the TV delivered a day earlier -- What a nice surprise!The one-man delivery crew arrived on-time, removed all of the box materials, plugged-in the TV to ensure it worked, and can you believe this, he even helped me remove my old, heavy (just under 100 lbs.) plasma TV from the wall before he left.  Now that IS excellent service!The TV had no blemishes or scratches and worked well out of the box.  I fine-tuned my TV picture settings from recommendations on this TV's page on Amazon, as well as some adjustment recommendations on CNET.Overall, an excellent picture for a 65" Samsung; I have several older (and smaller) Samsung's throughout my house, this being the largest and I continue to be pleased with Samsung products.

Reviews.Title: I love it, I love it, I love it
Reviews.Author: N. Benedict "happy camper"
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen and HD TV and it's everything I was looking for. It was easy to set up and it was 150 pounds lighter than my 36 inch CRT TV. The picture quality is superb the controls are easy to understand and the price was just right.

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Kelly Rickard
Reviews.Content: Love it - easy to configure, great picture, smart features are amazing all at the touch of a button.  Universal remote works with all of my equipment. Samsung has done it again.

Reviews.Title: thoroughly happy
Reviews.Author: Edgar
Reviews.Content: Didn't really need a smart tv but wanted a new LED and an upgrade in size. My wall rack can handle my old 46" lcd, this 55" actually weighs less and is half the thickness. The screen goes almost all the way to the edge so its really not much bigger. Video quality is phenomenal, its like you are in the room with the action, vivid color, smooth flow and clear detail. Great air tuner, and if you have cable or satellite pay extra for HD (satellite will have better bandwidth than cable, IMHO).
