Reviews.Title: This is a very good product and I would recommend it.
Reviews.Author: Chipbuilder1
Reviews.Content: This is a very good product and I would recommend it for everyone.  It performed just as was described so i gave it a rating of five stars, it could not be any better.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Phil Levine
Reviews.Content: extremely clear picture,almost 3d. i would highly recommend this tv to anyone that wants to buy a new a new one

Reviews.Title: Very Good!
Reviews.Author: YeonHo Lim
Reviews.Content: I like this TV.It's very nice screen and many useful input method.Also it's very slim thickness, narrow bezel.

Reviews.Title: Quality and options
Reviews.Author: Luke Wyman
Reviews.Content: So unlike many people I'm not a 3D fan. I wanted a good new T.V. with all the options but none of the 3D garbage. This TV is the ticket. Clear resolution. Great screen. The boarder on the unit itself is thin and barely perceptible at distance. It isn't a T.V. for those with no idea how to use the options. The guides, instructions and product assistance is great but you do have to look for it. Bottom line if you want an awesome T.V. and don't care about 3D garbage this set fills the ticket perfectly. Do be prepared to stop by your local hardware store if you are mounting the unit to any stand as none of the stands I've looked at and ended up using have mounting bolts that fit correctly for spacing & adjustment.

Reviews.Title: Chris
Reviews.Author: John W. Douglas
Reviews.Content: The TV seems just fine. I was disappointed in the delivery, however. When I purchased it on Monday Nov. 25th, it was advertised as being delivered by Friday November 29th (Prime membership).  It never came until Wednesday, December 4th. I do not blame Amazon, but rather the Delivery service ... they said that they had an unexpected amount of deliveries and decided that everyone would be OK if they were delivered later than expected, perhaps since it was not Christmas. Well, that was Christmas for my step daughter, since she was leaving for Italy the following week ... and that was one of the things she was hoping for since she had some Blu ray disks that she had not been able to play yet. I would not recommend that carrier for deliveries, but that may not be one of your items on a survey.  I have been a Prime member for a year and have had excellent response to all other items I purchased, before this one, so this did come as quite a surprise.

Reviews.Title: Good good good
Reviews.Author: Hyun sung Jung
Reviews.Content: I chosed this item by recommendation of my friend. It is fifth times to purchase samsung tv. l am satisfied with samsung tv.

Reviews.Title: Nice features
Reviews.Author: RobT
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a new TV for my living room to replace an older flat screen from a large box retailer. This TV looks great, the image quality is better than I could imagine, the difference between 120Hz and 60Hz is big. I use the SmatHub a lot, my wife and I use it for Amazon Prime Video and HBO Go, which work great; and were big selling points. I haven't come across any Cons yet, the TV is solid.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Mark Tattershall
Reviews.Content: When I first hooked up this tv I was pissed. Everything on screen moved too fast. It actually made me have motion sickness. This fast motion is called the soap opera effect. Luckily it can be turned off in the picture menu under auto motion plus. Other than that it takes a little bit of time to get all the other settings just the way you want them.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: ronniew "ronniew"
Reviews.Content: Very clear picture. Although its not a 3D TV, the screen looks like it is. Great product and value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!! best ever!!
Reviews.Author: Alwyn Jay Martinez
Reviews.Content: Best and chip like a potato chip so crispy picture perfect!! Recomend to all gamers! Best HD for PS 4,very good sound thats why its 5 five Star!!

Reviews.Title: As is?
Reviews.Author: Kevin Douglas Rutledge
Reviews.Content: This item has been used before and did not come with a users handbook or instruction manual. Without these item it's very difficult to setup this item

Reviews.Title: so so
Reviews.Author: Sunghee kang
Reviews.Content: Picture and sound quality is good.Compared to products of other companies is difficult to compare as professionals.However, the primary function enhancement, A / S has the same good stuff.Satisfactory value for money products.

Reviews.Title: Smart the way to go
Reviews.Author: Lou Buther
Reviews.Content: Great unit, very simple to operate and the picture quality is fantastic. The price was very competitive to box retailers.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Salstar
Reviews.Content: I already have the 60 inch version of this TV.  Liked it so much, I bought the 40 inch for my bedroom.  Great picture, and good smart TV features.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Excellent tv for the price i paid, which was around $530. Tv works great with my Xbox One and has an excellent picture.

Reviews.Title: Good picture quality
Reviews.Author: Evelyn Lipscomb
Reviews.Content: This 40" smart tv is very nice.  The picture clarity is excellent.  I haven't spent many hours watching it, but I don't foresee any future problems.

Reviews.Title: Good image quality, but slow when loading apps. Also need purchase T-Box if u are using it in Australia or Europe.
Reviews.Author: Shawn Zheng
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV and had it shipped to Australia.But since Australia has different broadcasting standard than that in North America,the TV will NOT receive and digital channels in Australia.Amazon.com provided a refund as I need to purchase a T-box to get the DTV channels.Thumbs up for Amazon.com's good service.Australian and European buys need to be aware of this before purchase.(In case that the product details are not updated.)The TV is good of quality, plenty of built-in apps, also good to have the built-in Wifi.The reason for the four-star rating is that the TV is kinda slow when loading apps like YouTube.But still happy with the overall performance of this product.

Reviews.Title: suggestions/advice with a problem
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Here's my problem. I purchased a Samsung UN40F6030 from ABT. for my bedroom. Within 2 days when I turned it on the screen would be pink and no sound. To correct the problem I simply would turn the TV off/on using the comcast remote and the picture and sound would be fine. This all happened within the 30 day return period. I kept ABT informed of what was happening. I changed my cable box twice and HDMI cables once. On day 31 it did it again, I called ABT and they said send it back at their expense. When I talked to my sales person I asked if I could upgrade because of the price drop on the UN40F6300 and he said no problem, so I did. I get the 6300 and within 1 day I had the same problem. Only this time turning the TV on and off did not correct it, I would have to disconnect the Hdmi cables from the TV or cable box, plug them back in and I had a perfect picture. I went down to Comcast and picked up my third  brand new cable box and another set of Hdmi cables, same problem. Comcast said I have a good signal and they are not having any issues with this new box on Samsung Tv's they are having an issue with Vizio Tv's using this box.  This Comcast box has only been out about 2 months it is a hi-def box only, it does not have on demand, the guide or any premium channels. This particular box is on all the time, it does not turn on/off with the remote like my other HD boxes. The box is about 1" by 5". This Tv is hooked up to nothing else. Comcast is now sending me a new box that is built by Motorola the other 3 were built by Pace. I really like the Tv, the picture is fantastic and I can't believe that 2 Tv's and 2 different models would have the exact same problem. ABT has been a great company to deal with, they said I can send it back. But I don't think the problem is with the Tv. Comcast believe it or not, is also really trying to help. I also called Samsung they said I had bad Hdmi cables, when I said I am on my  third set they said my hdmi ports on the Tv are bad. I said maybe one port but not all four. Now they want to send a tech. Can any one help or have any suggestions. This is my first Samsung Tv and I really do like the Tv.

Reviews.Title: Really nice
Reviews.Author: Tyrone Falls
Reviews.Content: It's a Samsung enough said. It's has a beautiful screen and the features are out of this world. Wish it were mines

Reviews.Title: Amazing sound and image
Reviews.Author: Matheus Andreatta Schmidt
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with this TV. It has a great sound and image quality. Very easy to setup and it has a bunch of applications/options that make our experience even better (e.g. Pandora, youtube, netflix, computer screen mirroring, etc...)

Reviews.Title: It's Nice.
Reviews.Author: K. Wilkins
Reviews.Content: This is a very good television. It was delivered early and in excellent condition. I purchased this as a gift for someone and they love it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Jared Weinberg
Reviews.Content: Love the size and quality of this tv. Setup is easy and picture is great! Watching sports is quite an experience

Reviews.Title: Typical Beautiful Samsung Picture
Reviews.Author: dhyard
Reviews.Content: The color is absolutely beautiful on this set, I have 4 Samsung TV's and this is right up there with the best. The F series sets seem more accurate and easier to get dialed in than previous years. I use the standard mode mostly for general stuff, sports, and it's rich, saturated but accurate color, was very easy to get calibrated.  I calibrated the movie mode using Consumer reports settings, and it looks great also, just a bit softer, but better for movies. Just a matter of personal choice between the 2. I wouldn't screw around with other people's settings, everybody has their own opinions, and I find most settings are too dull and flat. Consumer reports tests them all, and they give this picture their highest rating.  The screen is more like a semi gloss, still gets reflections, but not quite as bad high gloss screens.It's not all perfect though as the wireless is slow. I only get 4mb/s speed and it's only a couple feet from the router. My laptop in the same room gets 16mb/s. Maybe a direct connection would be faster.  Also the controls freeze and it reboots itself every day around 4pm. Not sure why that happens but maybe a software update in the future will fix it. Also the sound is a bit hollow sounding, not really the best, it's ok for general TV. There's a 3.5mm audio out that works great for headphones or powered speakers, but unfortunately there's no volume control. No idea why they would put an audio jack like that with no volume control, but it's usable with headphones, just a constant moderate volume. The infrared receiver is a nice touch if you want 1 remote to control the set top box, but the buttons are kind of spread out all over the remote, so not the easiest to use.  I have the 40 in, and think it's a great buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Picture!
Reviews.Author: JR "Jenny"
Reviews.Content: That pictures looks great out of the box.  Love the TV, love the smart features (watching youtube, netflix, amazon prime, etc)!  My only minor complaint is the sound (which can probably be said for most HDTVs).  Probably will be getting a sound bar at some point (for football games, movies)...Overall a great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic beast for the money
Reviews.Author: Nikki Wyatt
Reviews.Content: I have always had plasma screens before, been a bit of a snob about them, but recently needed a reasonably prced alternative when my Panasonic died.I was really suprised by the quality and versatility of this.Great value and great picture. I'm a convert!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Nelson Chiwara
Reviews.Content: Sweet TV though it doesn't really work with Time Warner Cable's antiquated equipment, though you cannot really blame Samsung for that

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: trassil
Reviews.Content: Got this as a gift for my parents - great picture, easy interface and easy set up.  Love the 'smart' features and apps.  Just what they wanted!

Reviews.Title: Very nice set.
Reviews.Author: John P. Byer
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture quality. We bought this TV for our daughter. We mounted it on the wall above her fireplace it is very nice. This is the third Samsung TV we have bought and thy have all been great.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!!
Reviews.Author: Jason K. Tom
Reviews.Content: This TV is awesome.  I always buy Samsung.  I had a 40" LCD and wanted to upgrade the screen size and go to LED technology.  I didn't want or need the 3D feature so this worked perfectly.  The picture is stunning on "Dynamic" setting under Picture Mode.  Buy this TV, you won't be sorry!!

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Joseph Morcos
Reviews.Content: overall works well., the menu is difficult to navigatethe back doesn't have adequate mounting holes for wall mounts.  I had to buy special screws because the mounting nots are buried deep inside the back

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40F6300 40-Inch
Reviews.Author: cd listener
Reviews.Content: I like the quality of the picture. It also connects well to Netflix and Amazon Prime for movie-watching. Setup was easy.

Reviews.Title: Very impressive
Reviews.Author: A. Kiss
Reviews.Content: I have been using this TV for over 6 weeks and it has been flawless.  The image through a blu-ray is pretty incredible and even OTA HD broadcasts (like the NBA Finals) were incredibly sharp.  I am not a TV expert, so cannot comment on black levels or contrast, but I do know a sharp picture.  Also, my room is incredibly bright and even when viewed from an angle, there isn't much glare at all.Mine is connected to a Roku, so I don't use the "smart" "features much at all, but when I played around with them, it seemed more than capable.  The design of the set is very nice, with a thin bezel and overall thin profile.

Reviews.Title: another piece of junk
Reviews.Author: Daniel Geoly
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace the defective 40 in Samsung smart tv last week which I returned to Amazion for full credit That was un40f5500. This one has the same problem. when i switch out of an APP back to tv the picture is lost and i have to go to source to press hdmi1.to get my tv picture back.. I spoke and wrote Samsung help and once again they told me they were having this problem with all there smart tv and that the  softwear would not be fixed for at least 2 weeks. They were totally aware of the problem as they said they had received numerous complaints  So once again Amazon and Samsung are selling a piece of defective junk.The transaction number with Samsung for your records is 2125280737  Don't buy Samsung

Reviews.Title: ITS GREAT
Reviews.Author: from greensboro,n.c.
Reviews.Content: THIS THE 3RD SAMSUNG HD TV I PURCHASED FROM AMAZON.I OWN MODELS 6400, 5300, AND 6300. ALL 46 OR 55 INCH  SETS.THE REASON  I BOUGHT ALL OF THEM FROM AMAZON IS 1) THEIR PRICES ARE GREAT 2)THEY DELIVER THE SET TO MY HOME 3) THEY OPEN THE BOX  PLUG IT IN MAKE SURE EVERYTHING IS WORKING 4) THEY MAKE SURE I AM HAPPY WITH THE DELIVERY AND THE SET BEFORE THEY ASK FOR MY SIGNATURE ON THE DELIVERY RECEIPT. IN ADDITION,4)THEY OFFER INTEREST FREE FINANCING. I FINANCED ALL.THREE TVS AND PAID FOR THEM AT MY LEISURE.NO PROBLEMS,5)  THEY OFFER  LOWER PRICE MATCH GUARANTEES WHICH THEY HONOR WITHOUT ANY HASSLE. I HAVE USED THEM 6) THROUGH SQUARE TRADE THEY OFFER LOW COST EXTENDED WARRANTIES. I NORMALLY DO NOT BUY THEM,, BUT THE PRICE IS SO CHEAP I CONSIDERED IT TO BE WORTH PURCHASING.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely the Best Picture I Have Ever Seen
Reviews.Author: Rick Blanton
Reviews.Content: Without a doubt the finest picture quality I have ever seen. The only reason for 4 stars instead of 5, complicated would be an understatement. I qualify this with the fact I am an IT professional.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, looks, and features; SmartTV a bit slow
Reviews.Author: Gabriel's Buddy
Reviews.Content: The 55" model has a great picture and the TV itself looks sleek and unobtrusive when off. The picture is great, with vivid colors and deep blacks.The remote is nothing special, but fine if you just are using the TV functions. I use this from my AV system so I'm not switching sources often, that is done via the receiver. The same is true for the sound. It is fine from the TV, but I don't care much as my sound generally goes through my AV system. I didn't notice it being worse or better than other comparable systems.I don't care much for the smart features (my receiver has a computer hooked up, so I just use that for streaming video), but my cursory look a the features showed them to be good but not spectacular. It was a bit of a chore going through all the options with the remote and I felt this really needed a keyboard or some other better interface if I were to use these extensively.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Martina988
Reviews.Content: Great TV and brilliant picture. It's not easy to find the correct setting on the first try though. I like it.

Reviews.Title: dont buy it
Reviews.Author: Chris Herriage
Reviews.Content: We have had tv for less than 6 months and the "panel" is out..No picture at all..it is at the repair shop now

Reviews.Title: good!!
Reviews.Author: Sanghyuk Yim
Reviews.Content: I love!Performance design price!Into the very heart!The family is quite like it!Buy it later if no one gonna buy the same product!

Reviews.Title: Much Better Values
Reviews.Author: BenA
Reviews.Content: The picture is typical of TVs in this price range.  From day one the Smart Hub was unreliable.  Spent hours with Samsung phone and remote support trying to get wireless video streaming to work.  Finally gave up and connected a Roku to get solid connectivity and streaming.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Smart Features.... but does not connect to my dish box
Reviews.Author: lori godbey
Reviews.Content: I just bought this TV from Sams after returning the similar model Vizio. Vizio had great picture, but apps suck, and TV does not swivel. I am in love with this Samsung TV and just ordered the Logitech keyboard for it on Amazon, After hours on the phone with Samsung tech support we were unable to get it to work the Dish VIP722k box that we have. It is connected and the programming is playing  but will not change channels or anything else. We have to use our dish remote. FYI... I can deal with two remotes, but this was disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46F6300
Reviews.Author: Arwin Ton "AT"
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV during Cyber Monday deals (not via Amazon). I have the TU02 panel. In general the picture is OK to good (not spectacular but fairly decent for the price). However, there are a  couple of issues with my set (that have been mentioned by some other customers as well here and/or on other forums).1. All four corners (about 1-2 square inches in each corner) in certain light scenes are visibly darker (and image occasionally gets a little cloudy in these areas). This is not always the case - but it really distracts me from enjoying nice scenery such as blue skies across the screen, snow scenes, etc). One of the best ways I found to test for this issue is to download the BBC News app in the smart hub and run it (in between pieces of news it has a white background on the edges). I understand that edge-lit sets are more prone to color uniformity issues compared to other sets. However, going to the store and looking at other TV sets, I did not spot this issue in many other panels for other brands (talking about Samsung being a top brand). Also moving to 7100 series on Samsung this problem seems to be address to a great extent. Interestingly, this problem is less visible on larger panels since the corners take up a smaller percentage of the screen surface. Don't get me wrong - other panels have other issues such as viewing angle color deterioration, clouding throughout the screen, problems in rendering fast action, etc. Not making here an overall comparison - I am strictly reflecting on this issue of darker corners.2. I could spot a little banding issue on the right side of the screen. Over uniform light backgrounds there is a barely visible vertical line (as other customers put it, like a barely visible scorch mark). Not visible in scenes that involve some complexity of color patterns or darker nuances.3. When there are apps updates in the Smart Hub, all my installed apps get uninstalled. Then I have to manually reinstall them. This happened already twice.I still have until Jan 15 (extended returns during holiday season) to return the set and I am deeply contemplating returning this item. There is the low end where people are willing to accept poorer quality in exchange for affordability. There is the high end where quality commends a premium. Then there is the middle range ... I believe this set is in the latter.  It seems also that there is a panel lottery (many users are ecstatic about the set) though TU02 seemed to be the better panels.

Reviews.Title: Its Ok
Reviews.Author: Grant Smith
Reviews.Content: Picture looks good.Usually takes 2 attempts for it to pullup Netflix, The universal remote setup doesn't work, It won't recognize my Verizon settop box.

Reviews.Title: internet access/navigation
Reviews.Author: photosius
Reviews.Content: internet access doesn't work very well...unable to watch videos on sites other the the ones already set up on the system

Reviews.Title: Best Screen for the money
Reviews.Author: Mary Arendse
Reviews.Content: Picture Clarity and color with depth is extremely good for this price range, the least fond is the speakers are in the rear of the TV thus our Boise was a handy addition

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46F6300 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz Slim Smart LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Biyu Zhu "Biyu"
Reviews.Content: s Samsung UN46F6300 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz Slim Smart LED HDTV: great buy, good value, high tech with the features you wanted.

Reviews.Title: Un55f6300
Reviews.Author: Michael Dies
Reviews.Content: Ok but not great. I would not spend again the extra money for smart tv features.  Pic is ok if you set it to your liking.I bought it for 899.00 before holidays.  I would not pay over that for this tv.  The pic is close to what you get with other brands.Sound is pretty good for a tv. 4 hdmi ports is very useful for DVD- game console and sat receiver.Overall it's a nice set.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Tamara A. Shende
Reviews.Content: I love this television. Perfect picture, great price! I would suggest you order the Dish Network installation here on Amazon if you intend to hang this on a wall. The installers were awesome and went above and beyond to make sure I was happy and educated on this tv.

Reviews.Title: Experience with U.S. Appliance
Reviews.Author: Brad Ray
Reviews.Content: Love the product.  I had a minor problem with the shipping company, but Andy with U.S. Appliance stepped in and fixed the problem immediately.  U.S. Appliance has wonderful customer service.  I would definitely purchase from them again.

Reviews.Title: First LED
Reviews.Author: Grumpy "Grumpy"
Reviews.Content: I have a Panasonic plasma which is exceptional, but wanted an LED for a different room. This is every bit as nice a picture, if not better. Plasma's can glare a bit making extended viewing a bit difficult. I have not noticed this problem with this TV. Smart TV is OK and no 3D. Who needs 3D anyway, Idiots delight. For a slim TV or other flat panel TV, the sound is pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Unadvertised Issue with SAMSUNG Series 6300 SMART TV; NOT COMPATIBLE WITH ATT/CISCO U-Verse BOX.
Reviews.Author: Donna Vaccaro
Reviews.Content: SAMSUNG doesn't mention this anywhere I've seen.  The new Samsung 6300 series Smart TV (built in Mexico November 2013) was not compatible with my ATT u-Verse CISCO Box; recording playback was erratic (kept stopping and clipping every 3-5 seconds).  Contacted Samsung and they stated it was a box compatibility issue...  not the TV copatibility issue, a box compatibly issue!  How absurd... since the box worked fine on a previous Samsung that was only two years old.  Samsung doesn't advertise this "glitch".. I only found out about this issue after I looked into it and contacted Samsung, since I was having a problem.  Nonsense... the Samsung Smart TV isn't Smart after all.  TV will be returned to Amazon and NOT A VERY SATISFIED CUSTOMER.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the extra money
Reviews.Author: Murray R. Jacobson
Reviews.Content: I don't understand the benefit of "smart" TV. It seems as if buying the less expensive "old" model and then purchasing either Apple or any of the other TV add ons for streaming is an easier way to go.

Reviews.Title: Picture deteriorates when viewing at angle
Reviews.Author: Monti B.
Reviews.Content: The picture was poor when viewing outside dead center. This is unacceptable to me given the price.  Older LCD from 3 years ago perform better.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CLARITY AND SHARPNESS!!!!
Reviews.Author: MORICAN "FRANK PEREZ"
Reviews.Content: I OWN 3 OF THE PREVIOUS MODELS OF THIS SMART TV SERIES 40" (6100) AND THIS LED TV IS CLEARLY FASTER AND BETTER. MY WIFE, WHO DOESN'T CARE FOR OUR TV'S IN THE HOME, EVEN NOTICED THE DEPTH AND BRIGHTNESS OF THIS LED. SAMSUNG HAS DONE IT AGAIN!

Reviews.Title: Terrific picture - easy to access applications and internet
Reviews.Author: SpaceCity17
Reviews.Content: A great purchase. Wish I could trade in my two Sony "non-smart" TVs.  When they croak,  I'll be sure to buy Samsung replacements.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, but...
Reviews.Author: ChristieLee
Reviews.Content: Overall, I really like the TV. The picture is clear and bright, the sound is very good, and except for getting confused on setting up the universal remote (user error), there were no problems. Until I went to put it on the wall mount. The TV comes with the screws for the table mount, but not for a wall mount. The wall mount I bought had 4 different sets of screws, but none of them fit. A trip to Home Depot, and $4 fixed the problem (FYI you need M8, 250mm machine screws). It's a minor problem, but it was still annoying.Also, be warned Cheetah Mounts ALAMLB Ballhead LCD LED TV Wall Mount Bracket for 23-37" and this TV do not work together without some re-engineering. Even though both TV and Cheetah Mount are VESA 200, the above mentioned screws are too big for the holes on the mount.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing - Planning to Return
Reviews.Author: AdobemanAZ
Reviews.Content: Here is why I'm rating this purchase 2-stars:1) WIRELESS CONNECTION. The TV will not stay connected to the internet (wireless), not just during streaming movies, but even navigating the menu screen. Example I wirelessly connect to the internet and the TV confirms it is connected, but as soon as I navigate to download apps, it will say I am not connected and ask for the password again.  I have downloaded the latest firmware and I have a new b/g/n dual-band wireless modem that's in the same room with the TV.2) AUDIO OUT.  All that is available is a non-standard 2.5mm audio-out jack (no RCA jack), unless you have an optical port on your receiver.  The brief manual made no mention of the jack size.3) TV SPEAKERS: They lack fidelity. I was watching a movie that I have seen many times and some of the tonal sounds were inaudible, I used the menu system to adjust the audio in every possible preset and not much changed.  Voices are ok.4) APPS: Nothing was preloaded.  Maybe they would have automatically if my internet was working properly, but the procedure and documentation were not apparant.  I may be missing something here, but I shouldn't have to scratch my head for an hour and still get nowwhere.5) CONNECTIONS: Minimal. Lack of analog support such as the previously mentioned 'audio-out' for connection to the stereo. No RGB port for PC connection except for HDMI. But if you have an older laptop you're without HDMI out you're stuck.  No separate Composite Video IN.  Only Composite/Component IN.Because of the wireless connection issue, the TV will have to be returned.  With all the space and surface area for a decent wireless antenna to be embedded in the TV, there is no excuse for dropouts and/or connection issues.  A firmware update in March was suppose to fix this but it did not for me.Why give an otherwise good picture, name-brand TV 2-stars? Because it's sold as a smart TV; and to be smart you need a connection with the internet. So without a reliable internet connection, it becomes an overpriced TV.Where is the Engineering here Samsung?!

Reviews.Title: this purchase was a nightmare
Reviews.Author: Lillian Anne Federico
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item as a gift for my dad for fathers day. We have had nothing but problems with it. From the first, the picture was terrible, uneven, dark on one side. And samsung customer service had been abysmal. It takes weeks to get e tachnician to the house. They replaced the motherboard finally. And witin days, other problems arose..the screed flickers for the first 20 minutes the set ison. Then clears up for awhile and does it again. A tech has been to the house twice and both times it was supposedly fixed, only to recur within days. I sought helpfrom amazon and was told to take it up with samsung....evev though I explained I was getting no satisfaction from that quarter. I have always been a big fan and proponentof amazon....now notso much.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY FROM BEACH CAMERA!!
Reviews.Author: Tracy
Reviews.Content: I bought the 65-inch SAMSUNG UN65F6300 1080p 120Hz Slim Smart LED HDTV through Beach Camera.  The TV was delivered with several LEDs out on the screen.  I contacted the company and they refuse to return it or exchange it for a new one.

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Russialist
Reviews.Content: This is the first really hign-definition television that I have purchased. Some content, including movies, are disconertingly sharp and lifelike. As if it were a live performance. Or some family video I had filmed with my own hi-def camera. Does not seem like the movie-experience I am used to. Not a complaint about this excellent television of course. Just an unexpected and odd observation.

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: HOWARD WDAUSCHER JR
Reviews.Content: it's everything I thought it would be , just wonderfull.versital has wi fi built in for the internet  picture is sharp and  clear.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: FrequentBuyer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV in January 2014. Recently, I started using the streaming apps. Well, I TRIED to use the the streaming apps. It is impossible to stream via Netflix/Amazon due to the wi-fi connection constantly dropping. The connection usually lasts for less than one hour. Tech support's solution was to reset to factory settings. Huh??? I have four Samsung TVs and believe they make good products. However, the wi-fi capability of THIS TV is absolutely AWFUL. Because there are many complaints about this problem, it is obvious Samsung is aware of the problem, but has chosen not to resolve it. I am very disappointed that I will have to buy a third party device to stream on unSmart TV. I have recommended Samsung TVs in the past, but absolutely will not recommend a Samsung Smart TV. HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT!

Reviews.Title: Unhappy that the keyboard will not work wireless.
Reviews.Author: yvonne ham
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed the keyboard will not work with this Samsung TV.  It works if  it is hooked up with a wire but, not Bluetooth.  It is a great picture and other than the above problem which I believe all Samsung TV's have it is fine.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Junior Jimenez
Reviews.Content: THIS TV IS EXCELLENT AND I CAN TO PUT IN ALL PLACE AND DO IT THAT IWANT TO DO WITH THIS.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN55F6300 55-Inch 1080p 120Hz Slim Smart LED HDTV (2013 Model) is good quality
Reviews.Author: KIM YOUNG GEUN
Reviews.Content: Samsung UN55F6300 55-Inch 1080p 120Hz Slim Smart LED HDTV (2013 Model) is good qualitySamsung UN55F6300 55-Inch 1080p 120Hz Slim Smart LED HDTV (2013 Model) is good quality

Reviews.Title: Beware Smart HUB
Reviews.Author: krusher57
Reviews.Content: I have the UN46EF6150 from a competitor (similiar TV), I would stay away from Samsung Smart HUB TVs.  They are having HUGE issues with Netflix, do a Google on 'netflix problems on samsung tv', been going on for quite a while with some very creative workarounds (that don't work for everyone, none have for me and others) posted on many sites (take a look at YouTube).  Samsung worked with me for a while then finally told me to call Netflix.  Netflix works for me on my MacBook, iPad, and PS3, just not my Samsung.  Finally got fed up, bought a Roku, and now Netflix works absolutely no problems on my Samsung TV.  Haven't been back to their SmartHUB since.If you plan on using this TV for streaming I would suggest someother brand or plan on getting a Roku or something else.  Really disappointed.On the plus, picture quality is great.  Oh and I might mention the Roku interface is definitely superior to the Smart HUB interface.

Reviews.Title: It's good, not great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Positives: Great picture, easy to hook up, WiFi is great and works fine, love the small bezel and for the most part the apps are OK that come pre-loadedNegatives: Interfaces poorly with Samsung Airtract, that is you need to many remotes. 1 for the cable, ! for the Airtrack and one for the tv itself. The Samsung remote does not light up well at all and tough to see when lights are out. Adding apps to the TV is not the easiest either. Also, get a wireless keyboard if you plan on using the internet, That said, the internet is very slow and it's not my wifi either, The big thing is having to use 3 remotes, its sometimes confusing causing frustration, If you don't have a home theater system it will be much easier to operate,

Reviews.Title: Buying used was worth it!
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical buying a used TV through the internet, but I took the chance and was pleasantly surprised.The box was a little scuffed, but no holes or anything to make me think it was ever dropped.Once opened, the TV was all but brand new. Had the plastic wrapping around the edges, all styrofoam was intact, and all components were in the box.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Samsung 46 Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Down'eastah
Reviews.Content: This TV is so cool!!! I love this TV, Samsung really knew what they were making when they made this, well worth the buy!!!

Reviews.Title: No mounting screws
Reviews.Author: Denny
Reviews.Content: There are supposed to be 8 mounting screws in the box to attach the mounting bracket to the TV. They were missing. And I was an unhappy camper. I went thru my junk box and found some that work but i am still upset.  Samsung help was not helpful. I give up. The tv is fine but i am still seething. I know, worry about the tv, but i worry about details like this.

Reviews.Title: HDMI connection does not function
Reviews.Author: Robert K.
Reviews.Content: Amazon Warehouse rated this product 'Like New in Box' when in reality box was torn up, taped together and damaged. Discovered main TV HDMI connection does not function. This product was not like new.

Reviews.Title: Amazing sexy TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Owner
Reviews.Content: I'm not an expert in TV shopping, but I like to think I am with technology in general.This TV is truly gorgeous, from the stand to the thinness it makes my room go from normal to sexy.I also use this as my monitor for my gaming PC, it's just a great TV with amazing ability and very useful.The smart elements like pandora and netflix work just fine, saving you money with not having to purchase something like a Roku, or mess with wires and having to hookup a playstation or like-device.I'll admit that there is sometimes a little lag with the controller, be it the response from the controller to the TV or the TV UI itself just taking a moment to at times do as I wanted it to, however this isn't my computer or phone or something I have to worry about with lag.I also really wish there was an option to silence the volume clicking. Every time I change the volume, each knob clicks clicks clicks and at night that can be a bit annoying. But again, small annoyance nothing major.I'm pretty picky with having impressive technology, such as the GTX780 filled gaming pc that I built to use this TV with, my surround sound and land of midi controllers, yet I see this TV staying with me for many years to come, and not having to worry about having 4k. Quite sure this will do be just fine with all my gaming, music, movies, blu ray and other HD needs.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, and smart too.
Reviews.Author: llaramie
Reviews.Content: We set up our SAMSUNG SMART TV UN55F6300 a week ago.The only hangup was the slow streaming; and the firmware update to version 1118--It would fail to download.  It turns out the these two issues are related.The  firmware update time was estimated and around 3 to 4 hours! Very strange and long time for an update! And when I let the thing run it would fail after only a few minutes -- error 801 timeout.Once I realized that maybe it wasn't the TV, but my wireless router  that was the problem, I started setting the wireless parameters back to their defaults for my Linksys router model WRT600N, and turned the FRAME BURST OPTION on in the advanced-wireless tab.I kept checking the firmware update-time estimates on the TV support function, as I tweaked the router settings; getting the time estimate  down to about 7 minutes.  A more reasonable firmware update time!The update was successfully executed in about 7 minutes; and my YouTube and internet apps now work without any delays.  It is the router that is the issue. The SMART TV is fine.  I should have figured this out a week ago.  Hope this helps!.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV 55 inch - UN55F6300
Reviews.Author: James Graham
Reviews.Content: Samsung smart TV has a very good picture for a reasonable price. Works great with my new DVD player and HDMI cables.Samsung should provide the high quality HDMI cables within the original package of the TV.

Reviews.Title: I'm missing out
Reviews.Author: Amelia E. Czebieniak
Reviews.Content: Ever since I got my first HDTV it's been a Samsung. This time around for the holiday/anniversary gift this year I got us this tv, well more so my other half as I still only see it on occasion. It puts my tv to shame. The picture quality is amazing, HD things are actually HD! It is a change going from my tv and other's that are not up to the same level of quality currently with going from watching them to watching this tv. Things are clear, they seem to move faster in the clarity, so it took some getting used to. Very happy that I bought it. I can't wait to enjoy it on a more frequent basis.

Reviews.Title: Nothing Fancy Just the Best All Around Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Matt McC
Reviews.Content: I replaced an older 42" flat screen TV that was our main TV with this Samsung 55" 6300. We were and are still happy with that older 42"  TV. It's just now in our bedroom with a Roku attached. I will tell you this though, I totally over thought this purchase. When this TV came out it was close to $2K Now it's closer to $1K (in the 55 inch) or less depending. The smart features intimidated me so I read every review on the planet for smart TV's. This one seemed to be right for my family. We are busy people who don't want to jump through hoops to use the smart features. This TV is easy to use it does all the work for you as far as set up go's. The bezel is not as thin as some LG's or Panasonic's that I looked at in this price range in fact it's the only down side to this TV, but it's still very sleek and is not shiny (like my old 42"). I could go on and on about this TV, but that's not the point of this review. The point is...  It's WELL worth the money and is easy to use. Besides that...just wait till you watch a blue ray. It will amaze you with the "Knock Your Socks Off GREAT Picture" (Sound Typical flat screen TV). A home theater reciver even a sound bar will greatly help. OH and A HUGE REVISION -  Network issues with other devices!!! ie: Roku, Apple TV, wireless laptops w/ printers in use. YOUR SMART FEATURES WILL GET INTERRUPTED UNLESS YOU BUY A POWER ADAPTER! Such as the "TP-LINK TL-PA2010KIT AV200 Nano Powerline Adapter". My advice is talk to an Amazon rep about the issue and see what they can do to help you out (could be included with purchase). After that the TV was even better!! So all and all it was the best TV with smart features period.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: george
Reviews.Content: The picture looks odd, it looks like it's zoomed, also the picture is also too dark. The ability to control the DISH Set Top Box is intermittent, usually it doesn't work, but sometimes it does, for no apparent reason. It has Netflix built in, which is great.My daughter hates it.

Reviews.Title: great so far
Reviews.Author: Richard Delisle
Reviews.Content: We were away when it was delivered.  It was delivered to our friends housesitting our place, and it is set up just fine. I connected to the wireless with no issues when I got home.Nice picture, good sound.  Now learning to navigate and use the apps.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Jiham Moon
Reviews.Content: Great satisfaction with 43% seasonal discount! A lot cheaper than any other website and location. I am recommending it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Issues which were resolved
Reviews.Author: Stainless
Reviews.Content: The back panel wasn't fully attached and had to have TV  tech come to repair as after 1 week TV would go black for a second and would also become blurred.This is not my first Samsumg TV and I am a fan of the brand. Just got a bad one. Kept it and now seems to work fine.

Reviews.Title: samsung smart tv
Reviews.Author: Charles Anzalone
Reviews.Content: Great picture and value. .difficult to use smart features like Internet accessLimited apps,..I expected integration with Galaxy S4..not tyere yet

Reviews.Title: Will probably going to purchase another identical set for the bedroom upstairs...Samsung Rocks!
Reviews.Author: SWong
Reviews.Content: I can finally post my review after having used the set for a week.  My set was purchased at Costco versus Amazon since Costs had a double promotion going on in December.  Both sites charge tax however but I got instant gratification for $749 along with a free year of Netflix purchasing from Costco.  Should the set give me trouble I can return it locally versus having to eat the shipping sending it back to the Amazon vendor.  I also get a double manufacturer's warranty along with the usual 2% rebate when charged to the AMEX credit card. Now for the review and observations......Unlike the Samsung 32inch Smart TV this 46 inch model has a slightly different user interface and a larger remote.  I had a opportunity to get something a bit less expensive but I wanted all the latest .... built-in Wi-Fi, 120Hz, 1080p, and LED backlit (more on this in a bit).  This set retired my old 19-inch analog TV with it's analog to digital converter with rabbit ear antenna.  For me, it was like going from the 18th century to the 21st century.  I can now stream youtube videos using my Google Nexus 10 tablet having paired the Nexus 10 to the Samsung.  I also have downloaded a Samsung app which allows me to use the Nexus 10 tablet as a secondary remote control.  I am using a cheap Mohu antenna and do not have to connect to my external house antenna.  The Mohu antenna picks up all the local channels FREE ...I get channels 2,4,5,7,9,11,13 which is all I want.The picture quality on this TV is beyond describing and the CBS football games are breathtaking.  I have other Samsung flat panels at home and the brand is top notch except for capacitors blowing out every few years.  For me this is NOT a issue since a few 1000uF 16V high temp radial electrolytic  capacitors get them back up and running.  Samsung is notorious for spec'ing and using cheap caps just to keep their bean counters happy.  The power supply board on this new TV is part number BN44-00611A and is readily available on eBay for $30 which for me sealed the deal also.  Right now I have a second remote being delivered this week since we all know the weakest link on all TV's are the hand held remotes.  Snagged my 2nd remote for $20 with free shipping...cannot beat that!  The main logic pcb is part number BN94-06167C also readily available via Ebay and the extra remote controls are part number AA59-00784A.  Just don't pay more than $20 for the remotes otherwise you are getting ripped off.Some of the reviewers voiced displeasure with the sound coming out of the TV but me, I have no issues with the sound having come from a 20 year old analog TV with a A/D converter...ugh!  Right now I am shopping around for a 32-inch set for the BR but still want a minimum of 120Hz and 1080p...something which I have seen is very elusive on small sets.  No hurry on this since I have time to shop and compare prices.  Other reviews have issues hooking up a keyboard but not me...a surplus $10 usb keyboard from Ebay was instantly recognized by the Samsung TV which is way better than using the Samsung remote control...another ugh!  Only negative thing I can say is the remote has a very anemic light when you are pressing buttons in the dark with this remote but I can live with it on a otherwise stellar smart TV.  This set should last me for years since I expect to be repairing the set myself .... only time it becomes unrepairable is when the actual flat panel display gets toasted.  Hope this review helps in your purchase decision?

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Ken E.
Reviews.Content: The wall mounting went well and the initial setup was per the instructions.  The picture came on and was excellent.  NETFLIX was easy to add.  It's looking good.

Reviews.Title: No wireless Bluetooth for speakers
Reviews.Author: adam
Reviews.Content: I was fooled into thinking I could connect wirelessly to a samsung sound bar. Not so.other than, picture isn't overly impressive

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Operates exactly as it's suppose to. Great value. Love the button for netflix right on the remote. Looks amazing on and off

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Quaz
Reviews.Content: This was a great price on a TV that had all the options my dad was looking for! He really likes the clarity and great sound.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed with Delivery
Reviews.Author: Allison
Reviews.Content: My TV is amazing! I really am happy with the TV itself. Amazing picture and clarity. This was everything that I wanted.What I am disappointed with was the delivery. I ordered my TV on Thanksgiving Day with expected deliver between 12/4 and 12/9. That entire length of time was not able to track the package online. After I contacted the seller on the 12/9, I was told that I would need to set up a delivery. So my tv was not delivered until Saturday, 12/14. On top of that, I was told it would be delivered between 12 and 5pm of course it came around 5:45pm. The driver told me they do not come in and set it up, so not sure why I had to be home for delivery when I live in an apartment community that has drop off at the front desk and I could have picked it up from them at any time. But, the driver was nice enough to help my carry it up to my floor which I did really appreciate. Overall, just disappointed at how long this took to be delivered.

Reviews.Title: Good unit, but do your own comparisons
Reviews.Author: old_rocketeer "--Fly'em Safe"
Reviews.Content: The TV is great, till you compare the color depth and contrast dark areas to my older flat screen.  Good but not great in comparison. And the lack of an NTSC tuner made it difficult to connect to my other sources in the house,  Should have done my homework better,  Good set, but does not meet my needs for the den.

Reviews.Title: Can Anyone help me???
Reviews.Author: Sammy "Sammy_yax"
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome Tv but how on earth do you turn on the 3D function for this Tv? I can't seem to be able to pair my samsung 3D glasses because I can't turn that feature on (3D). Other reviews stated that you can do that by pressing the 3D button on the remote. This Tv's remote doesn't have any of that. I could use any help offered. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Jim Merchant "Jim Merchant"
Reviews.Content: Excellent styling, crisp picture, thin profile, and user friendly.  Great value !!  Includes so many features, I will never even use a small percentage of them.

Reviews.Title: doesn't look perfect on with pure black image
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: overall I like this TV. The only problem I have with it is when the content is a pure black/dark image it doesn't look black/dark especially from the side angle. It looks as if there's some leaking light here and there from the bezel.

Reviews.Title: Great for me.
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I don't know what they are doing, but this has a 3D effect and is very clear, bright, just nice!  Much nicer than expected.  I also use the smart function, which I did not think would happen.  Worth the money for me.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Rev. Richard A. Young
Reviews.Content: The Samsung UN60F6300 seems to only want to link up with PC computers (not Apple).  Also the sound volume is not as good as it should be.  Picture is real nice.

Reviews.Title: Black Screen - No Video with Sound
Reviews.Author: Surfrider413
Reviews.Content: I just bought this item a week ago, only lasted three days, the screen went black. I called for service, hope they can fix it.

Reviews.Title: very bad quality
Reviews.Author: Cheng-Roo Chang
Reviews.Content: this product is very poor of quality.  Picture Color and resolution is not good.  Returned the product the next day I turned on this TV.  The worst thing is I need to pay the return shipping charge for the bad quality I received from this order.  I will not buy any expensive electronic product through amazon again, will buy it at Costco.

Reviews.Title: great pic not so great softwear
Reviews.Author: stanley e. cox
Reviews.Content: The tv itself is great, good picture. The softwear for linking to a network causes my computer to run very slowly. Had to unistallthe softwear to get the speed back.

Reviews.Title: good choice
Reviews.Author: LIM CHEA-JUNG
Reviews.Content: low price!(but not best ....)good condition.thin volume.very wide face.smart function is good.samsung is better than lg

Reviews.Title: Samsung 75" 6300 Series
Reviews.Author: Jackel
Reviews.Content: Wonderful TV! I love everything about it except the sound. Other reviewers mentioned the poor sound quality for voices - they weren't lying. All other sounds are great, but extremely hard to hear voices unless the volume is cranked up.With that said I really don't have an issue with this as all my sound comes courtesy of my blu ray system. Killer sound this way.Picture quality is excellent. All colors look natural and no issue with dark black scenes.  Viewing angle is spectacular.Tons of features you may or may not use,  but nice to have. The remote is great, but could really use a keyboard as typing is a bit rough having to arrow around the on screen keyboard.I used the Amazon delivery service. Others stated they had issues, but I did not experience any negatives. They were on time,  courteous and quick. CEVA was the logistics service who delivered and unboxed the unit. I elected to keep the box,  but they did offer to remove it for me.Overall great TV and great delivery experience. Would highly recommend this unit. I got a killer deal at $2,448 the day before Thanksgiving. Haven't seen it that low since even on Black Friday and Cyber Monday (from sources I would feel comfortable ordering from). I looked every day for weeks all over the Web.

Reviews.Title: Love our 65" Samsung  Slim Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Joan Passino
Reviews.Content: Love our new 65" Samsung Slim Smart TV.  Having no problems with it. Color perfect, sound great and beautiful on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't Work with XFINITY HBO Go
Reviews.Author: KDK
Reviews.Content: Ok, so this gets two stars because I am a little bitter. I was excited to get this TV, has HBO go, looking to replace my apple TV's. Everyone (XFINITY, Samsung) says it works, how great HBO Go is...HBO Go app does NOT work on XFINITY, nor do a few others. The Netflix app sucks. I am going back to the Apple TV for Netflix and HBO Go. But the TV has great picture and clarity and the other apps are good, too.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Marye
Reviews.Content: The 46 inch LED HDTV by Samsung is a very nice, slim TV which fits well on the wall in our bedroom. It is lightweight with a good but not great picture. We have other Samsung TVs and were happy with them so we bought this one. However, the picture is not as sharp as on our other TVs. Not as happy as I thought I would be with this TV due to the lack of clarity of picture

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32F6300 32 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Dennis A. Yonosh
Reviews.Content: Top quality picture with all the bells and whistles.  Was easy to connect and set up.  I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Half-Baked (Smart!) TV has me quite irritated
Reviews.Author: Alan C. Eshelman "AlanEsh"
Reviews.Content: I bought this at Best Buy along with a matching Samsung sound bar+subwoofer (F550). I also picked up a digital audio cable to link the TV to the Sound Bar so I could control both with the TV remote.Here are some highlights of how annoying the Samsung electronics experience has been:- Contrary to what you might expect, the (Smart!) TV and Sound bar are not smart enough work together as plug'n'play devices.- Once you find out that you need to treat the Samsung Sound Bar as an alien device and configure your TV's remote to control it, well, that doesn't work. All attempts to make the TV remote work on the frequency of the Sound Bar's controller fail. Even resetting the hardware to factory defaults does not help.- Pushing the Netflix button on the (Smart!) TV remote brings up the Netflix app, but often it fails to connect. The solution? DELETE your netflix account info and set it up again. Yes, type your email and password repeatedly.- Oh, you would like to hook up a Keyboard because the (Smart!) TV's netflix app is a piece of garbage and needs to be reset every couple of days? How about a nice Bluetooth keyboard! No, this TV doesn't speak it.- OK how about his nice USB keyboard sitting in a box. NOPE, only the arrow keys work.- Maybe THIS keyboard? No, sorry. (for the record, the Logitech K400 apparently works with this TV)SO, to sum up... $1000 later (including matching sound bar!!) I'm stuck with a (Smart!) TV that is downright stupid. It can't control the soundbar, its netflix app is bugged beyond belief, and it doesn't understand 1992 keyboard technology, let alone Bluetooth. My playstation 3 plus 8 year old Vizio were more reliable and flexible than this glitzy piece of technology hell.I'm giving Samsung's tech support one more shot, and if they can't make this stuff work I'm going back to Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Not compatible with current Home Theater amps and Set Top boxes
Reviews.Author: Marty Rapp
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because it had advanced features, including the ability to work well with and control other devices.  However, it is not compatible with my new AV Amp (Yamaha) or Set Top box, and when I contacted Samsung to ask when updates would be available to address compatibility issues I was told that there was no plan to issue updates.  Seems odd that a new "Smart" TV would not work well with similarly new ancillary devices.  This means that it will take 3 or 4 remotes to operate the TV.

Reviews.Title: It's pretty darn good.
Reviews.Author: Richard Franks
Reviews.Content: Before my review I have to mention the wonderful tech support on the Samsung website.  I got a tech via instant messaging and it was great to have this kind of fast response.Sept 5, 2013 - Nov 4, 2013 - I've had this TV for a good while and the picture is fabulous.  I never liked this TV's remote but then again I don't use it that often anyhow so a lousy design is no bother.  The TV generates almost no heat.  When I put my hand on the screen the heat is not perceptible and as we know the lower the TV temperature the lower the power consumption.  Would I recommend this TV - absolutely - yes.  This is an edit of a previous review and I have to mention the HDMI hook-ups - they work great and there's enough of them - and the nice part of the Samsung HDMI design is when you change your "in-put" this TV shows the device like "DirecTV" and "Blu-Ray" and "Roku" - very nice touch to a nice TV.

Reviews.Title: great tv but the wireless drops out sporadically
Reviews.Author: Craig Sanders
Reviews.Content: update 06/11/2013just applied the latest firmware update that supposedly fixed the wireless and it's still dropping out randomly.  hoping for another fix that may actually fix the problem. :/for a 32" tv this has a really beautiful picture.  it has a wonderful viewing angle that's not quite 90 degrees but really who's watching their tv at nearly that angle.  we wall mounted it and the horizontal viewing angle is wonderful as well.. you can see the picture sitting or standing without any problems.  really the ONLY problem i have with the tv is that when using the apps for any of the streaming services it will a random disconnect with a network error.  i know it's not due to a weak signal as the router is only 20' away and the laptop 10' further away has full strength. it's annoying when pandora craps out for a few seconds but if you confirm the error it will just start playing again.  once again, it's irritating but it's not going to make me return the tv.tldr; great tv with a great picture but the wireless is flakey

Reviews.Title: Don't even think about ordering this TV
Reviews.Author: Tstone
Reviews.Content: Nightmare from day one with Samsung LED Smart TV. Open box on Christmas day, the stand requires screws, special screws, now screws in box. Instructions discuss screws, but in the list of items in box, screws are not listed. In list of what you need to put TV together, it does not list screws.  I call Samsung, They were completely clueless. They say they will send me some.  Talk with Amazon, to try to get them to have Samsung send the screws overnight/fed-x, I even offer to pay. They say Samsung refuses. Almost a week goes by, and instead of me getting screws, I get a message on my phone from Samsung, saying they can not even start to think about sending the screws until I send them: A) a receipt, B) all kinds of information off the TV (which I gave them on the phone call day one) and they leave no call back number. My God the worse customer service in the world!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great picture / Great options
Reviews.Author: cohojohn
Reviews.Content: Recently purchased this TV but with a refresh rate of 240hz instead of the 120hz.  Amazing picture.  Easy to use menu and very easy to set up and adjust to personal preference.  Had to call support to get Skype to load but they were great and got it to load remotely by deleting and reloading it.  My only suggestion is that for the money, and since it comes with Skype on it already, it should come with a Skype camera and microphone.  According to the Samsung Support Technician who assisted me, it must have a specific Samsung camera and microphone VG-STC3000.  This will cost another $99 dollars.

Reviews.Title: Sent wrong TV and Amazon thinks its ok
Reviews.Author: FriendlySkies
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV from Amazon on 11/28 and received it today. Very excited for this tv, especially after the great deals they were offering late last week.UPS delivered it today and to my surprise, I was sent the UN40EH5300F, not the UN40F6300. Reps claimed that there was some sort of issue so they sent this one instead, figuring that I'd just accept it and move on.. Don't mention the fact that the 5300F specs aren't as good as the 6300, and the price of the TV I was sent is much lower than I paid for the 6300.Currently on the phone with India attempting to get the TV I ordered sent to me.. Love getting the run around!Hopefully I can come back and do a proper review of the 6300 in the next few weeks, or however long it takes for them to send me the correct TV!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful HD
Reviews.Author: L. Manriqueyecpot
Reviews.Content: Nice TV, but I had a hard time setting up Netflix.  I had to purchase Technical Help for $69.99.  They didn't know what the heck they're doing and was a waste of money.  I figured it out myself and now i'm watching netflix.

Reviews.Title: If you want consistent streaming video, go elsewhere
Reviews.Author: R. Ogunyoku
Reviews.Content: I was in the market for a TV with internet and video streaming capabilities.  I used to connect my laptop to my old TV via an HDMI cable but then when I needed to use it I would have to decide on whether to watch my show or work on the laptop.  So, having a TV that could stream movies and shows was paramount.  My major concern was that I had read reviews of lots of different sets that could not hold a WIFI connection and would sporadically drop the connection.  Well, I gave this one a chance and to my dismay it was as reviewed.  Sometimes I can get through a whole half hour show on HuluPlus, but if I want to watch a movie on HuluPlus or Netflix, forget about it.  It drops WIFI connections like a 6 month child drops cheerios.  It's extremely frustrating and the only solution is turning of the TV and restarting Netflix/Huluplus.  Besides that one "minor" thing the TV is great.  Picture quality is fantastic, no shadowing in scenes with dark images.  Very crisp.  I'm hoping that the next software update will fix this issue.  We'll see.

Reviews.Title: Picture is meant to DECEIVE!
Reviews.Author: Ali Ebrahimi
Reviews.Content: I rated this TV a '1' because I feel completely deceived and lied to by the main image used on Amazon. I just opened up the box to find out that there's a 1" black plastic bezel around the edge of the TV. The main image for this TV DOES NOT SHOW THIS and gives you the impression that there's no border except for the clear acrylic frame. This is completely false and misrepresenting the product. I should've known the price was too good. The true 'no frame' Samsungs are about 1.5-2x the price. Amazon needs to make this much more clear as they've wasted my time. I'm returning it and very annoyed to have been misled by their advertising. Will be following up with a complaint to customer service as well.

Reviews.Title: Special TV
Reviews.Author: Harry J. Gallagher Jr.
Reviews.Content: This TV has the best picture and also the best sound. Most flat screens are known for not very good sound but I wouldsay this TV and Samsung have made the sound great. I really like the beveled glass frame around the edge instead of justall black. The smart TV features are a plus also.

Reviews.Title: TV Customer Service Lacking
Reviews.Author: constance wynn
Reviews.Content: One star for CUSTOMER SERVICE on TVs.  A note of caution for anyone ordering TVs from Amazon.  My 50" Samsung TV arrived by UPS in Box.  A week later I arranged to have it mounted on the wall.  After mounting, I discovered TV screen was cracked.  My issue with Amazon is this.  The company has NO white glove service to replace TV and remount a new one.  I was told to take it off the wall (I live alone), have UPS pick it up and then, of course, I would have to pay someone to attach TV to the wall mount.  Also, I was transferred four times and it took over 30 minutes to even get a final answer that, yes, I was on my own.  After much complaining, and at my insistence, Amazon did give me a monetary credit to and arranged for 2-day delivery of another TV.  Amazon customer service needs to be more receptive and certainly it should not take over 30 minutes and three transfers to talk to someone with some authority.

Reviews.Title: Amazon always too expensive, this Samsung UN75F6300 75 incher is $1999 at Frys right now 2/5/2014
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Amazon use to be the place for a decent deal, not anymore???  I bought one of these 75 in Samsung's for $1999 at Fry's today!3 stars for Amazon..

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: yongchoel Lee
Reviews.Content: The TV is able to use multy language.And to conrol is very easy.Good desing and very lite..Fantastic rate...

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Minseok Kang
Reviews.Content: this is super good price...:)i'll love the amazon...lolanyway ty for the GOOD PRICE AND GOOD THING..if i need something, I'll come back...kk

Reviews.Title: not as expected
Reviews.Author: Sunil Kumar Padmavathy
Reviews.Content: though picture is very good, some drawbacks that made me give 3 stars are as follows1) all share using my galaxy s4 doesnt work properly, it automatically disconnects, not sure why2) typing using a remote control while searching for a movie, is a big pain3) using browser is another big pain.4) sometimes it doesnt find wifi properly asking me to refresh many times.otherwise it is a good tv with amazing clarity

Reviews.Title: New TV
Reviews.Author: Marv
Reviews.Content: A little too complicated to use for senior citizens. Sound quality is poor. Picture is great. What more can I say.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL
Reviews.Author: CHAMPION
Reviews.Content: GREAT TV I BEEN WAITING FOR THIS TV SINCE LAST BLACK FRIDAY FORGET ABOUT GOING SHOPING AT NIGHT NOW I JUST SHOP AT NIGHT IN AMAZON WAY TO GO BABY.................

Reviews.Title: mega good
Reviews.Author: Catherine E.
Reviews.Content: I got the TV and wanted to give it to my dad, but my self got in the way... I have loved it though

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Donnita Woodward
Reviews.Content: It's amazing television...Don't think about it...You can't go wrong buying this product with the right price! Samsung HDTV Picture perfect!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Jack Wright
Reviews.Content: Smart, easy to learn and use, nice picture, what more could you want.  I have never been disapointed in a Samsung product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV & Smarthub
Reviews.Author: Anytown USA "MeToo"
Reviews.Content: Great for the wireless and U-Tube access.Better remote and clear screen.  Netflix needs HD media so it looks good on this TV.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Rodney de Carvalho
Reviews.Content: I love it. The set up is easy, fast and friendly. I recomend  the purchase the all.Beautiful design.Tks

Reviews.Title: Internet on this smart TV works half the time
Reviews.Author: Steve Cibulskis
Reviews.Content: The internet does not work half the time. I have to get on my computer. This is not a very smart TV

Reviews.Title: garanty
Reviews.Author: Marco
Reviews.Content: the product came broken, opened it and install it and turns on and off suddenly, the truth is the worst buy in my life.

Reviews.Title: No smart functions without Samsung server connectivity constantly.
Reviews.Author: Mark H
Reviews.Content: Samsung Smart Hub is required for any of the smart functionality to work. I have yet to get it to complete the setup for smart hub despite having a soild connection. The error "The internet connection is not stable. Check your internet settings." always shows up. The service is erratic at best, according to most forums I've checked while looking for a solution.. The picture is great after a little tweaking but you can get just as good of a picture from a non smart tv and save some cash. Get a regular HD LED tv and a media box like the Roku. You'll spend less and enjoy the flexibility much more.UPDATE: Turns out the lack of communication to Samsung wasn't wholly Samsung's fault. After setting up the TV via a mobile hotspot I was able to use any app that didn't directly communicate with Samsung. It's something specific to the way my ISP handles NAT for their dynamic IP customers. Called them up and and got a static IP, no more problems. Everything works great. Still docking a star for their strange network issues. I stand by my previous statements, though. Get a regular HD with the specs you want and add devices to get smart functions. Chromecast is getting better every day and Roku is already exceptional.

Reviews.Title: Did the Job
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: Did what it was supposed to. My friend & I spent about 2 hrs putting it together.But it worked.

Reviews.Title: Serious black level issue
Reviews.Author: Mikec "Shotgun"
Reviews.Content: After having a Pioneer Elite in my dedicated home theater for 14 years I decided to go bigger with the Samsung UN75F6300 LCD TV. It's big, but the black level is dismal. There are splotches of light whenever there is a dark scene that are truly distracting. It's hard to believe Samsung could let a product leave the factory with this kind of issue, but they did. I did a complete calibration on the set to no avail and of course the Samsung help line in India or wherever they are located was no help.

Reviews.Title: Ok, but it could be so much more...
Reviews.Author: Tottenmom
Reviews.Content: Love the software and features this TV offers but I feel that this TV offer a lot more if Samsung didn't deliberately lock down some of the features.  There is no reason Samsung should limit screen mirroring for non-Samsung mobile devices, this TV is fully capable of it.  I own a Nexus 7 2013 and Moto X, neither will allow me to mirror without the Allshare Cast application only available to Samsung devices.  Other TV manufacturers allow you to do this as long as your device allows screen mirroring (Miracast).  I find it disappointing that Samsung criticizes other companies for being a "walled garden" while they practice the exact same thing.  If they release a software update so I can mirror with non-Samsung devices I will give it 5 stars, to me, that feature makes the difference between an "okay" tv to an "awesome" tv.

Reviews.Title: Poor Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Shirley Medley
Reviews.Content: When watching this tv if you move to the left or right from straight on the picture fades out and is horrible.

Reviews.Title: Price jumps around too often.
Reviews.Author: Tinker
Reviews.Content: Put this in my cart yesterday at $450.  Today it's up by $110.  Nothing changed about the TV other than the price.I wish Amazon wouldn't treat these things like commodities and keep a stable price on them!A couple of comments mention that Amazon sometimes changes suppliers.  My review is based on an offered by Amazon item, and that preice should be much more stable.In my opinion, making it even worse: the prices for the used sets from Amazon Warehouse Deals have also increaded by more than $100, and those prices should definitely remain stable.  They're customer returns, for pity's sake!I like Amazon.  We spend thousands of dollars with Amazon each year.  This, however, is off-putting.  Just saying.

Reviews.Title: Bad quality for such an expensive tv
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV basically because it was a small (for TV's) 1080p screen with a thinnest-in-class bezel and slim profile for use as a computer monitor.  Unfortunately, Samsung tacks on a lot of features I will never use (Wi-Fi, 3D, etc) to get those three things.  Considering my 13.3" laptop has a 1080p screen, it is clearly not a manufacturability issue for why you have to go so expensive to get a 1080p screen.As for the TV, it works OK for what I use it for, but even though I use it on average of 3 hours a day, only 6 months in white spots appeared on the right side of the screen.  They are only visible when viewing very white pages, but it is nonetheless a serious quality issue.  My old flat screen monitor had ZERO problems even after 10 years, granted the back-lighting technology is different.  In the future, I will a) probably not buy Samsung, and b) compromise on aesthetic because I will anticipate that the TV will just fail soon anyway.

Reviews.Title: It's a GOOD TV, but not a GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: John B. Miller
Reviews.Content: Like I said in the title, it's a good TV.  That said, there things about this TV that I don't like.  I can't find a picture that I really enjoy. I have tried an many different settings and adjustments, but I can't get the picture quite to my liking. I've finally given up and am now just using the factory set "Natural" setting. The internet connection and apps work well, but I rarely use it, because the computer is faster and easier to use. I guess I just expected more at this price point.

Reviews.Title: No bluetooth (SoundShare)
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV because the description indicated that the TV has Bluetooth audio.  Samsung calls this feature SoundShare.  Setting up the TV took 2 hours because the software was very old and unstable.  It kept making the TV crash.  Once I was able to update the software I tried to set up Bluetooth audio.  This is when I discovered that the 6300 series does not have Bluetooth despite the amazon description.  I contacted Samsung and they were clueless.  I read the manual which indicates that only the 6400 series and above have Bluetooth.  This is unfortunate because I purchased the SoundShare speaker system.  The concept is great but not widely available on many TVs yet.  When I called amazon they offered $60 or I could exchange the TV.  I would prefer having my evening back.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Picture; Smart TV Not Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: Michael E.
Reviews.Content: UN46F6300 has an incredible picture. Never expected it to be so good in a TV this size and price range.Using it is horrible. UPDATING THAT after 1 month. Definitely takes getting used to, but NOT horrible.I didn't buy a TV for Facebook or Twitter (and without a keyboard, those are very hard to use).Mostly, I like to watch TV and movies.Samsung customer support just told me that this TV will work with hundreds of apps I'll never use, but the remote doesn't work well with Cable.They directed me to a User Guide on Line - wonderfully detailed and well done manual.But many of instructions don't work if you get your TV from cable. (Note: LOTS of us do.)ON THE OTHER HAND. I absolutely cannot get over the quality of the picture. Bought a Samsung sound bar, and just love the whole package.I've found work arounds for the problems I was having. Will admit Samsung support really didn't help.Mostly, I think the remote could be easier to use for cable customers.So, bottom line, I fell in love with a TV whose remote isn't perfect. LOL. Took a while.And a month later, this is a definite HIGHLY RECOMMEND.If I ever buy another TV, it will also be a Samsung.And, of course, with Amazon you're protected either way.

Reviews.Title: poor sound quality
Reviews.Author: Amy Cox
Reviews.Content: We had to return the TV b/c of a persistent buzzing/humming sound. We tried everything to troubleshoot, but nothing worked.

Reviews.Title: smart tv is dumb
Reviews.Author: Pat "PH"
Reviews.Content: Love the TV but I want to enjoy the Smart internet features but like many people the internet continually disconnects. Everything else works just fine with WiFi, iphones, Xbox, PS3, Ipad but not this TV. Search the internet and you will find this is a common problem. Samsung has been no help and tried many things suggested on forum. Nothing works and continually disconnects. If you want a TV that connects to internet forget this one. Really to bad because the Smart apps and features are great but will not work.

Reviews.Title: Beware, Samsung Software Breaks Often!
Reviews.Author: A Customer
Reviews.Content: Samsung software may well be the worst in the business.  If you are buying this for the SmartTV functionality (ie, watching Netflix, Hulu or Amazon), don't:  the software very often doesn't work for long stretches of time.I was stuck with non-functioning Netflix and Amazon VOD for more than six months after an update broke everything.  Do a search for "samsung netflix doesn't work" and you'll start to see some of the many horror stories.  The CNET forums are particularly rife with people in the same boat.  An update finally fixed that, but less than four months later, another update has left me, again, with a brick.  But hey, the nature of the problem has changed!

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40F6300 40-Inch 1080p 120Hz Smart LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: jTbd
Reviews.Content: I have been through 4 pages of reviews for Samsung UN40F6300 40-Inch 1080p 120Hz Smart LED HDTV, and none have been for the 40 in.This really pisses me off Amazon! Once you get beyond the 40in the specks can change way beyond  the 40 in.Why does this happen with every TV i search?This is false advertising.

Reviews.Title: Not smart
Reviews.Author: Kara
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this 46 inch and the same TV in a 40 inch version.  I specifically bought smart tvs to watch Netflix.Every time I click the Netflix button on the Samsung remote I get a message that my account has been deactivated and I have to sign in again. Signing into Netflix is very time consuming because you have to use the remote to navigate an onscreen keyboard.(Sometimes I can get back in if I've recently signed in that day, but never the next day.)Netflix claims this is a Samsung issue.I followed Samsung's instructions to update software and reinstall the smart hub and sign into Netflix again and it didn't fix the problem.I never have to re-sign in to Netflix on my Xbox or iphone.Now I'm going to have to buy an external streaming device for these tvs that were supposed to have that feature built in.

Reviews.Title: Pixel Issues
Reviews.Author: Scott Williams
Reviews.Content: I only had this tv for a few days before I noticed a problem. I didn't notice it that much with my cable, but I noticed it a lot when I tried to play a blu ray movie. I noticed that there was a problem with the pixels, for example, a person/object in the scene would mostly be in one location but part of the person/object would be in another location. It would only happen for a split second, but I noticed it happening pretty frequently. Anyone happen to know if this happens a lot with LED's? I didn't think I would have a problem with the picture since it featured 120 Hz.

Reviews.Title: Short Term OK
Reviews.Author: MikeD
Reviews.Content: This review is for the '09 version, price $1,599 from Amazon, expected panel life, 25 years, actual panel life, 5 years. I'll recommend, despite glowing reviews, to buy the absolute cheapest TV at your size/feature requirement. BTW, all the "smart tv" bs is just that. I'll bet most of you have a home theater & pay no attention to the tv's crappy sound system. If the home theater doesn't "stream" why would you need the tv to do it?

Reviews.Title: good choice...get time
Reviews.Author: jun hyung lee
Reviews.Content: this is good tv but slow ship more you are not alone gagamelsome time is great man haha have give me dancewhat is your name....how are you thank you...are you ok...i'm boys

Reviews.Title: it is excellent.. but i got sharp display not samsung one...
